78 #ifndef SPOTON_KERNEL_GLOBALS
79 QList<int> spoton_common::LANE_WIDTHS = QList<int> () << 14500
80  << 20000

82  << 50000
83  << 75000
84  << 100000
85  << 20971520;

87  "HIGH:!aNULL:!eNULL:!3DES:!EXPORT:!SSLv3:@STRENGTH";
88 QStringList spoton_common::ACCEPTABLE_URL_SCHEMES =
89  QStringList() << "ftp" << "gopher" << "http" << "https";

91  QStringList() << "chat"

96  << "url";

137 const qint64 spoton_common::MINIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH;
138 const unsigned long int spoton_common::GEMINI_ITERATION_COUNT;
139 int spoton_common::CACHE_TIME_DELTA_MAXIMUM =
140  spoton_common::CACHE_TIME_DELTA_MAXIMUM_STATIC;
141 int spoton_common::CHAT_TIME_DELTA_MAXIMUM =
142  spoton_common::CHAT_TIME_DELTA_MAXIMUM_STATIC;

144  spoton_common::FORWARD_SECRECY_TIME_DELTA_MAXIMUM_STATIC;

146  spoton_common::GEMINI_TIME_DELTA_MAXIMUM_STATIC;

148  spoton_common::KERNEL_URL_DISPATCHER_INTERVAL_STATIC;

155 static QPointer<spoton> s_gui = 0;
156 
157 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050000
158 static void qt_message_handler(QtMsgType type,
159  const QMessageLogContext &context,
160  const QString &msg)
161 {
162  Q_UNUSED(type);
163  Q_UNUSED(context);
164  spoton_misc::logError(QString("An error (%1) occurred.").arg(msg));
165 }
166 #else
167 static void qt_message_handler(QtMsgType type, const char *msg)
168 {
169  Q_UNUSED(type);
170 
171  if(msg && qstrnlen(msg, std::numeric_limits<uint>::max()) > 0)
172  spoton_misc::logError(QString("An error (%1) occurred.").arg(msg));
173  else
174  spoton_misc::logError("Unknown error.");
175 }
176 #endif
177 
178 static void signal_handler(int signal_number)
179 {
180  /*
181  ** _Exit() and _exit() may be safely called from signal handlers.
182  */
183 
184  static int fatal_error = 0;
185 
186  if(fatal_error)
187  _Exit(signal_number);
188 
189  fatal_error = 1;
190  spoton_crypt::terminate(); // Safe.
191  _Exit(signal_number);
192 }
193 
194 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050600 && defined(SPOTON_WEBENGINE_ENABLED)
195 class spoton_webengine_url_request_interceptor:
196  public QWebEngineUrlRequestInterceptor
197 {
198  public:
199  spoton_webengine_url_request_interceptor(QObject *parent):
200  QWebEngineUrlRequestInterceptor(parent)
201  {
202  }
203 
204  ~spoton_webengine_url_request_interceptor()
205  {
206  }
207 
208  void interceptRequest(QWebEngineUrlRequestInfo &info)
209  {
210  info.block(true);
211  }
212 };
213 #endif
214 
215 int spotonguimain(int argc, char *argv[])
216 {
217  /*
218  ** Disable JIT.
219  */
220 
221  qputenv("QT_ENABLE_REGEXP_JIT", "0");
222  qputenv("QV4_FORCE_INTERPRETER", "1");
223  spoton_misc::prepareSignalHandler(signal_handler);
224  PQinitOpenSSL(0, 0); // We will initialize OpenSSL and libcrypto.
225  curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_ALL);
226  libspoton_enable_sqlite_cache();
227 
228 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
229 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
230  QMacStyle *style = new (std::nothrow) QMacStyle();
231 
232  if(style)
233  QApplication::setStyle(style);
234 #endif
235 #endif
236 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050000
237 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
238  QApplication::addLibraryPath("plugins");
239  QApplication::setStyle("fusion");
240 #endif
241  qInstallMessageHandler(qt_message_handler);
242 #else
243  qInstallMsgHandler(qt_message_handler);
244 #endif
245 
246  QApplication qapplication(argc, argv);
247 
248 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050000 && defined(SPOTON_WEBENGINE_ENABLED)
249  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setCachePath("");
250  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setHttpCacheMaximumSize(1);
251  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setHttpCacheType
252  (QWebEngineProfile::MemoryHttpCache);
253  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setHttpUserAgent("");
254  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setPersistentCookiesPolicy
255  (QWebEngineProfile::NoPersistentCookies);
256  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setPersistentStoragePath("");
257 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050600
258  QWebEngineProfile::defaultProfile()->setRequestInterceptor
259  (new spoton_webengine_url_request_interceptor(0));
260 #endif
261  QWebEngineSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
262  (QWebEngineSettings::AutoLoadImages, false);
263  QWebEngineSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
264  (QWebEngineSettings::JavascriptEnabled, false);
265  QWebEngineSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
266  (QWebEngineSettings::LocalContentCanAccessFileUrls, false);
267  QWebEngineSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
268  (QWebEngineSettings::LocalStorageEnabled, false);
269 #elif defined(SPOTON_WEBKIT_ENABLED)
270  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
271  (QWebSettings::AutoLoadImages, false);
272  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
273  (QWebSettings::JavascriptEnabled, false);
274  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
275  (QWebSettings::LocalContentCanAccessFileUrls, false);
276  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
277  (QWebSettings::PluginsEnabled, false);
278  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setAttribute
279  (QWebSettings::PrivateBrowsingEnabled, true);
280  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setIconDatabasePath("");
281  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setMaximumPagesInCache(0);
282  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setOfflineStorageDefaultQuota(0);
283  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setOfflineStoragePath("");
284  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setOfflineWebApplicationCachePath("");
285  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setOfflineWebApplicationCacheQuota(0);
286  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setWebGraphic
287  (QWebSettings::MissingImageGraphic, QPixmap());
288  QWebSettings::globalSettings()->setWebGraphic
289  (QWebSettings::MissingPluginGraphic, QPixmap());
290 #endif
291 
292  QThread *thread = qapplication.thread();
293 
294  if(!thread)
295  thread = QThread::currentThread();
296 
297  if(thread)
298  thread->setPriority(QThread::HighPriority);
299  else
300  qDebug() << "Cannot set the main thread's priority because "
301  "the main thread does not exist.";
302 
303 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
304 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050000
305  /*
306  ** Eliminate pool errors on OS X.
307  */
308 
309  CocoaInitializer ci;
310 #endif
311 #endif
312 
313  /*
314  ** Configure translations.
315  */
316 
317  QTranslator qtTranslator;
318 
319  qtTranslator.load("qt_" + QLocale::system().name(), "Translations");
320  qapplication.installTranslator(&qtTranslator);
321 
322  QTranslator myappTranslator;
323 
324  myappTranslator.load("spot-on_" + QLocale::system().name(),
325  "Translations");
326  qapplication.installTranslator(&myappTranslator);
327  QCoreApplication::setApplicationName("SpotOn");
328  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("SpotOn");
329  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("spot-on.sf.net");
330  QCoreApplication::setApplicationVersion(SPOTON_VERSION_STR);
331  QSettings::setPath(QSettings::IniFormat, QSettings::UserScope,
332  spoton_misc::homePath());
333  QSettings::setDefaultFormat(QSettings::IniFormat);
334 
335  QSettings settings;
336 
337 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN32
338  if(!settings.contains("gui/etpDestinationPath"))
339  {
340  QDir dir(QDir::currentPath());
341 
342  dir.mkdir("Mosaics");
343  dir.cd("Mosaics");
344  settings.setValue("gui/etpDestinationPath", dir.absolutePath());
345  }
346  else
347  {
348  QDir dir;
349 
350  dir.mkpath(settings.value("gui/etpDestinationPath").toString());
351  }
352 #else
353  if(!settings.contains("gui/etpDestinationPath"))
354  settings.setValue("gui/etpDestinationPath", QDir::homePath());
355 #endif
356 
357  if(!settings.contains("gui/gcryctl_init_secmem"))
358  settings.setValue("gui/gcryctl_init_secmem",
359  spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE);
360 
361  if(!settings.contains("gui/tcp_nodelay"))
362  settings.setValue("gui/tcp_nodelay", 1);
363 
364  bool ok = true;
365  int integer = settings.value("gui/gcryctl_init_secmem",
366  spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE).
367  toInt(&ok);
368 
369  if(!ok)
370  integer = spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE;
371  else if(integer == 0)
372  {
373  }
374  else if(integer > 999999999)
375  integer = spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE;
376 
377  spoton_crypt::init
378  (integer, settings.value("gui/cbc_cts_enabled", true).toBool());
379 
380  try
381  {
382  new spoton();
383  qapplication.exec();
384  curl_global_cleanup();
385  spoton_crypt::terminate();
386  return EXIT_SUCCESS;
387  }
388  catch(const std::bad_alloc &exception)
389  {
390  s_gui = 0;
391  std::cerr << "Critical memory failure. Exiting." << std::endl;
392  curl_global_cleanup();
393  spoton_crypt::terminate();
394  return EXIT_FAILURE;
395  }
396 }
397 
398 spoton::spoton(void):QMainWindow()
399 {
400  m_wizardUi = 0;
401  s_gui = this;
402 
403  {
404 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
405  /*
406  ** Anomaly.
407  */
408 
409  QNetworkAccessManager manager;
410  QNetworkReply *reply = manager.get
411  (QNetworkRequest(QUrl::fromUserInput("http://0.0.0.0")));
412 
413  reply->deleteLater();
414 #endif
415  }
416 
417  for(int i = 0; i < 10 + 6; i++)
418  for(int j = 0; j < 10 + 6; j++)
419  {
420  QChar c1;
421  QChar c2;
422 
423  if(i <= 9)
424  c1 = QChar(i + 48);
425  else
426  c1 = QChar(i + 97 - 10);
427 
428  if(j <= 9)
429  c2 = QChar(j + 48);
430  else
431  c2 = QChar(j + 97 - 10);
432 
433  m_urlPrefixes << QString("%1%2").arg(c1).arg(c2);
434  }
435 
436  m_locked = false;
437  qsrand(static_cast<uint> (QTime(0, 0, 0).secsTo(QTime::currentTime())));
438  spoton_crypt::memcmp_test();
439  spoton_smp::test1();
440  spoton_smp::test2();
441  spoton_smp::test3();
442  spoton_threefish::test1();
443  spoton_threefish::test2();
444  spoton_threefish::test3();
445  QDir().mkdir(spoton_misc::homePath());
446  m_keysShared["buzz_channels_sent_to_kernel"] = "false";
447  m_keysShared["keys_sent_to_kernel"] = "false";
448  m_buzzStatusTimer.setInterval(15000);
449  m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
450  m_magnetsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
451  m_listenersLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
452  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
453  m_participantsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
454  m_documentation = new spoton_documentation(0);
455  m_echoKeyShare = new spoton_echo_key_share(&m_kernelSocket, 0);
456  m_rss = new spoton_rss(0);
457  m_starbeamAnalyzer = new spoton_starbeamanalyzer(0);
458  m_starbeamReceivedModel = new QStandardItemModel(this);
459  m_statisticsModel = new QStandardItemModel(this);
460 
461  QStringList list;
462 
463  list << tr("Percent Received") << tr("File");
464  m_starbeamReceivedModel->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(list);
465  m_starsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
466  list.clear();
467  list << tr("Statistic") << tr("Value");
468  m_statisticsModel->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(list);
469  list.clear();
470  m_urlCommonCrypt = 0;
471  m_ui.setupUi(this);
472  m_sbWidget = new QWidget(this);
473  m_sb.setupUi(m_sbWidget);
474  m_ui.buzzTab->tabBar()->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
475  m_ui.emailParticipants->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
476  m_ui.etpMagnets->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
477  m_ui.listeners->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
478  m_ui.neighbors->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
479  m_ui.participants->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
480  m_ui.received->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
481  m_ui.tab->tabBar()->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
482  m_ui.transmitted->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
483  m_ui.transmittedMagnets->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
484  m_ui.urlParticipants->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
485 
486  QSettings settings;
487 
488 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
489  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
490 
491  foreach(QWidget *widget, findChildren<QWidget *> ())
492  {
493  widget->setProperty("original_style_sheet", widget->styleSheet());
494 
495  if(widget->contextMenuPolicy() == Qt::CustomContextMenu ||
496  widget->inherits("QLineEdit") ||
497  widget->inherits("QTextEdit"))
498  continue;
499 
500  widget->setContextMenuPolicy(Qt::CustomContextMenu);
501 
502  if(settings.contains(QString("gui/widget_stylesheet_%1").
503  arg(widget->objectName())))
504  widget->setStyleSheet
505  (settings.value(QString("gui/widget_stylesheet_%1").
506  arg(widget->objectName())).toString());
507 
508  connect(widget,
509  SIGNAL(customContextMenuRequested(const QPoint &)),
510  this,
511  SLOT(slotSetWidgetStyleSheet(const QPoint &)));
512  }
513 
514  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
515 #endif
516  m_ui.buzz_frame->setVisible(m_ui.buzz_details->isChecked());
517 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
518  m_ui.proxy_frame->setVisible(m_ui.proxy->isChecked());
519 #endif
520  list << "buzz"
521  << "chat"
522  << "email"
523  << "listeners"
524  << "neighbors"
525  << "search"
526  << "settings"
527  << "starbeam"
528  << "urls";
529 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG >= 1
530  list << "add_friend";
531 #endif
532  list << "about";
533 
534  for(int i = 0; i < m_ui.tab->count(); i++)
535  {
536  m_tabWidgets[i] = m_ui.tab->widget(i);
537 
538  QHash<QString, QVariant> hash;
539 
540  hash["enabled"] = true;
541  hash["icon"] = m_ui.tab->tabIcon(i);
542  hash["label"] = m_ui.tab->tabText(i);
543  hash["name"] = list.value(i);
544  m_tabWidgetsProperties[i] = hash;
545  }
546 
547  list.clear();
548 
549 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
550  m_ui.version->setText
551  (QString("<html><head/><body><p><a href=\"https://github.com/textbrowser/"
552  "spot-on/blob/master/branches/Documentation/RELEASE-NOTES.html\">"
553  "<span style=\" text-decoration: underline; color:#0000ff;\">"
554  "Spot-On Version %1</span></a></p></body></html>").
555  arg(SPOTON_VERSION_STR));
556 #else
557  m_ui.version->setText
558  (QString("<html><head/><body><p><a href=\"https://github.com/textbrowser/"
559  "spot-on/blob/master/branches/Documentation/RELEASE-NOTES.html\">"
560  "<span style=\" text-decoration: underline; color:#0000ff;\">"
561  "%1</span></a></p></body></html>").
562  arg(SPOTON_GOLDBUG_VERSION_STR));
563 #endif
564  setWindowTitle
565  (tr("%1").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
566  m_ui.menu_Tools->setWindowTitle
567  (tr("%1: Tools").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
568  m_ui.menu_View->setWindowTitle
569  (tr("%1: View").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
570  m_ui.listenerOrientation->model()->setData
571  (m_ui.listenerOrientation->model()->index(1, 0), 0, Qt::UserRole - 1);
572  m_ui.neighborOrientation->model()->setData
573  (m_ui.neighborOrientation->model()->index(1, 0), 0, Qt::UserRole - 1);
574 
575  bool sslSupported = QSslSocket::supportsSsl();
576 
577  m_ui.buildInformation->setText
578  (QString("<html>"
579  "<font color=\"#ff878d\">Tiptoe through the tulips.</font>"
580  "<br><br>"
581  "Compiled on %1, %2.<br>"
582  "%3.<br>"
583  "Qt %4, %5-bit.<br>"
584  "%6.<br>"
585  "libgcrypt %7.<br>"
586  "libntl %8.<br>"
587  "libspoton %9.<br>"
588  "Location of .spot-on: %10.<br><br>"
589  "Translators<br>"
590  "Chinese - Zhao Wang<br>"
591  "German - Ulrike M&#246;ller<br>"
592  "Hindi - Ramachandra Kulkarni<br>"
593  "Spanish - Eduardo Gonzales<br>"
594  "Thai - Sathitchai K.</html>").
595 #ifdef SPOTON_DATELESS_COMPILATION
596  arg("January 1, 3000").
597  arg("01:01:01").
598 #else
599  arg(__DATE__).
600  arg(__TIME__).
601 #endif
602  arg(sslSupported ?
603  OPENSSL_VERSION_TEXT :
604  "OpenSSL is not supported, according to Qt").
605  arg(QT_VERSION_STR).arg(CHAR_BIT * sizeof(void *)).
606  arg(curl_version()).
607  arg(GCRYPT_VERSION).
608 #ifdef SPOTON_MCELIECE_ENABLED
609  arg(NTL_VERSION).
610 #else
611  arg("0.0").
612 #endif
613  arg(LIBSPOTON_VERSION_STR).
614  arg(spoton_misc::homePath()));
615  m_ui.passphrase_strength_indicator->setVisible(false);
616  m_ui.statisticsBox->setVisible(false);
617  m_ui.urlSettings->setVisible(true);
618  m_ui.urlsBox->setVisible(false);
619  m_ui.showUrlSettings->setChecked(true);
620  m_ui.urls_db_type->model()->setData
621  (m_ui.urls_db_type->model()->index(0, 0), 0, Qt::UserRole - 1);
622  m_ui.goldbug->setEnabled(false);
623  m_ui.postgresqlConnect->setEnabled(false);
624  m_ui.postgresqlConnect->setVisible(false);
625 
626  foreach(QString driver, QSqlDatabase::drivers())
627  if(driver.toLower().contains("qpsql"))
628  {
629  m_ui.postgresqlConnect->setEnabled(true);
630  m_ui.urls_db_type->model()->setData
631  (m_ui.urls_db_type->model()->index(0, 0), QVariant(1 | 32),
632  Qt::UserRole - 1);
633  break;
634  }
635 
636 #ifndef SPOTON_LINKED_WITH_LIBGEOIP
637  m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->setEnabled(false);
638  m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->setToolTip
639  (tr("%1 was configured without "
640  "libGeoIP.").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
641  m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->setEnabled(false);

644  "libGeoIP.").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));

661 #endif

2334  QByteArray status
2335  (m_settings.value("gui/my_status", "Online").toByteArray().toLower());
2336 
2337  m_ui.custom->setText
2338  (QString::fromUtf8(m_settings.value("gui/customStatus", "").
2339  toByteArray().constData(),
2340  m_settings.value("gui/customStatus", "").
2341  toByteArray().length()).trimmed());
2342  m_ui.custom->setVisible(false);
2343 
2344  if(status == "away")
2345  m_ui.status->setCurrentIndex(0);
2346  else if(status == "busy")
2347  m_ui.status->setCurrentIndex(1);
2348  else if(status == "custom")
2349  {
2350  m_ui.custom->setVisible(true);
2351  m_ui.status->setCurrentIndex(2);
2352  }
2353  else if(status == "offline")
2354  m_ui.status->setCurrentIndex(3);
2355  else
2356  m_ui.status->setCurrentIndex(4);
2357 
2358 #ifdef SPOTON_LINKED_WITH_LIBGEOIP
2359  if(!m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->text().isEmpty())
2360  m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->setToolTip(m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->text());
2361 
2362  if(!m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->text().isEmpty())
2363  m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->setToolTip(m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->text());
2364 #endif
2365 
2366  /*
2367  ** Please note that Spot-On supports only ciphers having 256-bit
2368  ** keys.
2369  */
2370 
2371  m_ui.kernelPath->setToolTip(m_ui.kernelPath->text());

2374  (QString::fromUtf8(m_settings.value("gui/buzzName", "unknown").
2375  toByteArray().constData(),

2377  toByteArray().length()).trimmed());

2379  (static_cast<int> (spoton_crypt::cipherKeyLength("aes256")));

2385  toByteArray().length()).trimmed());

2999 
3000  connect(&m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer,
3001  SIGNAL(timeout(void)),
3002  this,
3003  SLOT(slotDiscoverExternalAddress(void)));
3004 
3005  if(m_optionsUi.guiExternalIpFetch->currentIndex() !=
3006  m_optionsUi.guiExternalIpFetch->count() - 1)
3007  {
3008  m_externalAddress.discover();
3009 
3010  if(m_optionsUi.guiExternalIpFetch->currentIndex() == 0)
3011  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(30000);
3012  else
3013  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.start(60000);
3014  }
3015 
3016  connect(&m_statisticsFutureWatcher,
3017  SIGNAL(finished(void)),
3018  this,
3019  SLOT(slotStatisticsGathered(void)));
3020 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
3021  str = m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").toString().toLower();
3022 #else
3023  str = m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nuvola").toString().toLower();
3024 #endif

3027  m_optionsUi.icons->setCurrentIndex(0);
3028  else if(str == "meego")
3029  m_optionsUi.icons->setCurrentIndex(1);
3030  else if(str == "nuvola")

3037 #endif

3043 #else

3045 #endif
3046 
3047  if(size == QSize(16, 16))
3048  m_optionsUi.iconsize->setCurrentIndex(0);
3049  else if(size == QSize(24, 24))
3050  m_optionsUi.iconsize->setCurrentIndex(1);
3051  else if(size == QSize(32, 32))
3052  m_optionsUi.iconsize->setCurrentIndex(2);

3076  << m_ui.searchfor

3100  tr("The SQLite database driver QSQLITE is not available. "
3101  "This is a fatal flaw."));

3116 void spoton::slotQuit(void)
3117 {
3118  /*
3119  ** closeEvent() calls slotQuit().
3120  */
3121 
3122  if(sender())
3123  if(promptBeforeExit())
3124  return;
3125 
3126  cleanup();
3127 }
3128 
3129 void spoton::cleanup(void)
3130 {
3131  if(m_settings.value("gui/removeOtmOnExit", false).toBool())
3132  spoton_misc::removeOneTimeStarBeamMagnets();
3133 
3134  m_encryptFile.abort();
3135  m_starbeamDigestInterrupt.fetchAndStoreOrdered(1);
3136 
3137  while(!m_starbeamDigestFutures.isEmpty())
3138  {
3139  QFuture<void> future(m_starbeamDigestFutures.takeFirst());
3140 
3141  future.waitForFinished();
3142  }
3143 
3144  m_statisticsFuture.waitForFinished();
3145  m_buzzStatusTimer.stop();
3146  m_chatInactivityTimer.stop();
3147  m_emailRetrievalTimer.stop();
3148  m_externalAddressDiscovererTimer.stop();
3149  m_generalTimer.stop();
3150  m_kernelUpdateTimer.stop();
3151  m_listenersUpdateTimer.stop();
3152  m_neighborsUpdateTimer.stop();
3153  m_participantsUpdateTimer.stop();
3154  m_starbeamUpdateTimer.stop();
3155  m_tableTimer.stop();
3156  m_updateChatWindowsTimer.stop();
3157  m_urlDatabase.close();
3158  m_urlDatabase = QSqlDatabase();
3159 
3160  if(QSqlDatabase::contains("URLDatabase"))
3161  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase("URLDatabase");
3162 
3163  m_ui.url_database_connection_information->clear();
3164  saveSettings();
3165  delete m_urlCommonCrypt;
3166  delete m_wizardUi;
3167  m_urlCommonCrypt = 0;
3168  m_wizardUi = 0;
3169 
3170  QHashIterator<QString, spoton_crypt *> it(m_crypts);
3171 
3172  while(it.hasNext())
3173  {
3174  it.next();
3175  delete it.value();
3176  }
3177 
3178  m_crypts.clear();
3179 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
3180  m_addParticipantWindow->deleteLater();
3181 #endif
3182  m_documentation->deleteLater();
3183  m_echoKeyShare->deleteLater();
3184  m_notificationsWindow->deleteLater();
3185  m_optionsWindow->deleteLater();
3186  m_rss->deleteLater();
3187  m_starbeamAnalyzer->deleteLater();
3188  m_statisticsWindow->deleteLater();
3189  QApplication::instance()->quit();
3190 }
3191 
3192 void spoton::slotAddListener(void)
3193 {
3194  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
3195 
3196  if(!crypt)
3197  {
3198  QMessageBox::critical
3199  (this, tr("%1: Error").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3200  tr("Invalid spoton_crypt object. This is a fatal flaw."));
3201  return;
3202  }
3203 
3204  QByteArray certificate;
3205  QByteArray privateKey;
3206  QByteArray publicKey;
3207  QString error("");
3208 
3209  if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 2 &&
3210  m_ui.permanentCertificate->isChecked() &&
3211  m_ui.sslListener->isChecked())
3212  {
3213  QHostAddress address;
3214 
3215  if(m_ui.recordIPAddress->isChecked())
3216  address = m_externalAddress.address();
3217 
3218  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
3219  m_sb.status->setText
3220  (tr("Generating %1-bit SSL/TLS data. Please be patient.").
3221  arg(m_ui.listenerKeySize->currentText()));
3222  m_sb.status->repaint();
3223  spoton_crypt::generateSslKeys
3224  (m_ui.listenerKeySize->currentText().toInt(),
3225  certificate,
3226  privateKey,
3227  publicKey,
3228  address,
3229  60L * 60L * 24L * static_cast<long int> (m_ui.days_valid->value()),
3230  error);
3231  m_sb.status->clear();
3232  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
3233  }
3234  else if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 3) // UDP
3235  {
3236  if(spoton_misc::isMulticastAddress(QHostAddress(m_ui.listenerIP->text().
3237  trimmed())))
3238  {
3239  QMessageBox::information
3240  (this, tr("%1: Information").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3241  tr("Please create a UDP multicast neighbor."));
3242  return;
3243  }
3244  }
3245 
3246  QString connectionName("");
3247  bool ok = true;
3248 
3249  if(!error.isEmpty())
3250  {
3251  ok = false;
3252  spoton_misc::logError
3253  (QString("spoton::"
3254  "slotAddListener(): "
3255  "generateSslKeys() failure (%1).").arg(error));
3256  goto done_label;
3257  }
3258 
3259  prepareDatabasesFromUI();
3260 
3261  {
3262  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
3263 
3264  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
3265  "listeners.db");
3266 
3267  if(db.open())
3268  {
3269  QByteArray hash;
3270  QString ip("");
3271 
3272  if(m_ui.listenerIPCombo->currentIndex() == 0)
3273  ip = m_ui.listenerIP->text().toLower().trimmed();
3274  else
3275  ip = m_ui.listenerIPCombo->currentText();
3276 
3277  QString port(QString::number(m_ui.listenerPort->value()));
3278  QString protocol("");
3279  QString scopeId(m_ui.listenerScopeId->text());
3280  QString sslCS(m_ui.listenersSslControlString->text().trimmed());
3281  QString status("online");
3282  QString transport("");
3283  QSqlQuery query(db);
3284 
3285  if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 0)
3286  scopeId = "";
3287  else
3288  {
3289  if(m_ui.ipv4Listener->isChecked())
3290  protocol = "IPv4";
3291  else
3292  protocol = "IPv6";
3293  }
3294 
3295  if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 0)
3296  transport = "bluetooth";
3297  else if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 1)
3298  transport = "sctp";
3299  else if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3300  transport = "tcp";
3301  else
3302  transport = "udp";
3303 
3304  query.prepare("INSERT INTO listeners "
3305  "(ip_address, "
3306  "port, "
3307  "protocol, "
3308  "scope_id, "
3309  "status_control, "
3310  "hash, "
3311  "echo_mode, "
3312  "ssl_key_size, "
3313  "certificate, "
3314  "private_key, "
3315  "public_key, "
3316  "transport, "
3317  "share_udp_address, "
3318  "orientation, "
3319  "ssl_control_string) "
3320  "VALUES "
3321  "(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
3322 
3323  if(ip.isEmpty())
3324  query.bindValue
3325  (0, crypt->
3326  encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(), &ok).toBase64());
3327  else if(transport != "bluetooth")
3328  {
3329  QStringList digits;
3330  QStringList list;
3331 
3332  if(protocol == "IPv4")
3333  list = ip.split(".", QString::KeepEmptyParts);
3334  else
3335  list = ip.split(":", QString::KeepEmptyParts);
3336 
3337  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
3338  digits.append(list.at(i));
3339 
3340  if(protocol == "IPv4")
3341  {
3342  ip = QString::number(digits.value(0).toInt()) + "." +
3343  QString::number(digits.value(1).toInt()) + "." +
3344  QString::number(digits.value(2).toInt()) + "." +
3345  QString::number(digits.value(3).toInt());
3346  ip.remove("...");
3347  }
3348  else
3349  {
3350  if(m_ui.listenerIPCombo->currentIndex() == 0)
3351  ip = spoton_misc::massageIpForUi(ip, protocol);
3352  }
3353 
3354  if(ok)
3355  query.bindValue
3356  (0, crypt->
3357  encryptedThenHashed(ip.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3358  }
3359  else
3360  {
3361  if(ok)
3362  query.bindValue
3363  (0, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(ip.toLatin1(), &ok).
3364  toBase64());
3365  }
3366 
3367  if(ok)
3368  query.bindValue
3369  (1, crypt->
3370  encryptedThenHashed(port.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3371 
3372  if(ok)
3373  query.bindValue
3374  (2, crypt->
3375  encryptedThenHashed(protocol.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3376 
3377  if(ok)
3378  query.bindValue
3379  (3, crypt->
3380  encryptedThenHashed(scopeId.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3381 
3382  query.bindValue(4, status);
3383 
3384  if(ok)
3385  {
3386  hash = crypt->
3387  keyedHash((ip + port + scopeId + transport).toLatin1(), &ok);
3388 
3389  if(ok)
3390  query.bindValue(5, hash.toBase64());
3391  }
3392 
3393  if(ok)
3394  {
3395  if(m_ui.listenersEchoMode->currentIndex() == 0)
3396  query.bindValue
3397  (6, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("full", &ok).toBase64());
3398  else
3399  query.bindValue
3400  (6, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("half", &ok).toBase64());
3401  }
3402 
3403  if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 2 &&
3404  m_ui.sslListener->isChecked())
3405  query.bindValue(7, m_ui.listenerKeySize->currentText().toInt());
3406  else
3407  query.bindValue(7, 0);
3408 
3409  if(ok)
3410  query.bindValue
3411  (8, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(certificate, &ok).
3412  toBase64());
3413 
3414  if(ok)
3415  query.bindValue
3416  (9, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(privateKey, &ok).
3417  toBase64());
3418 
3419  if(ok)
3420  query.bindValue
3421  (10, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(publicKey, &ok).
3422  toBase64());
3423 
3424  if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 0)
3425  query.bindValue
3426  (11, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("bluetooth", &ok).toBase64());
3427  else if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 1)
3428  query.bindValue
3429  (11, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("sctp", &ok).toBase64());
3430  else if(m_ui.listenerTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3431  query.bindValue
3432  (11, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("tcp", &ok).toBase64());
3433  else
3434  query.bindValue
3435  (11, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("udp", &ok).toBase64());
3436 
3437  if(m_ui.listenerShareAddress->isChecked())
3438  query.bindValue(12, 1);
3439  else
3440  query.bindValue(12, 0);
3441 
3442  if(m_ui.listenerOrientation->currentIndex() == 0)
3443  query.bindValue
3444  (13, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("packet", &ok).toBase64());
3445  else
3446  query.bindValue
3447  (13, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("stream", &ok).toBase64());
3448 
3449  if(sslCS.isEmpty())
3450  sslCS = spoton_common::SSL_CONTROL_STRING;
3451 
3452  if(!m_ui.sslListener->isChecked() || transport != "tcp")
3453  sslCS = "N/A";
3454 
3455  query.bindValue(14, sslCS);
3456 
3457  if(ok)
3458  ok = query.exec();
3459 
3460  if(ok)
3461  {
3462  /*
3463  ** Add the default Any IP address.
3464  */
3465 
3466  QSqlQuery query(db);
3467 
3468  query.prepare("INSERT OR REPLACE INTO listeners_allowed_ips "
3469  "(ip_address, ip_address_hash, listener_oid) "
3470  "VALUES (?, ?, (SELECT OID FROM listeners WHERE "
3471  "hash = ?))");
3472  query.bindValue
3473  (0, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("Any", &ok).toBase64());
3474 
3475  if(ok)
3476  query.bindValue
3477  (1, crypt->keyedHash("Any", &ok).toBase64());
3478 
3479  query.bindValue(2, hash.toBase64());
3480 
3481  if(ok)
3482  ok = query.exec();
3483 
3484  if(query.lastError().isValid())
3485  error = query.lastError().text().trimmed();
3486  }
3487  }
3488  else
3489  {
3490  ok = false;
3491 
3492  if(db.lastError().isValid())
3493  error = db.lastError().text();
3494  }
3495 
3496  db.close();
3497  }
3498 
3499  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
3500 
3501  done_label:
3502 
3503  if(ok)
3504  m_ui.listenerIP->selectAll();
3505  else if(error.isEmpty())
3506  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
3507  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3508  tr("Unable to add the specified listener. "
3509  "Please enable logging via the Log Viewer "
3510  "and try again."));
3511  else
3512  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
3513  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3514  tr("An error (%1) occurred while attempting "
3515  "to add the specified listener. "
3516  "Please enable logging via the Log Viewer "
3517  "and try again.").arg(error));
3518 }
3519 
3520 void spoton::slotAddNeighbor(void)
3521 {
3522  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
3523 
3524  if(!crypt)
3525  {
3526  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
3527  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3528  tr("Invalid spoton_crypt object. "
3529  "This is a fatal flaw."));
3530  return;
3531  }
3532 
3533  prepareDatabasesFromUI();
3534 
3535  QString connectionName("");
3536  QString error("");
3537  bool ok = true;
3538 
3539  {
3540  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
3541 
3542  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
3543  "neighbors.db");
3544 
3545  if(db.open())
3546  {
3547  QString ip(m_ui.neighborIP->text().toLower().trimmed());
3548  QString port(QString::number(m_ui.neighborPort->value()));
3549  QString protocol("");
3550  QString proxyHostName("");
3551  QString proxyPassword("");
3552  QString proxyPort("1");
3553  QString proxyType("");
3554  QString proxyUsername("");
3555  QString scopeId(m_ui.neighborScopeId->text());
3556  QString sslCS(m_ui.neighborsSslControlString->text().trimmed());
3557  QString status("connected");
3558  QString transport("");
3559  QSqlQuery query(db);
3560 
3561  if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 0)
3562  scopeId = "";
3563  else
3564  {
3565  if(m_ui.ipv4Neighbor->isChecked())
3566  protocol = "IPv4";
3567  else if(m_ui.ipv6Neighbor->isChecked())
3568  protocol = "IPv6";
3569  else
3570  protocol = "Dynamic DNS";
3571  }
3572 
3573  if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 0)
3574  transport = "bluetooth";
3575  else if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 1)
3576  transport = "sctp";
3577  else if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3578  transport = "tcp";
3579  else
3580  transport = "udp";
3581 
3582  query.prepare("INSERT INTO neighbors "
3583  "(local_ip_address, "
3584  "local_port, "
3585  "protocol, "
3586  "remote_ip_address, "
3587  "remote_port, "
3588  "sticky, "
3589  "scope_id, "
3590  "hash, "
3591  "status_control, "
3592  "country, "
3593  "remote_ip_address_hash, "
3594  "qt_country_hash, "
3595  "proxy_hostname, "
3596  "proxy_password, "
3597  "proxy_port, "
3598  "proxy_type, "
3599  "proxy_username, "
3600  "uuid, "
3601  "echo_mode, "
3602  "ssl_key_size, "
3603  "allow_exceptions, "
3604  "certificate, "
3605  "ssl_required, "
3606  "account_name, "
3607  "account_password, "
3608  "transport, "
3609  "orientation, "
3610  "ssl_control_string) "
3611  "VALUES "
3612  "(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, "
3613  "?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)");
3614 
3615  query.bindValue(0, QVariant(QVariant::String));
3616  query.bindValue(1, QVariant(QVariant::String));
3617  query.bindValue
3618  (2, crypt->
3619  encryptedThenHashed(protocol.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3620 
3621  if(ip.isEmpty())
3622  query.bindValue
3623  (3, crypt->
3624  encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(), &ok).toBase64());
3625  else if(transport != "bluetooth")
3626  {
3627  ip = spoton_misc::massageIpForUi(ip, protocol);
3628 
3629  if(ok)
3630  query.bindValue
3631  (3, crypt->
3632  encryptedThenHashed(ip.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3633  }
3634  else
3635  {
3636  if(ok)
3637  query.bindValue
3638  (3, crypt->
3639  encryptedThenHashed(ip.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3640  }
3641 
3642  if(ok)
3643  query.bindValue
3644  (4, crypt->
3645  encryptedThenHashed(port.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3646 
3647  query.bindValue(5, 1); // Sticky.
3648 
3649  if(ok)
3650  query.bindValue
3651  (6, crypt->
3652  encryptedThenHashed(scopeId.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3653 
3654  if(m_ui.proxy->isChecked() && m_ui.proxy->isEnabled())
3655  {
3656  proxyHostName = m_ui.proxyHostname->text().trimmed();
3657  proxyPort = QString::number(m_ui.proxyPort->value());
3658  }
3659 
3660  if(ok)
3661  query.bindValue
3662  (7, crypt->
3663  keyedHash((proxyHostName + proxyPort + ip + port + scopeId +
3664  transport).toLatin1(), &ok).
3665  toBase64());
3666 
3667  query.bindValue(8, status);
3668 
3669  QString country("Unknown");
3670 
3671  if(transport != "bluetooth")
3672  country = spoton_misc::countryNameFromIPAddress(ip);
3673 
3674  if(ok)
3675  query.bindValue
3676  (9, crypt->
3677  encryptedThenHashed(country.toLatin1(), &ok).toBase64());
3678 
3679  if(ok)
3680  query.bindValue
3681  (10, crypt->keyedHash(ip.toLatin1(), &ok).
3682  toBase64());
3683 
3684  if(ok)
3685  query.bindValue
3686  (11, crypt->
3687  keyedHash(country.remove(" ").toLatin1(), &ok).
3688  toBase64());
3689 
3690  if(m_ui.proxy->isChecked() && m_ui.proxy->isEnabled())
3691  proxyPassword = m_ui.proxyPassword->text();
3692 
3693  if(m_ui.proxy->isChecked() && m_ui.proxy->isEnabled())
3694  {
3695  /*
3696  ** Avoid translation mishaps.
3697  */
3698 
3699  if(m_ui.proxyType->currentIndex() == 0)
3700  proxyType = "HTTP";
3701  else if(m_ui.proxyType->currentIndex() == 1)
3702  proxyType = "Socks5";
3703  else
3704  proxyType = "System";
3705  }
3706  else
3707  proxyType = "NoProxy";
3708 
3709  if(m_ui.proxy->isChecked() && m_ui.proxy->isEnabled())
3710  proxyUsername = m_ui.proxyUsername->text();
3711 
3712  if(ok)
3713  query.bindValue
3714  (12, crypt->
3715  encryptedThenHashed(proxyHostName.toLatin1(), &ok).
3716  toBase64());
3717 
3718  if(ok)
3719  query.bindValue
3720  (13, crypt->
3721  encryptedThenHashed(proxyPassword.toUtf8(), &ok).
3722  toBase64());
3723 
3724  if(ok)
3725  query.bindValue
3726  (14, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(proxyPort.toLatin1(),
3727  &ok).toBase64());
3728 
3729  if(ok)
3730  query.bindValue
3731  (15, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(proxyType.toLatin1(), &ok).
3732  toBase64());
3733 
3734  if(ok)
3735  query.bindValue
3736  (16, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(proxyUsername.toUtf8(), &ok).
3737  toBase64());
3738 
3739  if(ok)
3740  query.bindValue
3741  (17, crypt->
3742  encryptedThenHashed("{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}",
3743  &ok).toBase64());
3744 
3745  if(ok)
3746  {
3747  if(m_ui.neighborsEchoMode->currentIndex() == 0)
3748  query.bindValue
3749  (18, crypt->
3750  encryptedThenHashed("full", &ok).toBase64());
3751  else
3752  query.bindValue
3753  (18, crypt->
3754  encryptedThenHashed("half", &ok).toBase64());
3755  }
3756 
3757  if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3758  {
3759  if(m_ui.requireSsl->isChecked())
3760  query.bindValue
3761  (19, m_ui.neighborKeySize->currentText().toInt());
3762  else
3763  query.bindValue(19, 0);
3764  }
3765  else
3766  query.bindValue(19, 0);
3767 
3768  if(m_ui.addException->isChecked() &&
3769  m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3770  query.bindValue(20, 1);
3771  else
3772  query.bindValue(20, 0);
3773 
3774  if(ok)
3775  query.bindValue
3776  (21, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(),
3777  &ok).toBase64());
3778 
3779  if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3780  query.bindValue(22, m_ui.requireSsl->isChecked() ? 1 : 0);
3781  else
3782  query.bindValue(22, 0);
3783 
3784  if(ok)
3785  query.bindValue
3786  (23, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(),
3787  &ok).toBase64());
3788 
3789  if(ok)
3790  query.bindValue
3791  (24, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(),
3792  &ok).toBase64());
3793 
3794  if(ok)
3795  {
3796  if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 0)
3797  query.bindValue
3798  (25, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("bluetooth", &ok).toBase64());
3799  else if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 1)
3800  query.bindValue
3801  (25, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("sctp", &ok).toBase64());
3802  else if(m_ui.neighborTransport->currentIndex() == 2)
3803  query.bindValue
3804  (25, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("tcp", &ok).toBase64());
3805  else
3806  query.bindValue
3807  (25, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("udp", &ok).toBase64());
3808  }
3809 
3810  if(ok)
3811  {
3812  if(m_ui.neighborOrientation->currentIndex() == 0)
3813  query.bindValue
3814  (26, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("packet", &ok).toBase64());
3815  else
3816  query.bindValue
3817  (26, crypt->encryptedThenHashed("stream", &ok).toBase64());
3818  }
3819 
3820  if(sslCS.isEmpty())
3821  sslCS = spoton_common::SSL_CONTROL_STRING;
3822 
3823  if(!m_ui.requireSsl->isChecked() || transport != "tcp")
3824  sslCS = "N/A";
3825 
3826  query.bindValue(27, sslCS);
3827 
3828  if(ok)
3829  ok = query.exec();
3830 
3831  if(query.lastError().isValid())
3832  error = query.lastError().text().trimmed();
3833  }
3834  else
3835  {
3836  ok = false;
3837 
3838  if(db.lastError().isValid())
3839  error = db.lastError().text().trimmed();
3840  }
3841 
3842  db.close();
3843  }
3844 
3845  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
3846 
3847  if(ok)
3848  m_ui.neighborIP->selectAll();
3849  else if(error.isEmpty())
3850  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
3851  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3852  tr("Unable to add the specified neighbor. "
3853  "Please enable logging via the Log Viewer "
3854  "and try again."));
3855  else
3856  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
3857  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
3858  tr("An error (%1) occurred while attempting "
3859  "to add the specified neighbor. "
3860  "Please enable logging via the Log Viewer "
3861  "and try again.").arg(error));
3862 }
3863 
3864 void spoton::slotHideOfflineParticipants(bool state)
3865 {
3866  m_settings["gui/hideOfflineParticipants"] = state;
3867 
3868  QSettings settings;
3869 
3870  settings.setValue("gui/hideOfflineParticipants", state);
3871  m_participantsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
3872 }
3873 
3874 void spoton::slotProtocolRadioToggled(bool state)
3875 {
3876  Q_UNUSED(state);
3877 
3878  QRadioButton *radio = qobject_cast<QRadioButton *> (sender());
3879 
3880  if(!radio)
3881  return;
3882 
3883  if(radio == m_ui.dynamicdns)
3884  {
3885  m_ui.neighborIP->clear();
3886  m_ui.neighborIP->setInputMask("");
3887  m_ui.neighborScopeId->setEnabled(true);
3888  m_ui.neighborScopeIdLabel->setEnabled(true);
3889  }
3890  else if(radio == m_ui.ipv4Listener || radio == m_ui.ipv4Neighbor)
3891  {
3892  if(radio == m_ui.ipv4Listener)
3893  {
3894  m_ui.listenerIP->clear();
3895  m_ui.listenerIP->setInputMask("");
3896  m_ui.listenerScopeId->setEnabled(false);
3897  m_ui.listenerScopeIdLabel->setEnabled(false);
3898  }
3899  else
3900  {
3901  m_ui.neighborIP->clear();
3902  m_ui.neighborIP->setInputMask("");
3903  m_ui.neighborScopeId->setEnabled(false);
3904  m_ui.neighborScopeIdLabel->setEnabled(false);
3905  }
3906  }
3907  else
3908  {
3909  if(radio == m_ui.ipv6Listener)
3910  {
3911  m_ui.listenerIP->clear();
3912  m_ui.listenerIP->setInputMask("");
3913  m_ui.listenerScopeId->setEnabled(true);
3914  m_ui.listenerScopeIdLabel->setEnabled(true);
3915  }
3916  else
3917  {
3918  m_ui.neighborIP->clear();
3919  m_ui.neighborIP->setInputMask("");
3920  m_ui.neighborScopeId->setEnabled(true);
3921  m_ui.neighborScopeIdLabel->setEnabled(true);
3922  }
3923  }
3924 
3925  prepareListenerIPCombo();
3926 }
3927 
3928 void spoton::slotScramble(bool state)
3929 {
3930  m_settings["gui/scramblerEnabled"] = state;
3931 
3932  QSettings settings;
3933 
3934  settings.setValue("gui/scramblerEnabled", state);
3935 }
3936 
3937 void spoton::slotPopulateListeners(void)
3938 {
3939 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
3940  if(m_ui.listenersTemporarilyPause->isChecked())
3941  return;
3942 #endif
3943 
3944  if(currentTabName() != "listeners")
3945  return;
3946 
3947  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
3948 
3949  if(!crypt)
3950  return;
3951 
3952  QFileInfo fileInfo(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
3953  "listeners.db");
3954 
3955  if(fileInfo.exists())
3956  {
3957  if(fileInfo.lastModified() >= m_listenersLastModificationTime)
3958  {
3959  if(fileInfo.lastModified() == m_listenersLastModificationTime)
3960  m_listenersLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified().
3961  addMSecs(1);
3962  else
3963  m_listenersLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified();
3964  }
3965  else
3966  return;
3967  }
3968  else
3969  m_listenersLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
3970 
3971  QString connectionName("");
3972 
3973  {
3974  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
3975 
3976  db.setDatabaseName(fileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
3977 
3978  if(db.open())
3979  {
3980  disconnect(m_ui.listeners,
3981  SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)),
3982  this,
3983  SLOT(slotListenerChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)));
3984  updateListenersTable(db);
3985 
3986  QModelIndexList list;
3987  QString ip("");
3988  QString port("");
3989  QString scopeId("");
3990  QString transportS("");
3991  QWidget *focusWidget = QApplication::focusWidget();
3992  int columnIP = 3;
3993  int columnPORT = 4;
3994  int columnSCOPE_ID = 5;
3995  int columnTRANSPORT = 15;
3996  int hval = m_ui.listeners->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
3997  int row = -1;
3998  int vval = m_ui.listeners->verticalScrollBar()->value();
3999 
4000  list = m_ui.listeners->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4001  (columnIP);
4002 
4003  if(!list.isEmpty())
4004  ip = list.at(0).data().toString();
4005 
4006  list = m_ui.listeners->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4007  (columnPORT);
4008 
4009  if(!list.isEmpty())
4010  port = list.at(0).data().toString();
4011 
4012  list = m_ui.listeners->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4013  (columnSCOPE_ID);
4014 
4015  if(!list.isEmpty())
4016  scopeId = list.at(0).data().toString();
4017 
4018  list = m_ui.listeners->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4019  (columnTRANSPORT);
4020 
4021  if(!list.isEmpty())
4022  transportS = list.at(0).data().toString();
4023 
4024  m_ui.listeners->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
4025  m_ui.listeners->setSortingEnabled(false);
4026  m_ui.listeners->clearContents();
4027  m_ui.listeners->setRowCount(0);
4028 
4029  QSqlQuery query(db);
4030  int totalRows = 0;
4031 
4032  query.setForwardOnly(true);
4033  query.exec("PRAGMA read_uncommitted = True");
4034 
4035  if(query.exec("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM listeners "
4036  "WHERE status_control <> 'deleted'"))
4037  if(query.next())
4038  m_ui.listeners->setRowCount(query.value(0).toInt());
4039 
4040  if(query.exec("SELECT "
4041  "status_control, "
4042  "status, "
4043  "ssl_key_size, "
4044  "ip_address, "
4045  "port, "
4046  "scope_id, "
4047  "protocol, "
4048  "external_ip_address, "
4049  "external_port, "
4050  "connections, "
4051  "maximum_clients, "
4052  "echo_mode, "
4053  "use_accounts, "
4054  "maximum_buffer_size, "
4055  "maximum_content_length, "
4056  "transport, "
4057  "share_udp_address, "
4058  "certificate, "
4059  "orientation, "
4060  "ssl_control_string, "
4061  "lane_width, "
4062  "passthrough, "
4063  "source_of_randomness, "
4064  "private_application_credentials, "
4065  "OID "
4066  "FROM listeners WHERE status_control <> 'deleted'"))
4067  {
4068  QLocale locale;
4069 
4070  row = 0;
4071 
4072  while(query.next() && totalRows < m_ui.listeners->rowCount())
4073  {
4074  totalRows += 1;
4075 
4076  QByteArray certificateDigest;
4077  QString tooltip("");
4078  QString transport("");
4079  bool ok = true;
4080 
4081  certificateDigest = crypt->
4082  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4083  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(17).toByteArray()),
4084  &ok);
4085 
4086  if(!ok)
4087  {
4088  certificateDigest.clear();
4089  certificateDigest.append(tr("error"));
4090  }
4091 
4092  if(ok)
4093  if(!certificateDigest.isEmpty())
4094  {
4095  certificateDigest = spoton_crypt::
4096  sha512Hash(certificateDigest, &ok).toHex();
4097 
4098  if(!ok)
4099  certificateDigest.clear();
4100  }
4101 
4102  if(ok)
4103  transport = QString(crypt->
4104  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4105  (QByteArray::
4106  fromBase64(query.
4107  value(15).
4108  toByteArray()),
4109  &ok).
4110  constData()).toUpper();
4111 
4112  tooltip = QString
4113  (tr("Status: %1\n"
4114  "Bluetooth Flags / SSL Key Size: %2\n"
4115  "Local IP: %3 Local Port: %4 Scope ID: %5\n"
4116  "External IP: %6\n"
4117  "Connections: %7\n"
4118  "Echo Mode: %8\n"
4119  "Use Accounts: %9\n"
4120  "Transport: %10\n"
4121  "Share Address: %11\n"
4122  "Orientation: %12\n"
4123  "SSL Control String: %13\n"
4124  "Lane Width: %14\n"
4125  "Passthrough: %15\n"
4126  "Source of Randomness: %16")).
4127  arg(query.value(1).toString().toLower()).
4128  arg(query.value(2).toString()).
4129  arg(crypt->
4130  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4131  fromBase64(query.
4132  value(3).
4133  toByteArray()),
4134  &ok).
4135  constData()).
4136  arg(crypt->
4137  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4138  fromBase64(query.
4139  value(4).
4140  toByteArray()),
4141  &ok).
4142  constData()).
4143  arg(crypt->
4144  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4145  fromBase64(query.
4146  value(5).
4147  toByteArray()),
4148  &ok).
4149  constData()).
4150  arg(crypt->
4151  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4152  fromBase64(query.
4153  value(7).
4154  toByteArray()),
4155  &ok).
4156  constData()).
4157  arg(query.value(9).toString()).
4158  arg(crypt->
4159  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4160  fromBase64(query.
4161  value(11).
4162  toByteArray()),
4163  &ok).
4164  constData()).
4165  arg(query.value(12).toLongLong() ? tr("Yes") : tr("No")).
4166  arg(transport).
4167  arg(query.value(16).toLongLong() ? tr("Yes") : tr("No")).
4168  arg(crypt->
4169  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4170  fromBase64(query.
4171  value(18).
4172  toByteArray()),
4173  &ok).
4174  constData()).
4175  arg(query.value(19).toString()).
4176  arg(locale.toString(query.value(20).toInt())).
4177  arg(query.value(21).toInt() ? tr("Yes") : tr("No")).
4178  arg(locale.toString(query.value(22).toInt()));
4179 
4180  for(int i = 0; i < query.record().count(); i++)
4181  {
4182  QTableWidgetItem *item = 0;
4183 
4184  if(i == 0 || i == 12)
4185  {
4186  item = new QTableWidgetItem();
4187  item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsEnabled |
4188  Qt::ItemIsSelectable |
4189  Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable);
4190 
4191  if(i == 0)
4192  {
4193  if(query.value(0).toString().
4194  toLower() == "online")
4195  item->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
4196  else
4197  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
4198  }
4199  else
4200  {
4201  if(query.value(i).toBool())
4202  item->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
4203  else
4204  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
4205  }
4206  }
4207  else if(i == 2)
4208  {
4209  if(transport.toLower() == "bluetooth")
4210  {
4211 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x050200 && defined(SPOTON_BLUETOOTH_ENABLED)
4212  QComboBox *box = new QComboBox();
4213  QList<QBluetooth::Security> items;
4214  QMap<QBluetooth::Security, QString> map;
4215  QMap<QBluetooth::SecurityFlags,
4216  QString> possibilities;
4217  QMap<QString, char> values;
4218 
4219  items << QBluetooth::Authentication
4220  << QBluetooth::Authorization
4221  << QBluetooth::Encryption
4222  << QBluetooth::Secure;
4223  map[QBluetooth::Authentication] = "Authentication";
4224  map[QBluetooth::Authorization] = "Authorization";
4225  map[QBluetooth::Encryption] = "Encryption";
4226  map[QBluetooth::Secure] = "Secure";
4227 
4228  for(int ii = 0; ii < items.size(); ii++)
4229  {
4230  possibilities.insert
4231  (items.at(ii), map[items.at(ii)]);
4232 
4233  for(int jj = 0; jj < items.size(); jj++)
4234  {
4235  if(ii == jj)
4236  continue;
4237 
4238  if(!possibilities.
4239  contains((items.at(ii) | items.at(jj))))
4240  possibilities.insert
4241  ((items.at(ii) |
4242  items.at(jj)),
4243  map[items.at(ii)] + ", " +
4244  map[items.at(jj)]);
4245 
4246  for(int kk = 0; kk < items.size(); kk++)
4247  {
4248  if(ii == kk ||
4249  jj == kk)
4250  continue;
4251 
4252  if(!possibilities.
4253  contains((items.at(ii) |
4254  items.at(jj) |
4255  items.at(kk))))
4256  possibilities.insert
4257  ((items.at(ii) |
4258  items.at(jj) |
4259  items.at(kk)),
4260  map[items.at(ii)] + ", " +
4261  map[items.at(jj)] + ", " +
4262  map[items.at(kk)]);
4263 
4264  for(int ll = 0; ll < items.size();
4265  ll++)
4266  {
4267  if(ii == ll ||
4268  jj == ll ||
4269  kk == ll)
4270  continue;
4271 
4272  if(!possibilities.
4273  contains((items.at(ii) |
4274  items.at(jj) |
4275  items.at(kk) |
4276  items.at(ll))))
4277  possibilities.insert
4278  ((items.at(ii) |
4279  items.at(jj) |
4280  items.at(kk) |
4281  items.at(ll)),
4282  map[items.at(ii)] + ", " +
4283  map[items.at(jj)] + ", " +
4284  map[items.at(kk)] + ", " +
4285  map[items.at(ll)]);
4286  }
4287  }
4288  }
4289  }
4290 
4291  values.insert(" 0", 0);
4292 
4293  for(int ii = 0; ii < possibilities.size(); ii++)
4294  values.insert
4295  (QString::
4296  number(possibilities.keys().at(ii)).
4297  rightJustified(2, ' ') + " " +
4298  possibilities.values().at(ii), 0);
4299 
4300  box->addItems(values.keys());
4301  box->setCurrentIndex
4302  (query.value(i).toInt());
4303 
4304  if(box->currentIndex() < 0)
4305  box->setCurrentIndex(0);
4306 
4307  box->setProperty
4308  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
4309  connect(box,
4310  SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
4311  this,
4312  SLOT(slotBluetoothSecurityChanged(int)));
4313  m_ui.listeners->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
4314 #else
4315  item = new QTableWidgetItem
4316  (query.value(i).toString());
4317 
4318  if(item->text().toInt() == 0)
4319  item->setBackground
4320  (QBrush(QColor(240, 128, 128)));
4321  else
4322  item->setBackground(QBrush());
4323 #endif
4324  }
4325  else
4326  {
4327  if(query.value(i).toLongLong() == 0)
4328  {
4329  item = new QTableWidgetItem("0");
4330  item->setBackground
4331  (QBrush(QColor(240, 128, 128)));
4332  }
4333  else
4334  {
4335  item = new QTableWidgetItem
4336  (query.value(i).toString());
4337  item->setBackground(QBrush());
4338  }
4339  }
4340  }
4341  else if(i == 10)
4342  {
4343  QComboBox *box = new QComboBox();
4344 
4345  if(transport != "UDP")
4346  {
4347  box->setProperty
4348  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
4349  box->addItem("1");
4350 
4351  for(int j = 1; j <= 10; j++)
4352  box->addItem(QString::number(5 * j));
4353 
4354  box->addItem(tr("Unlimited"));
4355  box->setMaximumWidth
4356  (box->fontMetrics().width(tr("Unlimited")) + 50);
4357  m_ui.listeners->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
4358 
4359  if(query.value(i).toLongLong() <= 0)
4360  box->setCurrentIndex(box->count() - 1);
4361  else if(box->findText(QString::
4362  number(query.
4363  value(i).
4364  toLongLong())) >= 0)
4365  box->setCurrentIndex
4366  (box->findText(QString::number(query.
4367  value(i).
4368  toLongLong())));
4369  else
4370  box->setCurrentIndex(1); // Default of five.
4371 
4372  connect(box,
4373  SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
4374  this,
4375  SLOT(slotMaximumClientsChanged(int)));
4376  }
4377  else
4378  {
4379  box->addItem(tr("Unlimited"));
4380  box->setMaximumWidth
4381  (box->fontMetrics().width(tr("Unlimited")) + 50);
4382  box->setEnabled(false);
4383  m_ui.listeners->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
4384  }
4385  }
4386  else if(i == 13 || i == 14)
4387  {
4388  // maximum_buffer_size
4389  // maximum_content_length
4390 
4391  QSpinBox *box = new QSpinBox();
4392 
4393  if(i == 13)
4394  {
4395  box->setMaximum
4396  (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE);
4397  box->setMinimum
4398  (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
4399  }
4400  else
4401  box->setMaximum
4402  (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
4403 
4404  box->setCorrectionMode
4405  (QAbstractSpinBox::CorrectToNearestValue);
4406  box->setWrapping(true);
4407  box->setMaximumWidth
4408  (box->fontMetrics().
4409  width(QString::
4410  number(spoton_common::
4411  MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE)) + 50);
4412  box->setProperty
4413  ("field_name", query.record().fieldName(i));
4414  box->setProperty
4415  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
4416  box->setToolTip(tooltip);
4417  box->setValue
4418  (static_cast<int> (query.value(i).toLongLong()));
4419  connect(box,
4420  SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
4421  this,
4422  SLOT(slotListenerMaximumChanged(int)));
4423  m_ui.listeners->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
4424  }
4425  else if(i == 17) // Certificate Digest
4426  item = new QTableWidgetItem
4427  (certificateDigest.constData());
4428  else if(i == 20) // Lane Width
4429  {
4430  QComboBox *box = new QComboBox();
4431  QList<int> list;
4432  QSet<int> set;
4433 
4434  for(int j = 0;
4435  j < spoton_common::LANE_WIDTHS.size(); j++)
4436  set << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTHS.at(j);
4437 
4438  set << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MINIMUM
4439  << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_DEFAULT
4440  << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MAXIMUM;
4441  list = set.toList();
4442  qSort(list);
4443 
4444  while(!list.isEmpty())
4445  box->addItem(QString::number(list.takeFirst()));
4446 
4447  box->setProperty
4448  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
4449  box->setProperty("table", "listeners");
4450  m_ui.listeners->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
4451 
4452  if(box->findText(QString::
4453  number(query.
4454  value(i).
4455  toInt())) >= 0)
4456  box->setCurrentIndex
4457  (box->findText(QString::number(query.
4458  value(i).
4459  toInt())));
4460  else
4461  box->setCurrentIndex(box->count() - 1); // Maximum.
4462 
4463  connect(box,
4464  SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
4465  this,
4466  SLOT(slotLaneWidthChanged(int)));
4467  }
4468  else if(i == 21) // Passthrough
4469  {
4470  item = new QTableWidgetItem();
4471  item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsEnabled |
4472  Qt::ItemIsSelectable |
4473  Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable);
4474 
4475  if(query.value(i).toBool())
4476  item->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
4477  else
4478  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
4479  }
4480  else if(i == 22) // Source of Randomness
4481  {
4482  QSpinBox *box = new QSpinBox();
4483 
4484  box->setMaximum(std::numeric_limits<unsigned short>::
4485  max());
4486  box->setMaximumWidth
4487  (box->fontMetrics().
4488  width(QString::
4489  number(box->maximum())) + 50);
4490  box->setMinimum(0);
4491  box->setProperty
4492  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
4493  box->setToolTip(tooltip);
4494  box->setValue(query.value(i).toInt());
4495  connect
4496  (box,
4497  SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
4498  this,
4499  SLOT(slotListenerSourceOfRandomnessChanged(int)));
4500  m_ui.listeners->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
4501  }
4502  else
4503  {
4504  if((i >= 3 && i <= 7) ||
4505  i == 11 || i == 15 || i == 18 || i == 23)
4506  {
4507  if(query.isNull(i))
4508  item = new QTableWidgetItem();
4509  else
4510  {
4511  item = new QTableWidgetItem
4512  (crypt->
4513  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4514  (QByteArray::
4515  fromBase64(query.
4516  value(i).
4517  toByteArray()),
4518  &ok).
4519  constData());
4520 
4521  if(!ok)
4522  item->setText(tr("error"));
4523  }
4524  }
4525  else
4526  item = new QTableWidgetItem
4527  (query.value(i).toString());
4528  }
4529 
4530  if(item)
4531  {
4532  if(!(i == 0 || i == 12 || i == 21))
4533  item->setFlags
4534  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
4535 
4536  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
4537  m_ui.listeners->setItem(row, i, item);
4538 
4539  if(i == 1)
4540  {
4541  if(query.value(i).toString().
4542  toLower() == "online")
4543  item->setBackground
4544  (QBrush(QColor("lightgreen")));
4545  else
4546  item->setBackground(QBrush());
4547  }
4548  }
4549  }
4550 
4551  QByteArray bytes1;
4552  QByteArray bytes2;
4553  QByteArray bytes3;
4554  QString bytes4("");
4555 
4556  ok = true;
4557  bytes1 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4558  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnIP).toByteArray()),
4559  &ok);
4560  bytes2 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4561  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnPORT).
4562  toByteArray()),
4563  &ok);
4564  bytes3 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4565  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnSCOPE_ID).
4566  toByteArray()),
4567  &ok);
4568  bytes4 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4569  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnTRANSPORT).
4570  toByteArray()),
4571  &ok).constData();
4572 
4573  if(ip == bytes1 && port == bytes2 && scopeId == bytes3 &&
4574  transportS == bytes4)
4575  m_ui.listeners->selectRow(row);
4576 
4577  row += 1;
4578  }
4579  }
4580 
4581  m_ui.listeners->setRowCount(totalRows);
4582  m_ui.listeners->setSortingEnabled(true);
4583 
4584  for(int i = 0; i < m_ui.listeners->columnCount() - 1; i++)
4585  /*
4586  ** Ignore the OID column.
4587  */
4588 
4589  m_ui.listeners->resizeColumnToContents(i);
4590 
4591  m_ui.listeners->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
4592  m_ui.listeners->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hval);
4593  m_ui.listeners->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vval);
4594  m_ui.listeners->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
4595  connect(m_ui.listeners,
4596  SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)),
4597  this,
4598  SLOT(slotListenerChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)));
4599 
4600  if(focusWidget)
4601  focusWidget->setFocus();
4602  }
4603 
4604  db.close();
4605  }
4606 
4607  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
4608  populateAETokens();
4609 }
4610 
4611 void spoton::slotPopulateNeighbors(void)
4612 {
4613 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
4614  if(m_ui.neighborsTemporarilyPause->isChecked())
4615  return;
4616 #endif
4617 
4618  if(currentTabName() != "neighbors")
4619  return;
4620 
4621  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
4622 
4623  if(!crypt)
4624  return;
4625 
4626  QFileInfo fileInfo(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
4627  "neighbors.db");
4628 
4629  if(fileInfo.exists())
4630  {
4631  if(fileInfo.lastModified() >= m_neighborsLastModificationTime)
4632  {
4633  if(fileInfo.lastModified() == m_neighborsLastModificationTime)
4634  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified().
4635  addMSecs(1);
4636  else
4637  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified();
4638  }
4639  else
4640  return;
4641  }
4642  else
4643  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
4644 
4645  QString connectionName("");
4646 
4647  {
4648  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
4649 
4650  db.setDatabaseName(fileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
4651 
4652  if(db.open())
4653  {
4654  disconnect(m_ui.neighbors,
4655  SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)),
4656  this,
4657  SLOT(slotNeighborChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)));
4658  updateNeighborsTable(db);
4659 
4660  QModelIndexList list;
4661  QString proxyIp("");
4662  QString proxyPort("1");
4663  QString remoteIp("");
4664  QString remotePort("");
4665  QString scopeId("");
4666  QString transport("");
4667  QWidget *focusWidget = QApplication::focusWidget();
4668  int columnCOUNTRY = 9;
4669  int columnPROXY_IP = 14;
4670  int columnPROXY_PORT = 15;
4671  int columnREMOTE_IP = 10;
4672  int columnREMOTE_PORT = 11;
4673  int columnSCOPE_ID = 12;
4674  int columnTRANSPORT = 27;
4675  int hval = m_ui.neighbors->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
4676  int row = -1;
4677  int vval = m_ui.neighbors->verticalScrollBar()->value();
4678 
4679  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4680  (columnPROXY_IP);
4681 
4682  if(!list.isEmpty())
4683  proxyIp = list.at(0).data().toString();
4684 
4685  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4686  (columnPROXY_PORT);
4687 
4688  if(!list.isEmpty())
4689  proxyPort = list.at(0).data().toString();
4690 
4691  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4692  (columnREMOTE_IP);
4693 
4694  if(!list.isEmpty())
4695  remoteIp = list.at(0).data().toString();
4696 
4697  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4698  (columnREMOTE_PORT);
4699 
4700  if(!list.isEmpty())
4701  remotePort = list.at(0).data().toString();
4702 
4703  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4704  (columnSCOPE_ID);
4705 
4706  if(!list.isEmpty())
4707  scopeId = list.at(0).data().toString();
4708 
4709  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
4710  (columnTRANSPORT);
4711 
4712  if(!list.isEmpty())
4713  transport = list.at(0).data().toString();
4714 
4715  m_neighborToOidMap.clear();
4716  m_ui.neighbors->setUpdatesEnabled(false);
4717  m_ui.neighbors->setSortingEnabled(false);
4718  m_ui.neighbors->clearContents();
4719  m_ui.neighbors->setRowCount(0);
4720 
4721  QSqlQuery query(db);
4722  int totalRows = 0;
4723 
4724  query.setForwardOnly(true);
4725  query.exec("PRAGMA read_uncommitted = True");
4726 
4727  if(query.exec("SELECT COUNT(*) "
4728  "FROM neighbors WHERE status_control <> 'deleted'"))
4729  if(query.next())
4730  m_ui.neighbors->setRowCount(query.value(0).toInt());
4731 
4732  if(query.exec("SELECT sticky, "
4733  "uuid, "
4734  "status, "
4735  "ssl_key_size, "
4736  "status_control, "
4737  "local_ip_address, "
4738  "local_port, "
4739  "external_ip_address, "
4740  "external_port, "
4741  "country, "
4742  "remote_ip_address, "
4743  "remote_port, "
4744  "scope_id, "
4745  "protocol, "
4746  "proxy_hostname, "
4747  "proxy_port, "
4748  "maximum_buffer_size, "
4749  "maximum_content_length, "
4750  "echo_mode, "
4751  "uptime, "
4752  "allow_exceptions, "
4753  "certificate, "
4754  "bytes_read, "
4755  "bytes_written, "
4756  "ssl_session_cipher, "
4757  "account_name, "
4758  "account_authenticated, "
4759  "transport, "
4760  "orientation, "
4761  "motd, "
4762  "is_encrypted, "
4763  "0, " // Certificate
4764  "ae_token, "
4765  "ae_token_type, "
4766  "ssl_control_string, "
4767  "priority, "
4768  "lane_width, "
4769  "passthrough, "
4770  "waitforbyteswritten_msecs, "
4771  "private_application_credentials, "
4772  "silence_time, "
4773  "OID "
4774  "FROM neighbors WHERE status_control <> 'deleted'"))
4775  {
4776  QLocale locale;
4777  QString localIp("");
4778  QString localPort("");
4779 
4780  row = 0;
4781 
4782  while(query.next() && totalRows < m_ui.neighbors->rowCount())
4783  {
4784  totalRows += 1;
4785 
4786  QByteArray certificate;
4787  QByteArray certificateDigest;
4788  QByteArray sslSessionCipher;
4789  QString priority("");
4790  QString tooltip("");
4791  bool isEncrypted = query.value
4792  (query.record().indexOf("is_encrypted")).toBool();
4793  bool ok = true;
4794 
4795  certificate = certificateDigest = crypt->
4796  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4797  fromBase64(query.
4798  value(21).
4799  toByteArray()),
4800  &ok);
4801 
4802  if(!ok)
4803  {
4804  certificate.clear();
4805  certificateDigest.clear();
4806  certificateDigest.append(tr("error"));
4807  }
4808 
4809  if(ok)
4810  {
4811  if(!certificate.isEmpty())
4812  certificate = certificate.toBase64();
4813 
4814  if(!certificateDigest.isEmpty())
4815  {
4816  certificateDigest = spoton_crypt::
4817  sha512Hash(certificateDigest, &ok).toHex();
4818 
4819  if(!ok)
4820  certificateDigest.clear();
4821  }
4822  }
4823 
4824  if(!query.isNull(24))
4825  {
4826  sslSessionCipher = crypt->
4827  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4828  fromBase64(query.
4829  value(24).
4830  toByteArray()),
4831  &ok);
4832 
4833  if(!ok)
4834  {
4835  sslSessionCipher.clear();
4836  sslSessionCipher.append(tr("error"));
4837  }
4838  }
4839 
4840  priority = query.value(35).toString().trimmed();
4841 
4842  if(priority.toInt() == 0)
4843  priority = "Idle Priority";
4844  else if(priority.toInt() == 1)
4845  priority = "Lowest Priority";
4846  else if(priority.toInt() == 2)
4847  priority = "Low Priority";
4848  else if(priority.toInt() == 3)
4849  priority = "Normal Priority";
4850  else if(priority.toInt() == 4)
4851  priority = "High Priority";
4852  else if(priority.toInt() == 5)
4853  priority = "Highest Priority";
4854  else if(priority.toInt() == 6)
4855  priority = "Time-Critical Priority";
4856  else if(priority.toInt() == 7)
4857  priority = "Inherit Priority";
4858  else
4859  priority = "High Priority";
4860 
4861  tooltip =
4862  (tr("UUID: %1\n"
4863  "Status: %2\n"
4864  "SSL Key Size: %3\n"
4865  "Local IP: %4 Local Port: %5\n"
4866  "External IP: %6\n"
4867  "Country: %7 Remote IP: %8 Remote Port: %9 "
4868  "Scope ID: %10\n"
4869  "Proxy Hostname: %11 Proxy Port: %12\n"
4870  "Echo Mode: %13\n"
4871  "Communications Mode: %14\n"
4872  "Uptime: %15 Minutes\n"
4873  "Allow Certificate Exceptions: %16\n"
4874  "Bytes Read: %17\n"
4875  "Bytes Written: %18\n"
4876  "SSL Session Cipher: %19\n"
4877  "Account Name: %20\n"
4878  "Account Authenticated: %21\n"
4879  "Transport: %22\n"
4880  "Orientation: %23\n"
4881  "SSL Control String: %24\n"
4882  "Priority: %25\n"
4883  "Lane Width: %26\n"
4884  "Passthrough: %27\n"
4885  "Wait-For-Bytes-Written: %28\n"
4886  "Silence Time: %29")).
4887  arg(crypt->
4888  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4889  fromBase64(query.
4890  value(1).
4891  toByteArray()),
4892  &ok).
4893  constData()).
4894  arg(query.value(2).toString().toLower()).
4895  arg(query.value(3).toString()).
4896  arg(query.value(5).toString()).
4897  arg(query.value(6).toString()).
4898  arg(crypt->
4899  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4900  fromBase64(query.
4901  value(7).
4902  toByteArray()),
4903  &ok).
4904  constData()).
4905  arg(crypt->
4906  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4907  fromBase64(query.
4908  value(9).
4909  toByteArray()),
4910  &ok).
4911  constData()).
4912  arg(crypt->
4913  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4914  fromBase64(query.
4915  value(10).
4916  toByteArray()),
4917  &ok).
4918  constData()).
4919  arg(crypt->
4920  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4921  fromBase64(query.
4922  value(11).
4923  toByteArray()),
4924  &ok).
4925  constData()).
4926  arg(crypt->
4927  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4928  fromBase64(query.
4929  value(12).
4930  toByteArray()),
4931  &ok).
4932  constData()).
4933  arg(crypt->
4934  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4935  fromBase64(query.
4936  value(14).
4937  toByteArray()),
4938  &ok).
4939  constData()).
4940  arg(crypt->
4941  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4942  fromBase64(query.
4943  value(15).
4944  toByteArray()),
4945  &ok).
4946  constData()).
4947  arg(crypt->
4948  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4949  fromBase64(query.
4950  value(18).
4951  toByteArray()),
4952  &ok).
4953  constData()).
4954  arg(isEncrypted ? "Secure" : "Insecure").
4955  arg(QString::
4956  number(static_cast<double> (query.value(19).
4957  toLongLong()) /
4958  60.00, 'f', 1)).
4959  arg(query.value(21).toLongLong() ? tr("Yes") : tr("No")).
4960  /*
4961  ** Bytes read.
4962  */
4963  arg(locale.toString(query.value(22).toULongLong())).
4964  /*
4965  ** Bytes written.
4966  */
4967  arg(locale.toString(query.value(23).toULongLong())).
4968  arg(sslSessionCipher.constData()).
