4970  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4971  fromBase64(query.
4972  value(25).
4973  toByteArray()),
4974  &ok).
4975  constData()).
4976  arg(crypt->
4977  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4978  (QByteArray::
4979  fromBase64(query.
4980  value(26).
4981  toByteArray()),
4982  &ok).toLongLong() ? tr("Yes"): tr("No")).
4983  arg(QString(crypt->
4984  decryptedAfterAuthenticated
4985  (QByteArray::
4986  fromBase64(query.
4987  value(27).
4988  toByteArray()),
4989  &ok).
4990  constData()).toUpper()).
4991  arg(crypt->
4992  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
4993  fromBase64(query.
4994  value(28).
4995  toByteArray()),
4996  &ok).
4997  constData()).
4998  arg(query.value(34).toString()).
4999  arg(priority).
5000  arg(locale.toString(query.value(36).toInt())).
5001  arg(query.value(37).toInt() ? tr("Yes") : tr("No")).
5002  arg(locale.toString(query.value(38).toInt())).
5003  arg(query.value(40).toInt());
5004 
5005  {
5006  QTableWidgetItem *item = new QTableWidgetItem();
5007 
5008  if(query.value(0).toBool())
5009  item->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
5010  else
5011  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
5012 
5013  item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsEnabled |
5014  Qt::ItemIsSelectable |
5015  Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable);
5016  item->setToolTip(tr("The sticky feature enables an "
5017  "indefinite lifetime for a neighbor.\n"
5018  "If "
5019  "not checked, the neighbor will be "
5020  "terminated after some internal "
5021  "timer expires."));
5022  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, 0, item);
5023  }
5024 
5025  for(int i = 1; i < query.record().count(); i++)
5026  {
5027  QTableWidgetItem *item = 0;
5028 
5029  if(i == 1 || i == 3 ||
5030  i == 7 || (i >= 9 && i <= 13) || (i >= 14 &&
5031  i <= 15) ||
5032  i == 18 || i == 25 || i == 27 || i == 28 ||
5033  i == 32 || i == 33 || i == 39)
5034  {
5035  if(query.isNull(i))
5036  item = new QTableWidgetItem();
5037  else
5038  {
5039  QByteArray bytes;
5040 
5041  if(i != 3) // SSL Key Size
5042  {
5043  bytes = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5044  (QByteArray::
5045  fromBase64(query.
5046  value(i).
5047  toByteArray()),
5048  &ok);
5049 
5050  if(!ok)
5051  {
5052  bytes.clear();
5053  bytes.append(tr("error"));
5054  }
5055  }
5056 
5057  if(i == 1) // uuid
5058  {
5059  if(bytes.isEmpty())
5060  bytes =
5061  "{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000}";
5062  }
5063  else if(i == 3) // SSL Key Size
5064  {
5065  if(query.value(i).toLongLong() == 0)
5066  {
5067  item = new QTableWidgetItem("0");
5068  item->setBackground
5069  (QBrush(QColor(240, 128, 128)));
5070  }
5071  else
5072  {
5073  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5074  (query.value(i).toString());
5075  item->setBackground(QBrush());
5076  }
5077  }
5078 
5079  if(i != 3) // SSL Key Size
5080  item = new QTableWidgetItem(bytes.constData());
5081  }
5082  }
5083  else if(i >= 16 && i <= 17)
5084  {
5085  // maximum_buffer_size
5086  // maximum_content_length
5087 
5088  QSpinBox *box = new QSpinBox();
5089 
5090  if(i == 16)
5091  {
5092  box->setMaximum
5093  (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE);
5094  box->setMinimum
5095  (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
5096  }
5097  else
5098  box->setMaximum
5099  (spoton_common::MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_CONTENT_LENGTH);
5100 
5101  box->setCorrectionMode
5102  (QAbstractSpinBox::CorrectToNearestValue);
5103  box->setWrapping(true);
5104  box->setMaximumWidth
5105  (box->fontMetrics().
5106  width(QString::
5107  number(spoton_common::
5108  MAXIMUM_NEIGHBOR_BUFFER_SIZE)) + 50);
5109  box->setProperty
5110  ("field_name", query.record().fieldName(i));
5111  box->setProperty
5112  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
5113  box->setToolTip(tooltip);
5114  box->setValue
5115  (static_cast<int> (query.value(i).toLongLong()));
5116  connect(box,
5117  SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
5118  this,
5119  SLOT(slotNeighborMaximumChanged(int)));
5120  m_ui.neighbors->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
5121 
5122  QTableWidgetItem *item = new QTableWidgetItem
5123  (QString::number(box->value()));
5124 
5125  item->setFlags
5126  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
5127  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
5128  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, i, item);
5129  }
5130  else if(i == 19) // uptime
5131  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5132  (locale.toString(query.value(i).toLongLong()));
5133  else if(i == 21) // Certificate Digest
5134  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5135  (certificateDigest.constData());
5136  else if(i == 22 || i == 23) // bytes_read, bytes_written
5137  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5138  (locale.toString(query.value(i).toLongLong()));
5139  else if(i == 24) // SSL Session Cipher
5140  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5141  (sslSessionCipher.constData());
5142  else if(i == 26) // Account Authenticated
5143  {
5144  if(!query.isNull(i))
5145  {
5146  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5147  (crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5148  (QByteArray::
5149  fromBase64(query.
5150  value(i).
5151  toByteArray()),
5152  &ok).constData());
5153 
5154  if(ok)
5155  {
5156  if(item->text() != "0")
5157  item->setBackground
5158  (QBrush(QColor("lightgreen")));
5159  else
5160  item->setBackground
5161  (QBrush(QColor(240, 128, 128)));
5162  }
5163  else
5164  {
5165  item->setText(tr("error"));
5166  item->setBackground
5167  (QBrush(QColor(240, 128, 128)));
5168  }
5169  }
5170  else
5171  {
5172  item = new QTableWidgetItem("0");
5173  item->setBackground
5174  (QBrush(QColor(240, 128, 128)));
5175  }
5176  }
5177  else if(i == 29) // MOTD
5178  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5179  (query.value(i).toString().trimmed());
5180  else if(i == 31) // Certificate
5181  item = new QTableWidgetItem(certificate.constData());
5182  else if(i == 35) // Priority
5183  item = new QTableWidgetItem(priority);
5184  else if(i == 36) // Lane Width
5185  {
5186  QComboBox *box = new QComboBox();
5187  QList<int> list;
5188  QSet<int> set;
5189 
5190  for(int j = 0;
5191  j < spoton_common::LANE_WIDTHS.size(); j++)
5192  set << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTHS.at(j);
5193 
5194  set << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MINIMUM
5195  << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_DEFAULT
5196  << spoton_common::LANE_WIDTH_MAXIMUM;
5197  list = set.toList();
5198  qSort(list);
5199 
5200  while(!list.isEmpty())
5201  box->addItem(QString::number(list.takeFirst()));
5202 
5203  box->setProperty
5204  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
5205  box->setProperty("table", "neighbors");
5206  box->setToolTip(tooltip);
5207  m_ui.neighbors->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
5208 
5209  if(box->findText(QString::
5210  number(query.
5211  value(i).
5212  toInt())) >= 0)
5213  box->setCurrentIndex
5214  (box->findText(QString::number(query.
5215  value(i).
5216  toInt())));
5217  else
5218  box->setCurrentIndex(box->count() - 1); // Maximum.
5219 
5220  connect(box,
5221  SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
5222  this,
5223  SLOT(slotLaneWidthChanged(int)));
5224 
5225  QTableWidgetItem *item = new QTableWidgetItem
5226  (box->currentText());
5227 
5228  item->setFlags
5229  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
5230  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
5231  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, i, item);
5232  }
5233  else if(i == 37) // Passthrough
5234  {
5235  QTableWidgetItem *item = new QTableWidgetItem();
5236 
5237  if(query.value(i).toBool())
5238  item->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
5239  else
5240  item->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
5241 
5242  item->setFlags(Qt::ItemIsEnabled |
5243  Qt::ItemIsSelectable |
5244  Qt::ItemIsUserCheckable);
5245  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
5246  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, i, item);
5247  }
5248  else if(i == 38) // Wait-For-Bytes-Written
5249  {
5250  QSpinBox *box = new QSpinBox();
5251 
5252  box->setCorrectionMode
5253  (QAbstractSpinBox::CorrectToNearestValue);
5254  box->setMaximum
5255  (spoton_common::
5256  WAIT_FOR_BYTES_WRITTEN_MSECS_MAXIMUM);
5257  box->setMaximumWidth
5258  (box->fontMetrics().
5259  width(QString::
5260  number(spoton_common::
5261  WAIT_FOR_BYTES_WRITTEN_MSECS_MAXIMUM))
5262  + 50);
5263  box->setMinimum(0);
5264  box->setProperty
5265  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
5266  box->setToolTip(tooltip);
5267  box->setValue
5268  (static_cast<int> (query.value(i).toInt()));
5269  box->setWrapping(true);
5270  connect
5271  (box,
5272  SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
5273  this,
5274  SLOT(slotNeighborWaitForBytesWrittenChanged(int)));
5275  m_ui.neighbors->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
5276 
5277  QTableWidgetItem *item = new QTableWidgetItem
5278  (QString::number(box->value()));
5279 
5280  item->setFlags
5281  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
5282  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
5283  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, i, item);
5284  }
5285  else if(i == 40) // Silence Time
5286  {
5287  QSpinBox *box = new QSpinBox();
5288 
5289  box->setCorrectionMode
5290  (QAbstractSpinBox::CorrectToNearestValue);
5291  box->setMaximum(std::numeric_limits<int>::max());
5292  box->setMaximumWidth
5293  (box->fontMetrics().
5294  width(QString::number(box->maximum())) + 50);
5295  box->setMinimum(5);
5296  box->setProperty
5297  ("oid", query.value(query.record().count() - 1));
5298  box->setToolTip(tooltip);
5299  box->setValue
5300  (static_cast<int> (query.value(i).toInt()));
5301  box->setWrapping(true);
5302  connect
5303  (box,
5304  SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
5305  this,
5306  SLOT(slotNeighborSilenceTimeChanged(int)));
5307  m_ui.neighbors->setCellWidget(row, i, box);
5308 
5309  QTableWidgetItem *item = new QTableWidgetItem
5310  (QString::number(box->value()));
5311 
5312  item->setFlags
5313  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
5314  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
5315  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, i, item);
5316  }
5317  else
5318  item = new QTableWidgetItem
5319  (query.value(i).toString());
5320 
5321  if(item)
5322  {
5323  item->setFlags
5324  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
5325 
5326  if(i == 2)
5327  {
5328  if(query.value(i).toString().
5329  toLower() == "connected")
5330  item->setBackground
5331  (QBrush(QColor("lightgreen")));
5332  else
5333  item->setBackground(QBrush());
5334 
5335  if(isEncrypted)
5336  item->setIcon
5337  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/lock.png").
5338  arg(m_settings.
5339  value("gui/iconSet",
5340  "nouve").toString().
5341  toLower())));
5342  }
5343 
5344  item->setToolTip(tooltip);
5345  m_ui.neighbors->setItem(row, i, item);
5346  }
5347  }
5348 
5349  QTableWidgetItem *item1 = m_ui.neighbors->item
5350  (row, columnCOUNTRY);
5351 
5352  if(item1)
5353  {
5354  QIcon icon;
5355  QPixmap pixmap;
5356  QString str("");
5357  QTableWidgetItem *item2 = m_ui.neighbors->item
5358  (row, columnREMOTE_IP);
5359 
5360  if(item2)
5361  str = QString(":/Flags/%1.png").
5362  arg(spoton_misc::
5363  countryCodeFromIPAddress(item2->text()).
5364  toLower());
5365  else
5366  str = ":/Flags/unknown.png";
5367 
5368  pixmap = QPixmap(str);
5369 
5370  if(!pixmap.isNull())
5371  pixmap = pixmap.scaled(QSize(16, 16),
5372  Qt::KeepAspectRatio,
5373  Qt::SmoothTransformation);
5374 
5375  if(!pixmap.isNull())
5376  icon = QIcon(pixmap);
5377 
5378  if(!icon.isNull())
5379  item1->setIcon(icon);
5380  }
5381 
5382  QByteArray bytes1;
5383  QByteArray bytes2;
5384  QByteArray bytes3;
5385  QByteArray bytes4;
5386  QByteArray bytes5;
5387  QString bytes6;
5388 
5389  ok = true;
5390  bytes1 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5391  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnREMOTE_IP).
5392  toByteArray()), &ok);
5393  bytes2 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5394  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnREMOTE_PORT).
5395  toByteArray()), &ok);
5396  bytes3 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5397  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnSCOPE_ID).
5398  toByteArray()), &ok);
5399  bytes4 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5400  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnPROXY_IP).
5401  toByteArray()), &ok);
5402  bytes5 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5403  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnPROXY_PORT).
5404  toByteArray()), &ok);
5405  bytes6 = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
5406  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(columnTRANSPORT).
5407  toByteArray()), &ok);
5408 
5409  if(remoteIp == bytes1 && remotePort == bytes2 &&
5410  scopeId == bytes3 && proxyIp == bytes4 &&
5411  proxyPort == bytes5 && transport == bytes6)
5412  m_ui.neighbors->selectRow(row);
5413 
5414  if(bytes3.isEmpty())
5415  m_neighborToOidMap.insert
5416  (bytes1 + ":" + bytes2,
5417  query.value(query.record().count() - 1).toString());
5418  else
5419  m_neighborToOidMap.insert
5420  (bytes1 + ":" + bytes2 + ":" + bytes3,
5421  query.value(query.record().count() - 1).toString());
5422 
5423  row += 1;
5424  }
5425 
5426  if(m_ui.neighbors->currentRow() == -1 || row == 0)
5427  m_ui.neighborSummary->clear();
5428  }
5429  else
5430  m_ui.neighborSummary->clear();
5431 
5432  m_ui.neighbors->setRowCount(totalRows);
5433  m_ui.neighbors->setSortingEnabled(true);
5434 
5435  for(int i = 0; i < m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1; i++)
5436  /*
5437  ** Ignore the OID column.
5438  */
5439 
5440  m_ui.neighbors->resizeColumnToContents(i);
5441 
5442  m_ui.neighbors->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
5443  m_ui.neighbors->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hval);
5444  m_ui.neighbors->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vval);
5445  m_ui.neighbors->setUpdatesEnabled(true);
5446  connect(m_ui.neighbors,
5447  SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)),
5448  this,
5449  SLOT(slotNeighborChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)));
5450 
5451  if(focusWidget)
5452  focusWidget->setFocus();
5453  }
5454 
5455  db.close();
5456  }
5457 
5458  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
5459 }
5460 
5461 void spoton::slotActivateKernel(void)
5462 {
5463  if(m_ui.pid->text().toLongLong() < 0) // Error.
5464  return;
5465  else if(!m_optionsUi.forceRegistration->isChecked())
5466  {
5467  if(m_ui.pid->text().toLongLong() > 0)
5468  return;
5469  }
5470 
5471  QFileInfo fileInfo(m_ui.kernelPath->text());
5472 
5473 #if defined(Q_OS_MAC)
5474  if((fileInfo.isBundle() || fileInfo.isExecutable()) && fileInfo.size() > 0)
5475 #elif defined(Q_OS_WIN32)
5476  if(fileInfo.isReadable() && fileInfo.size() > 0)
5477 #else
5478  if(fileInfo.isExecutable() && fileInfo.size() > 0)
5479 #endif
5480  {
5481  }
5482  else
5483  return; // Incorrect executable!
5484 
5485  m_ui.pid->setText("0");
5486 
5487  QColor color(240, 128, 128); // Light coral!
5488  QPalette palette(m_ui.pid->palette());
5489 
5490  palette.setColor(m_ui.pid->backgroundRole(), color);
5491  m_ui.pid->setPalette(palette);
5492  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
5493  m_sb.status->setText(tr("Launching the kernel. Please be patient."));
5494  m_sb.status->repaint();
5495 
5496  QString program(m_ui.kernelPath->text());
5497  bool status = false;
5498 
5499 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
5500  if(QFileInfo(program).isBundle())
5501  {
5502  QStringList list;
5503 
5504  list << "-a" << program << "-g";
5505  status = QProcess::startDetached("open", list);
5506  }
5507  else
5508  status = QProcess::startDetached(program);
5509 #elif defined(Q_OS_WIN32)
5510  status = QProcess::startDetached(QString("\"%1\"").arg(program));
5511 #else
5512  status = QProcess::startDetached(program);
5513 #endif
5514 
5515 #ifdef SPOTON_ALL
5516  QElapsedTimer time;
5517 
5518  time.start();
5519 #endif
5520 
5521  do
5522  {
5523 #ifndef Q_OS_MAC
5524  QApplication::processEvents();
5525 #endif
5526 
5527  if(m_ui.pid->text().toLongLong() > 0)
5528  break;
5529 #ifdef SPOTON_ALL
5530  else if(time.hasExpired(10000))
5531  break;
5532 #endif
5533  }
5534  while(true);
5535 
5536  m_sb.status->clear();
5537  m_sb.status->repaint();
5538  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
5539 
5540  if(status)
5541  {
5542  if(m_settings.value("gui/buzzAutoJoin", true).toBool())
5543  joinDefaultBuzzChannel();
5544  }
5545  else if(sender())
5546  QMessageBox::critical
5547  (this, tr("%1: Error").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
5548  tr("The kernel process could not be started. Good luck."));
5549 }
5550 
5551 void spoton::slotDeactivateKernel(void)
5552 {
5553  QString sharedPath(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
5554  "shared.db");
5555  libspoton_handle_t libspotonHandle;
5556 
5557  if(libspoton_init_b(sharedPath.toStdString().c_str(),
5558  0,
5559  0,
5560  0,
5561  0,
5562  0,
5563  0,
5564  0,
5565  &libspotonHandle,
5566  m_settings.value("gui/gcryctl_init_secmem",
5567  spoton_common::
5568  MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE).
5569  toInt()) == LIBSPOTON_ERROR_NONE)
5570  libspoton_deregister_kernel
5571  (libspoton_registered_kernel_pid(&libspotonHandle, 0),
5572  &libspotonHandle);
5573 
5574  libspoton_close(&libspotonHandle);
5575  m_kernelSocket.close();
5576 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
5577  m_ui.activateKernel->setStyleSheet("background-color: #ff717e;"
5578  "color: white;"
5579  "border-style: outset;"
5580  "border-width: 2px;"
5581  "border-radius: 10px;"
5582  "border-color: black;"
5583  "min-width: 5em;"
5584  "padding: 6px");
5585 #endif
5586  m_forwardSecrecyRequests.clear();
5587  m_sb.forward_secrecy_request->setProperty("public_key_hash", QVariant());
5588  m_sb.forward_secrecy_request->setToolTip("");
5589  m_sb.forward_secrecy_request->setVisible(false);
5590 }
5591 
5592 void spoton::slotGeneralTimerTimeout(void)
5593 {
5594  QColor color(240, 128, 128); // Light coral!
5595  QList<QStandardItem *> list(m_statisticsModel->findItems("Kernel PID"));
5596  QPalette pidPalette(m_ui.pid->palette());
5597  QStandardItem *item = 0;
5598  QString text(m_ui.pid->text());
5599 
5600  pidPalette.setColor(m_ui.pid->backgroundRole(), color);
5601 
5602  if(!list.isEmpty())
5603  {
5604  item = list.at(0);
5605 
5606  if(item)
5607  item = m_statisticsModel->item(item->row(), 1);
5608  }
5609 
5610  if(!item)
5611  {
5612  m_ui.pid->setPalette(pidPalette);
5613  m_ui.pid->setText("0");
5614  }
5615  else
5616  {
5617  QColor color(144, 238, 144); // Light green!
5618  QPalette palette(m_ui.pid->palette());
5619 
5620  palette.setColor(m_ui.pid->backgroundRole(), color);
5621  m_ui.pid->setPalette(palette);
5622  m_ui.pid->setText(item->text());
5623 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
5624  m_ui.activateKernel->setStyleSheet("background-color: lightgreen;"
5625  "border-style: outset;"
5626  "border-width: 2px;"
5627  "border-radius: 10px;"
5628  "border-color: black;"
5629  "min-width: 5em;"
5630  "padding: 6px");
5631 #endif
5632  }
5633 
5634  highlightPaths();
5635 
5636  if(text != m_ui.pid->text())
5637  {
5638  m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
5639  m_listenersLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
5640  m_magnetsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
5641  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
5642  m_participantsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
5643  }
5644 
5645  if(isKernelActive())
5646  if(m_kernelSocket.state() == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
5647  {
5648  QString connectionName("");
5649  quint16 port = 0;
5650 
5651  {
5652  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
5653 
5654  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
5655  "kernel.db");
5656 
5657  if(db.open())
5658  {
5659  QSqlQuery query(db);
5660 
5661  query.setForwardOnly(true);
5662 
5663  if(query.exec("SELECT port FROM kernel_gui_server"))
5664  if(query.next())
5665  port = query.value(0).toByteArray().toUShort();
5666  }
5667 
5668  db.close();
5669  }
5670 
5671  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
5672 
5673  if(port > 0)
5674  {
5675  initializeKernelSocket();
5676  m_kernelSocket.connectToHostEncrypted
5677  ("127.0.0.1", port);
5678  }
5679  }
5680 
5681  slotKernelSocketState();
5682 
5683  if(isKernelActive())
5684  {
5685  if(!m_buzzPages.isEmpty())
5686  {
5687  if(!m_buzzStatusTimer.isActive())
5688  m_buzzStatusTimer.start();
5689  }
5690  else
5691  m_buzzStatusTimer.stop();
5692  }
5693  else
5694  {
5695  m_buzzStatusTimer.stop();
5696 
5697  if(m_ui.kernelSecureMemoryPool->value() == 0)
5698  m_ui.kernelSecureMemoryPool->setStyleSheet
5699  ("QSpinBox {background-color: rgb(240, 128, 128);}"); // Light coral!
5700  else
5701  {
5702  m_ui.kernelSecureMemoryPool->setStyleSheet
5703  (m_ui.kernelSecureMemoryPool->
5704  property("original_stylesheet").toString());
5705 
5706  if(m_ui.kernelSecureMemoryPool->value() <
5707  spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE)
5708  m_ui.kernelSecureMemoryPool->setValue
5709  (spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE);
5710  }
5711  }
5712 
5713  if(m_optionsUi.guiSecureMemoryPool->value() == 0)
5714  m_optionsUi.guiSecureMemoryPool->setStyleSheet
5715  ("QSpinBox {background-color: rgb(240, 128, 128);}"); // Light coral!
5716  else
5717  {
5718  m_optionsUi.guiSecureMemoryPool->setStyleSheet
5719  (m_optionsUi.guiSecureMemoryPool->
5720  property("original_stylesheet").toString());
5721 
5722  if(m_optionsUi.guiSecureMemoryPool->value() <
5723  spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE)
5724  m_optionsUi.guiSecureMemoryPool->setValue
5725  (spoton_common::MINIMUM_SECURE_MEMORY_POOL_SIZE);
5726  }
5727 
5728  if(!isKernelActive() ||
5729  m_sb.status->text() != tr("<html><a href=\"authenticate\">"
5730  "The kernel requires your authentication "
5731  "and encryption keys.</a></html>"))
5732  {
5733  m_sb.status->setText
5734  (tr("External IP: %1.").
5735  arg(m_externalAddress.address().isNull() ?
5736  "unknown" : m_externalAddress.address().toString()));
5737  m_sb.status->repaint();
5738  }
5739 
5740  for(int i = m_starbeamDigestFutures.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
5741  if(m_starbeamDigestFutures.at(i).isFinished())
5742  m_starbeamDigestFutures.removeAt(i);
5743 }
5744 
5745 void spoton::slotSelectGeoIPPath(void)
5746 {
5747  QFileDialog dialog(m_optionsWindow);
5748 
5749  dialog.setWindowTitle
5750  (tr("%1: Select GeoIP Data Path").
5751  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
5752  dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
5753  dialog.setDirectory(QDir::homePath());
5754  dialog.setLabelText(QFileDialog::Accept, tr("Select"));
5755  dialog.setAcceptMode(QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
5756 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
5757 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
5758  dialog.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, false);
5759 #endif
5760 #endif
5761 
5762  if(dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
5763  {
5764  if(m_optionsUi.selectGeoIP4 == sender())
5765  saveGeoIPPath(4, dialog.selectedFiles().value(0));
5766  else
5767  saveGeoIPPath(6, dialog.selectedFiles().value(0));
5768  }
5769 }

5771 void spoton::slotSelectKernelPath(void)
5772 {
5773  QFileDialog dialog(this);
5774 
5775  dialog.setWindowTitle
5776  (tr("%1: Select Kernel Path").
5777  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
5778  dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::ExistingFile);
5779  dialog.setDirectory(QDir::homePath());
5780  dialog.setLabelText(QFileDialog::Accept, tr("Select"));
5781  dialog.setAcceptMode(QFileDialog::AcceptOpen);
5782 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
5783 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
5784  dialog.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, false);
5785 #endif
5786 #endif
5787 
5788  if(dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
5789  saveKernelPath(dialog.selectedFiles().value(0));
5790 }

5793 {

5795  saveGeoIPPath(4, m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->text());
5796  else
5797  saveGeoIPPath(6, m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->text());
5798 }

5800 void spoton::slotSaveKernelPath(void)
5801 {
5802  saveKernelPath(m_ui.kernelPath->text());
5803 }
5804 
5805 void spoton::saveGeoIPPath(const int version, const QString &path)
5806 {
5807  if(version == 4)
5808  m_settings["gui/geoipPath4"] = path;
5809  else
5810  m_settings["gui/geoipPath6"] = path;
5811 
5812  QSettings settings;
5813 
5814  if(version == 4)
5815  settings.setValue("gui/geoipPath4", path);
5816  else
5817  settings.setValue("gui/geoipPath6", path);
5818 
5819  if(version == 4)
5820  {
5821  m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->setText(path);
5822  m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->setToolTip(path);
5823  m_optionsUi.geoipPath4->selectAll();
5824  }
5825  else
5826  {
5827  m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->setText(path);
5828  m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->setToolTip(path);
5829  m_optionsUi.geoipPath6->selectAll();
5830  }
5831 }
5832 
5833 void spoton::saveKernelPath(const QString &path)
5834 {
5835  m_settings["gui/kernelPath"] = path;
5836 
5837  QSettings settings;
5838 
5839  settings.setValue("gui/kernelPath", path);
5840  m_ui.kernelPath->setText(path);
5841  m_ui.kernelPath->setToolTip(path);
5842  m_ui.kernelPath->selectAll();
5843 }
5844 
5845 void spoton::saveSettings(void)
5846 {
5847  QSettings settings;
5848 
5849  if(!isFullScreen())
5850  settings.setValue("gui/geometry", saveGeometry());
5851 
5852  settings.setValue("gui/chatHorizontalSplitter",
5853  m_ui.chatHorizontalSplitter->saveState());
5854  settings.setValue("gui/currentTabIndex", m_ui.tab->currentIndex());
5855  settings.setValue("gui/emailSplitter",
5856  m_ui.emailSplitter->saveState());
5857  settings.setValue("gui/listenersHorizontalSplitter",
5858  m_ui.listenersHorizontalSplitter->saveState());
5859  settings.setValue("gui/neighborsVerticalSplitter",
5860  m_ui.neighborsVerticalSplitter->saveState());
5861  settings.setValue("gui/readVerticalSplitter",
5862  m_ui.readVerticalSplitter->saveState());
5863  settings.setValue("gui/txmSplitter",
5864  m_ui.txmSplitter->saveState());
5865  settings.setValue("gui/urlsVerticalSplitter",
5866  m_ui.urlsVerticalSplitter->saveState());
5867 }
5868 
5869 void spoton::closeEvent(QCloseEvent *event)
5870 {
5871  if(promptBeforeExit())
5872  {
5873  if(event)
5874  event->ignore();
5875 
5876  return;
5877  }
5878 
5879  slotQuit();
5880 }
5881 
5882 void spoton::slotDeleteListener(void)
5883 {
5884  QString oid("");
5885  int row = -1;
5886 
5887  if((row = m_ui.listeners->currentRow()) >= 0)
5888  {
5889  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.listeners->item
5890  (row, m_ui.listeners->columnCount() - 1); // OID
5891 
5892  if(item)
5893  oid = item->text();
5894  }
5895 
5896  if(oid.isEmpty())
5897  return;
5898 
5899  QString connectionName("");
5900 
5901  {
5902  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
5903 
5904  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
5905  "listeners.db");
5906 
5907  if(db.open())
5908  {
5909  QSqlQuery query(db);
5910  bool deleteListener = false;
5911 
5912  if(!isKernelActive())
5913  {
5914  deleteListener = true;
5915  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
5916  query.prepare("DELETE FROM listeners WHERE "
5917  "OID = ?");
5918  }
5919  else
5920  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET status_control = 'deleted' "
5921  "WHERE "
5922  "OID = ? AND status_control <> 'deleted'");
5923 
5924  query.bindValue(0, oid);
5925  query.exec();
5926 
5927  if(deleteListener)
5928  {
5929  query.prepare("DELETE FROM listeners_accounts WHERE "
5930  "listener_oid = ?");
5931  query.bindValue(0, oid);
5932  query.exec();
5933  query.prepare
5934  ("DELETE FROM listeners_accounts_consumed_authentications "
5935  "WHERE listener_oid = ?");
5936  query.bindValue(0, oid);
5937  query.exec();
5938  query.prepare("DELETE FROM listeners_allowed_ips WHERE "
5939  "listener_oid = ?");
5940  query.bindValue(0, oid);
5941  query.exec();
5942  }
5943  }
5944 
5945  db.close();
5946  }
5947 
5948  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
5949 }
5950 
5951 void spoton::slotDeleteNeighbor(void)
5952 {
5953  QString oid("");
5954  int row = -1;
5955 
5956  if((row = m_ui.neighbors->currentRow()) >= 0)
5957  {
5958  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.neighbors->item
5959  (row, m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1); // OID
5960 
5961  if(item)
5962  oid = item->text();
5963  }
5964 
5965  if(oid.isEmpty())
5966  return;
5967 
5968  QString connectionName("");
5969 
5970  {
5971  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
5972 
5973  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
5974  "neighbors.db");
5975 
5976  if(db.open())
5977  {
5978  QSqlQuery query(db);
5979 
5980  if(!isKernelActive())
5981  {
5982  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
5983  query.prepare("DELETE FROM neighbors WHERE "
5984  "OID = ?");
5985  }
5986  else
5987  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET status_control = 'deleted' "
5988  "WHERE OID = ? AND status_control <> 'deleted'");
5989 
5990  query.bindValue(0, oid);
5991  query.exec();
5992  }
5993 
5994  db.close();
5995  }
5996 
5997  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
5998  m_ui.neighborSummary->clear();
5999 }
6000 
6001 void spoton::slotListenerChanged(QTableWidgetItem *item)
6002 {
6003  if(!item)
6004  return;
6005 
6006  if(!(item->column() == 0 || // Activate
6007  item->column() == 12 || // Use Accounts?
6008  item->column() == 21)) // Passthrough
6009  return;
6010 
6011  QString connectionName("");
6012 
6013  {
6014  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
6015 
6016  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
6017  "listeners.db");
6018 
6019  if(db.open())
6020  {
6021  QSqlQuery query(db);
6022  QString oid("");
6023 
6024  if(m_ui.listeners->item(item->row(),
6025  m_ui.listeners->columnCount() - 1))
6026  oid = m_ui.listeners->item
6027  (item->row(), m_ui.listeners->columnCount() - 1)->text();
6028 
6029  if(item->column() == 0)
6030  {
6031  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
6032  "status_control = ? "
6033  "WHERE OID = ? AND status_control <> 'deleted'");
6034 
6035  if(item->checkState() == Qt::Checked)
6036  query.bindValue(0, "online");
6037  else
6038  query.bindValue(0, "offline");
6039 
6040  query.bindValue(1, oid);
6041  query.exec();
6042  }
6043  else if(item->column() == 12)
6044  {
6045  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
6046  "use_accounts = ? WHERE OID = ?");
6047 
6048  if(item->checkState() == Qt::Checked)
6049  query.bindValue(0, 1);
6050  else
6051  query.bindValue(0, 0);
6052 
6053  query.bindValue(1, oid);
6054  query.exec();
6055  }
6056  else if(item->column() == 21)
6057  {
6058  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
6059  "passthrough = ? "
6060  "WHERE OID = ?");
6061  query.bindValue(0, item->checkState() == Qt::Checked ? 1 : 0);
6062  query.bindValue(1, oid);
6063  query.exec();
6064  }
6065  }
6066 
6067  db.close();
6068  }
6069 
6070  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
6071 }
6072 
6073 void spoton::updateListenersTable(const QSqlDatabase &db)
6074 {
6075  if(!isKernelActive())
6076  if(db.isOpen())
6077  {
6078  QSqlQuery query(db);
6079 
6080  /*
6081  ** OK, so the kernel is inactive. Discover the
6082  ** listeners that have not been deleted and update some of their
6083  ** information.
6084  */
6085 
6086  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
6087  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners WHERE "
6088  "status_control = 'deleted'");
6089  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners_accounts WHERE "
6090  "listener_oid NOT IN "
6091  "(SELECT OID FROM listeners)");
6092  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners_accounts_consumed_authentications "
6093  "WHERE listener_oid >= 0");
6094  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners_allowed_ips WHERE "
6095  "listener_oid NOT IN "
6096  "(SELECT OID FROM listeners)");
6097  query.exec("UPDATE listeners SET connections = 0, "
6098  "external_ip_address = NULL, "
6099  "status = 'offline' WHERE "
6100  "status = 'online' OR connections > 0");
6101  }
6102 }
6103 
6104 void spoton::updateNeighborsTable(const QSqlDatabase &db)
6105 {
6106  if(m_optionsUi.keepOnlyUserDefinedNeighbors->isChecked())
6107  if(db.isOpen())
6108  {
6109  /*
6110  ** Delete random, disconnected peers.
6111  */
6112 
6113  QSqlQuery query(db);
6114 
6115  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
6116  query.exec("DELETE FROM neighbors WHERE "
6117  "status <> 'connected' AND "
6118  "status_control <> 'blocked' AND "
6119  "user_defined = 0");
6120  }
6121 
6122  if(!isKernelActive())
6123  if(db.isOpen())
6124  {
6125  QSqlQuery query(db);
6126 
6127  /*
6128  ** OK, so the kernel is inactive. Discover the
6129  ** neighbors that have not been deleted and not disconnected
6130  ** and update some of their information.
6131  */
6132 
6133  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
6134  query.exec("DELETE FROM neighbors WHERE "
6135  "status_control = 'deleted'");
6136  query.exec("UPDATE neighbors SET "
6137  "account_authenticated = NULL, "
6138  "bytes_read = 0, "
6139  "bytes_written = 0, "
6140  "external_ip_address = NULL, "
6141  "is_encrypted = 0, "
6142  "local_ip_address = NULL, "
6143  "local_port = NULL, "
6144  "ssl_session_cipher = NULL, "
6145  "status = 'disconnected', "
6146  "uptime = 0 WHERE "
6147  "local_ip_address IS NOT NULL OR local_port IS NOT NULL "
6148  "OR status <> 'disconnected'");
6149  }
6150 }
6151 
6152 void spoton::updateParticipantsTable(const QSqlDatabase &db)
6153 {
6154  if(!isKernelActive())
6155  if(db.isOpen())
6156  {
6157  QSqlQuery query(db);
6158 
6159  /*
6160  ** OK, so the kernel is inactive. All participants are offline.
6161  */
6162 
6163  query.exec("UPDATE friends_public_keys SET status = 'offline' WHERE "
6164  "status <> 'offline'");
6165  spoton_misc::purgeSignatureRelationships
6166  (db, m_crypts.value("chat", 0));
6167  }
6168 }
6169 
6170 void spoton::slotSetPassphrase(void)
6171 {
6172  if(m_wizardHash.value("shown", false))
6173  return;
6174  else if(!verifyInitializationPassphrase(this))
6175  return;
6176 
6177  bool reencode = false;
6178  bool wizardAccepted = m_wizardHash.value("accepted", false);
6179  QString str1(m_ui.passphrase1->text());
6180  QString str2(m_ui.passphrase2->text());
6181  QString str3(m_ui.username->text());
6182 
6183  if(spoton_crypt::passphraseSet())
6184  {
6185  QMessageBox mb(this);
6186 
6187 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
6188 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
6189  mb.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
6190 #endif
6191 #endif
6192  mb.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
6193  mb.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Confirmation").
6194  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6195  mb.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
6196  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
6197 
6198  if(m_ui.passphrase_rb->isChecked())
6199  mb.setText(tr("Are you sure that you wish to replace the "
6200  "existing passphrase? Please note that URL data must "
6201  "be re-encoded via a separate tool. Please see "
6202  "the future Re-Encode URLs option. The RSS mechanism "
6203  "and the kernel will be deactivated."));
6204  else
6205  mb.setText(tr("Are you sure that you wish to replace the "
6206  "existing answer/question? Please note that URL "
6207  "data must "
6208  "be re-encoded via a separate tool. Please see "
6209  "the future Re-Encode URLs option. The RSS mechanism "
6210  "and the kernel will be deactivated."));
6211 
6212  if(mb.exec() != QMessageBox::Yes)
6213  {
6214  m_ui.answer->clear();
6215  m_ui.passphrase1->clear();
6216  m_ui.passphrase2->clear();
6217  m_ui.question->clear();
6218  return;
6219  }
6220  else
6221  {
6222  repaint();
6223 #ifndef Q_OS_MAC
6224  QApplication::processEvents();
6225 #endif
6226  m_rss->deactivate();
6227  slotDeactivateKernel();
6228  reencode = true;
6229  }
6230  }
6231  else
6232  {
6233  repaint();
6234 #ifndef Q_OS_MAC
6235  QApplication::processEvents();
6236 #endif
6237 
6238  /*
6239  ** Deactivate machines before preparing keys.
6240  */
6241 
6242  m_rss->deactivate();
6243  slotDeactivateKernel();
6244  }
6245 
6246  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6247  m_sb.status->setText
6248  (tr("Generating derived keys. Please be patient."));
6249  m_sb.status->repaint();
6250 
6251  QByteArray salt;
6252  QByteArray saltedPassphraseHash;
6253  QString error1("");
6254  QString error2("");
6255  QString error3("");
6256 
6257  salt.resize(m_ui.saltLength->value());
6258  salt = spoton_crypt::strongRandomBytes(static_cast<size_t> (salt.length()));
6259 
6260  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> derivedKeys;
6261 
6262  if(m_ui.passphrase_rb->isChecked())
6263  derivedKeys = spoton_crypt::derivedKeys
6264  (m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6265  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6266  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.iterationCount->value()),
6267  str1,
6268  salt,
6269  error1);
6270  else
6271  derivedKeys = spoton_crypt::derivedKeys
6272  (m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6273  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6274  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.iterationCount->value()),
6275  str1 + str2,
6276  salt,
6277  error1);
6278 
6279  m_sb.status->clear();
6280  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6281 
6282  if(error1.isEmpty())
6283  {
6284  if(!m_ui.newKeys->isChecked() && reencode)
6285  {
6286  if(m_crypts.value("chat", 0))
6287  {
6288  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6289 
6290  QScopedPointer<spoton_crypt> crypt
6291  (new
6292  spoton_crypt(m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6293  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6294  QByteArray(),
6295  derivedKeys.first,
6296  derivedKeys.second,
6297  m_ui.saltLength->value(),
6298  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.
6299  iterationCount->
6300  value()),
6301  "chat"));
6302  QStringList list(spoton_common::SPOTON_ENCRYPTION_KEY_NAMES +
6303  spoton_common::SPOTON_SIGNATURE_KEY_NAMES);
6304 
6305  qSort(list);
6306 
6307  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
6308  {
6309  m_sb.status->setText
6310  (tr("Re-encoding public key pair %1 of %2. "
6311  "Please be patient.").
6312  arg(i + 1).
6313  arg(list.size()));
6314  m_sb.status->repaint();
6315 
6316  /*
6317  ** All m_crypts values have identical symmetric keys.
6318  */
6319 
6320  spoton_crypt::reencodePrivatePublicKeys
6321  (crypt.data(),
6322  m_crypts.value("chat", 0), list.at(i), error2);
6323  m_sb.status->clear();
6324 
6325  if(!error2.isEmpty())
6326  break;
6327  }
6328 
6329  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6330  }
6331  }
6332  else
6333  {
6334  bool proceed = false;
6335 
6336  if(!wizardAccepted)
6337  {
6338  QMessageBox mb(this);
6339 
6340 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
6341 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
6342  mb.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
6343 #endif
6344 #endif
6345  mb.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
6346  mb.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Question").
6347  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6348  mb.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
6349  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
6350  mb.setText
6351  (tr("Would you like to generate public key pairs?"));
6352 
6353  if(mb.exec() == QMessageBox::Yes)
6354  proceed = true;
6355  }
6356  else
6357  proceed = m_wizardHash.value("initialize_public_keys", true);
6358 
6359  if(proceed)
6360  if(m_ui.encryptionKeyType->currentIndex() == 1)
6361  {
6362  QMessageBox mb(this);
6363 
6364 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
6365 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
6366  mb.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
6367 #endif
6368 #endif
6369  mb.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
6370  mb.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Confirmation").
6371  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6372  mb.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
6373  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
6374  mb.setText
6375  (tr("McEliece keys require a significant amount of "
6376  "storage memory. As %1 prefers secure memory, "
6377  "the gcrypt library may fail if it's unable to "
6378  "reserve the required amount of memory. Some "
6379  "operating systems require configuration in order "
6380  "to support large amounts of locked memory. "
6381  "You may disable secure memory by setting the "
6382  "secure memory pools of the interface and the kernel "
6383  "to zero. Continue with the key-generation process?").
6384  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6385 
6386  if(mb.exec() != QMessageBox::Yes)
6387  proceed = false;
6388  }
6389 
6390  if(proceed)
6391  {
6392  repaint();
6393 #ifndef Q_OS_MAC
6394  QApplication::processEvents();
6395 #endif
6396 
6397  QString encryptionKeyType("");
6398  QString signatureKeyType("");
6399  QStringList list;
6400 
6401  if(m_ui.encryptionKeyType->currentIndex() == 0)
6402  encryptionKeyType = "elg";
6403  else if(m_ui.encryptionKeyType->currentIndex() == 1)
6404  encryptionKeyType = "mceliece";
6405  else if(m_ui.encryptionKeyType->currentIndex() == 2)
6406  encryptionKeyType = "ntru";
6407  else
6408  encryptionKeyType = "rsa";
6409 
6410  if(m_ui.signatureKeyType->currentIndex() == 0)
6411  signatureKeyType = "dsa";
6412  else if(m_ui.signatureKeyType->currentIndex() == 1)
6413  signatureKeyType = "ecdsa";
6414  else if(m_ui.signatureKeyType->currentIndex() == 2)
6415  signatureKeyType = "eddsa";
6416  else if(m_ui.signatureKeyType->currentIndex() == 3)
6417  signatureKeyType = "elg";
6418  else
6419  signatureKeyType = "rsa";
6420 
6421  list << spoton_common::SPOTON_ENCRYPTION_KEY_NAMES
6422  << spoton_common::SPOTON_SIGNATURE_KEY_NAMES;
6423  qSort(list);
6424 #ifdef SPOTON_ALL
6425  QProgressDialog progress(this);
6426 #endif
6427 
6428 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
6429 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
6430  progress.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
6431 #endif
6432 #endif
6433  progress.setLabelText(tr("Generating key pairs. "
6434  "Please be patient."));
6435  progress.setMaximum(list.size());
6436  progress.setMinimum(0);
6437  progress.setModal(true);
6438  progress.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Generating Key Pairs").
6439  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6440  progress.show();
6441 #ifndef Q_OS_MAC
6442  progress.repaint();
6443  QApplication::processEvents();
6444 #endif
6445 
6446  for(int i = 0; i < list.size() && !progress.wasCanceled(); i++)
6447  {
6448  if(i + 1 <= progress.maximum())
6449  progress.setValue(i + 1);
6450 
6451 #ifndef Q_OS_MAC
6452  progress.repaint();
6453  QApplication::processEvents();
6454 #endif
6455 
6456  spoton_crypt crypt
6457  (m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6458  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6459  str1.toUtf8(), // Passphrase.
6460  derivedKeys.first,
6461  derivedKeys.second,
6462  m_ui.saltLength->value(),
6463  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.iterationCount->
6464  value()),
6465  list.at(i));
6466 
6467  if(!list.at(i).contains("signature"))
6468  crypt.generatePrivatePublicKeys
6469  (m_ui.encryptionKeySize->currentText(),
6470  encryptionKeyType,
6471  error2);
6472  else
6473  crypt.generatePrivatePublicKeys
6474  (m_ui.signatureKeySize->currentText(),
6475  signatureKeyType,
6476  error2);
6477 
6478  if(!error2.isEmpty())
6479  break;
6480  }
6481 
6482  progress.close();
6483  }
6484  }
6485  }
6486 
6487  if(error1.isEmpty() && error2.isEmpty())
6488  {
6489  if(m_ui.passphrase_rb->isChecked())
6490  saltedPassphraseHash = spoton_crypt::saltedPassphraseHash
6491  (m_ui.hashType->currentText(), str1, salt, error3);
6492  else
6493  {
6494  bool ok = true;
6495 
6496  saltedPassphraseHash = spoton_crypt::keyedHash
6497  (str1.toUtf8(), str2.toUtf8(),
6498  m_ui.hashType->currentText().toLatin1(), &ok);
6499 
6500  if(!ok)
6501  error3 = "keyed hash failure";
6502  }
6503  }
6504 
6505  if(!error1.trimmed().isEmpty())
6506  {
6507  spoton_crypt::purgeDatabases();
6508  updatePublicKeysLabel();
6509  QMessageBox::critical
6510  (this, tr("%1: Error").arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
6511  tr("An error (%1) occurred with spoton_crypt::"
6512  "derivedKeys().").arg(error1.trimmed()));
6513  }
6514  else if(!error2.trimmed().isEmpty())
6515  {
6516  spoton_crypt::purgeDatabases();
6517  updatePublicKeysLabel();
6518  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
6519  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
6520  tr("An error (%1) occurred with "
6521  "spoton_crypt::"
6522  "generatePrivatePublicKeys() or "
6523  "spoton_crypt::"
6524  "reencodePrivatePublicKeys().").
6525  arg(error2.trimmed()));
6526  }
6527  else if(!error3.trimmed().isEmpty())
6528  {
6529  spoton_crypt::purgeDatabases();
6530  updatePublicKeysLabel();
6531  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
6532  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
6533  tr("An error (%1) occurred with "
6534  "spoton_crypt::"
6535  "keyedHash() or "
6536  "spoton_crypt::"
6537  "saltedPassphraseHash().").
6538  arg(error3.trimmed()));
6539  }
6540  else
6541  {
6542  if(!m_crypts.value("chat", 0) || reencode)
6543  {
6544  if(reencode)
6545  {
6546  QScopedPointer<spoton_crypt> crypt
6547  (new
6548  spoton_crypt(m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6549  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6550  QByteArray(),
6551  derivedKeys.first,
6552  derivedKeys.second,
6553  m_ui.saltLength->value(),
6554  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.
6555  iterationCount->
6556  value()),
6557  "chat"));
6558 
6559  spoton_reencode reencode;
6560 
6561  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
6562  reencode.reencode
6563  (m_sb, crypt.data(), m_crypts.value("chat", 0));
6564  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6565  }
6566 
6567  QHashIterator<QString, spoton_crypt *> it(m_crypts);
6568 
6569  while(it.hasNext())
6570  {
6571  it.next();
6572  delete it.value();
6573  }
6574 
6575  m_crypts.clear();
6576 
6577  QStringList list(spoton_common::SPOTON_ENCRYPTION_KEY_NAMES +
6578  spoton_common::SPOTON_SIGNATURE_KEY_NAMES);
6579 
6580  qSort(list);
6581 
6582  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
6583  m_crypts.insert
6584  (list.at(i),
6585  new spoton_crypt(m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6586  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6587  QByteArray(),
6588  derivedKeys.first,
6589  derivedKeys.second,
6590  m_ui.saltLength->value(),
6591  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.
6592  iterationCount->
6593  value()),
6594  list.at(i)));
6595 
6596  if(!reencode)
6597  {
6598  bool proceed = false;
6599 
6600  if(!wizardAccepted)
6601  {
6602  QMessageBox mb(this);
6603 
6604 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
6605 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
6606  mb.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
6607 #endif
6608 #endif
6609  mb.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
6610  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
6611  mb.setText(tr("Would you like to exercise your new "
6612  "credentials as URL Common Credentials?"));
6613  mb.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Question").
6614  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6615 
6616  if(mb.exec() == QMessageBox::Yes)
6617  proceed = true;
6618  }
6619  else
6620  proceed = m_wizardHash.value("url_credentials", true);
6621 
6622  if(proceed)
6623  {
6624  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6625  spoton_misc::prepareUrlKeysDatabase();
6626 
6627  if(saveCommonUrlCredentials(derivedKeys,
6628  m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6629  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6630  m_crypts.value("chat", 0)).
6631  isEmpty())
6632  {
6633  prepareUrlContainers();
6634  prepareUrlLabels();
6635  }
6636 
6637  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6638  }
6639  }
6640 
6641  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
6642  askKernelToReadStarBeamKeys();
6643  populateNovas();
6644  sendBuzzKeysToKernel();
6645  sendKeysToKernel();
6646  updatePublicKeysLabel();
6647  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6648 
6649  if(!reencode)
6650  {
6651  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
6652  m_echoKeyShare->createDefaultUrlCommunity();
6653  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6654  }
6655  else
6656  prepareUrlContainers();
6657  }
6658 
6659  m_sb.frame->setEnabled(true);
6660  m_sb.lock->setEnabled(true);
6661 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
6662  m_ui.action_Add_Participant->setEnabled(true);
6663 #endif
6664  m_ui.action_Echo_Key_Share->setEnabled(true);
6665  m_ui.action_Export_Listeners->setEnabled(true);
6666  m_ui.action_Export_Public_Keys->setEnabled(true);
6667  m_ui.action_Import_Neighbors->setEnabled(true);
6668  m_ui.action_Import_Public_Keys->setEnabled(true);
6669  m_ui.action_New_Global_Name->setEnabled(true);
6670  m_ui.action_Notifications_Window->setEnabled(true);
6671  m_ui.action_Options->setEnabled(true);
6672  m_ui.action_Poptastic_Settings->setEnabled(true);
6673  m_ui.action_Purge_Ephemeral_Keys->setEnabled(true);
6674  m_ui.action_RSS->setEnabled(true);
6675  m_ui.action_Rosetta->setEnabled(true);
6676  m_ui.action_Statistics_Window->setEnabled(true);
6677  m_ui.action_Vacuum_Databases->setEnabled(true);
6678  m_ui.answer->clear();
6679  m_ui.delete_key->setEnabled(true);
6680  m_ui.encryptionKeySize->setEnabled(false);
6681  m_ui.encryptionKeyType->setEnabled(false);
6682  m_ui.kernelBox->setEnabled(true);
6683  m_ui.kernelBox->setVisible(true);
6684  m_ui.keys->setEnabled(true);
6685  m_ui.menu_Pages->setEnabled(true);
6686  m_ui.newKeys->setChecked(false);
6687  m_ui.newKeys->setEnabled(true);
6688  m_ui.passphrase1->clear();
6689  m_ui.passphrase2->clear();
6690  m_ui.passphrase_strength_indicator->setVisible(false);
6691  m_ui.publicKeysBox->setVisible(true);
6692  m_ui.question->clear();
6693  m_ui.regenerate->setEnabled(true);
6694  m_ui.showStatistics->setVisible(true);
6695  m_ui.signatureKeyType->setEnabled(false);
6696  m_ui.signatureKeyType->setEnabled(false);
6697  repaint();
6698  QApplication::processEvents();
6699 
6700  for(int i = 0; i < m_ui.tab->count(); i++)
6701  {
6702  m_ui.tab->setTabEnabled(i, true);
6703 
6704  QHash<QString, QVariant> hash(m_tabWidgetsProperties[i]);
6705 
6706  hash["enabled"] = true;
6707  m_tabWidgetsProperties[i] = hash;
6708  }
6709 
6710  /*
6711  ** Save the various entities.
6712  */
6713 
6714  m_settings["gui/buzzName"] = str3.toUtf8();
6715  m_settings["gui/cipherType"] = m_ui.cipherType->currentText();
6716  m_settings["gui/emailName"] = str3.toUtf8();
6717  m_settings["gui/hashType"] = m_ui.hashType->currentText();
6718  m_settings["gui/iterationCount"] = m_ui.iterationCount->value();
6719  m_settings["gui/kernelCipherType"] =
6720  m_ui.kernelCipherType->currentText();
6721  m_settings["gui/kernelHashType"] =
6722  m_ui.kernelHashType->currentText();
6723  m_settings["gui/nodeName"] = str3.toUtf8();
6724  m_settings["gui/rosettaName"] = str3.toUtf8();
6725  m_settings["gui/salt"] = salt;
6726  m_settings["gui/saltLength"] = m_ui.saltLength->value();
6727  m_settings["gui/saltedPassphraseHash"] = saltedPassphraseHash;
6728  m_settings["gui/urlName"] = str3.toUtf8();
6729 
6730  QSettings settings;
6731 
6732  settings.setValue("gui/buzzName", m_settings["gui/buzzName"]);
6733  settings.setValue("gui/cipherType", m_settings["gui/cipherType"]);
6734  settings.setValue("gui/emailName", m_settings["gui/emailName"]);
6735  settings.setValue("gui/hashType", m_settings["gui/hashType"]);
6736  settings.setValue("gui/iterationCount",
6737  m_settings["gui/iterationCount"]);
6738  settings.setValue("gui/kernelCipherType",
6739  m_settings["gui/kernelCipherType"]);
6740  settings.setValue("gui/kernelHashType",
6741  m_settings["gui/kernelHashType"]);
6742  settings.setValue("gui/nodeName", m_settings["gui/nodeName"]);
6743  settings.setValue("gui/rosettaName", m_settings["gui/rosettaName"]);
6744  settings.setValue("gui/salt", m_settings["gui/salt"]);
6745  settings.setValue("gui/saltLength", m_settings["gui/saltLength"]);
6746  settings.setValue
6747  ("gui/saltedPassphraseHash", m_settings["gui/saltedPassphraseHash"]);
6748  settings.setValue("gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed", true);
6749  settings.setValue("gui/urlName", m_settings["gui/urlName"]);
6750  m_ui.buzzName->setText(m_ui.username->text());
6751  m_ui.emailName->clear();
6752  m_ui.emailName->addItem(m_ui.username->text());
6753  m_ui.emailNameEditable->setText(m_ui.emailName->currentText());
6754  m_ui.nodeName->setText(m_ui.username->text());
6755  m_ui.urlName->setText(m_ui.username->text());
6756 
6757  if(!m_settings.value("gui/initial_url_distillers_defined",
6758  false).toBool())
6759  {
6760  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6761  m_sb.status->setText
6762  (tr("Initializing URL distillers. Please be patient."));
6763  m_sb.status->repaint();
6764  initializeUrlDistillers();
6765 
6766  QSettings settings;
6767 
6768  settings.setValue("gui/initial_url_distillers_defined",
6769  true);
6770  m_settings["gui/initial_url_distillers_defined"] = true;
6771  populateUrlDistillers();
6772  m_sb.status->clear();
6773  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6774  }
6775 
6776  if(!m_settings.value("gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed",
6777  false).toBool())
6778  {
6779  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6780  m_sb.status->setText
6781  (tr("Importing spot-on-neighbors.txt. Please be patient."));
6782  m_sb.status->repaint();
6783  importNeighbors("spot-on-neighbors.txt");
6784 
6785  QSettings settings;
6786 
6787  settings.setValue("gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed",
6788  true);
6789  m_settings["gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed"] = true;
6790  m_sb.status->clear();
6791  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6792  }
6793 
6794  QMessageBox::information
6795  (this, tr("%1: Information").
6796  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
6797  tr("Your confidential information has been saved. Enjoy!"));
6798 
6799  if(m_ui.pid->text() == "0")
6800  if(QFileInfo(m_ui.kernelPath->text()).isExecutable())
6801  {
6802  bool proceed = false;
6803 
6804  if(!wizardAccepted)
6805  {
6806  QMessageBox mb(this);
6807 
6808 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
6809 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
6810  mb.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
6811 #endif
6812 #endif
6813  mb.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
6814  mb.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Question").
6815  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
6816  mb.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
6817  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
6818  mb.setText(tr("Would you like the kernel to be activated?"));
6819 
6820  if(mb.exec() == QMessageBox::Yes)
6821  proceed = true;
6822  }
6823  else
6824  proceed = m_wizardHash.value("launch_kernel", true);
6825 
6826  if(proceed)
6827  slotActivateKernel();
6828  }
6829 
6830 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
6831  slotConnectAllNeighbors();
6832 #endif
6833  playSound("login.wav");
6834  }
6835 }
6836 
6837 void spoton::slotValidatePassphrase(void)
6838 {
6839  QByteArray computedHash;
6840  QByteArray salt(m_settings.value("gui/salt", "").toByteArray());
6841  QByteArray saltedPassphraseHash
6842  (m_settings.value("gui/saltedPassphraseHash", "").toByteArray());
6843  QString error("");
6844  bool authenticated = false;
6845 
6846  if(m_ui.passphrase_rb_authenticate->isChecked())
6847  computedHash = spoton_crypt::saltedPassphraseHash
6848  (m_ui.hashType->currentText(), m_ui.passphrase->text(), salt, error);
6849  else
6850  {
6851  bool ok = true;
6852 
6853  computedHash = spoton_crypt::keyedHash
6854  (m_ui.question_authenticate->text().toUtf8(),
6855  m_ui.answer_authenticate->text().toUtf8(),
6856  m_ui.hashType->currentText().toLatin1(), &ok);
6857 
6858  if(!ok)
6859  error = "keyed hash failure";
6860  }
6861 
6862  if(!computedHash.isEmpty() && !saltedPassphraseHash.isEmpty() &&
6863  spoton_crypt::memcmp(computedHash, saltedPassphraseHash))
6864  if(error.isEmpty())
6865  {
6866  authenticated = true;
6867  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6868 
6869  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> keys;
6870 
6871  if(m_ui.passphrase_rb_authenticate->isChecked())
6872  keys = spoton_crypt::derivedKeys
6873  (m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6874  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6875  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.iterationCount->value()),
6876  m_ui.passphrase->text(),
6877  salt,
6878  error);
6879  else
6880  keys = spoton_crypt::derivedKeys
6881  (m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6882  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6883  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.iterationCount->value()),
6884  m_ui.question_authenticate->text() +
6885  m_ui.answer_authenticate->text(),
6886  salt,
6887  error);
6888 
6889  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6890 
6891  if(error.isEmpty())
6892  {
6893  QHashIterator<QString, spoton_crypt *> it(m_crypts);
6894 
6895  while(it.hasNext())
6896  {
6897  it.next();
6898  delete it.value();
6899  }
6900 
6901  m_crypts.clear();
6902 
6903  QStringList list(spoton_common::SPOTON_ENCRYPTION_KEY_NAMES +
6904  spoton_common::SPOTON_SIGNATURE_KEY_NAMES);
6905 
6906  qSort(list);
6907 
6908  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
6909  m_crypts.insert
6910  (list.at(i),
6911  new spoton_crypt
6912  (m_ui.cipherType->currentText(),
6913  m_ui.hashType->currentText(),
6914  QByteArray(),
6915  keys.first,
6916  keys.second,
6917  m_ui.saltLength->value(),
6918  static_cast<unsigned long int> (m_ui.
6919  iterationCount->
6920  value()),
6921  list.at(i)));
6922 
6923  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6924  spoton_misc::alterDatabasesAfterAuthentication
6925  (m_crypts.value("chat", 0));
6926  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
6927 
6928  if(m_optionsUi.launchKernel->isChecked())
6929  slotActivateKernel();
6930 
6931  m_sb.frame->setEnabled(true);
6932  m_sb.lock->setEnabled(true);
6933 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
6934  m_ui.action_Add_Participant->setEnabled(true);
6935 #endif
6936  m_ui.action_Echo_Key_Share->setEnabled(true);
6937  m_ui.action_Export_Listeners->setEnabled(true);
6938  m_ui.action_Export_Public_Keys->setEnabled(true);
6939  m_ui.action_Import_Neighbors->setEnabled(true);
6940  m_ui.action_Import_Public_Keys->setEnabled(true);
6941  m_ui.action_New_Global_Name->setEnabled(true);
6942  m_ui.action_Notifications_Window->setEnabled(true);
6943  m_ui.action_Options->setEnabled(true);
6944  m_ui.action_Poptastic_Settings->setEnabled(true);
6945  m_ui.action_Purge_Ephemeral_Keys->setEnabled(true);
6946  m_ui.action_RSS->setEnabled(true);
6947  m_ui.action_Rosetta->setEnabled(true);
6948  m_ui.action_Statistics_Window->setEnabled(true);
6949  m_ui.action_Vacuum_Databases->setEnabled(true);
6950  m_ui.answer->clear();
6951  m_ui.answer_authenticate->clear();
6952  m_ui.delete_key->setEnabled(true);
6953  m_ui.encryptionKeySize->setEnabled(false);
6954  m_ui.encryptionKeyType->setEnabled(false);
6955  m_ui.kernelBox->setEnabled(true);
6956  m_ui.kernelBox->setVisible(true);
6957  m_ui.keys->setEnabled(true);
6958  m_ui.menu_Pages->setEnabled(true);
6959  m_ui.newKeys->setEnabled(true);
6960  m_ui.passphrase->clear();
6961  m_ui.passphrase->clear();
6962  m_ui.passphrase->setEnabled(false);
6963  m_ui.passphrase1->clear();
6964  m_ui.passphrase2->clear();
6965  m_ui.passphraseButton->setEnabled(false);
6966  m_ui.passphrase_rb_authenticate->setChecked(true);
6967  m_ui.passphrase_rb_authenticate->setEnabled(false);
6968  m_ui.publicKeysBox->setVisible(true);
6969  m_ui.question->clear();
6970  m_ui.question_authenticate->clear();
6971  m_ui.question_rb_authenticate->setEnabled(false);
6972  m_ui.regenerate->setEnabled(true);
6973  m_ui.showStatistics->setVisible(true);
6974  m_ui.signatureKeySize->setEnabled(false);
6975  m_ui.signatureKeyType->setEnabled(false);
6976 
6977  for(int i = 0; i < m_ui.tab->count(); i++)
6978  {
6979  m_ui.tab->setTabEnabled(i, true);
6980 
6981  QHash<QString, QVariant> hash(m_tabWidgetsProperties[i]);
6982 
6983  hash["enabled"] = true;
6984  m_tabWidgetsProperties[i] = hash;
6985  }
6986 
6987  {
6988  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
6989 
6990  QList<QHash<QString, QVariant> > list
6991  (spoton_misc::
6992  poptasticSettings("", m_crypts.value("chat", 0), 0));
6993 
6994  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
6995  {
6996  if(i == 0)
6997  m_ui.emailName->insertSeparator(1);
6998 
6999  m_ui.emailName->addItem(list.at(i).value("in_username").
7000  toString());
7001  }
7002 
7003  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
7004  }
7005 
7006  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
7007  askKernelToReadStarBeamKeys();
7008  populateNovas();
7009  populateUrlDistillers();
7010  prepareUrlContainers();
7011  prepareUrlLabels();
7012  prepareVisiblePages();
7013  sendBuzzKeysToKernel();
7014  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
7015  m_rss->prepareAfterAuthentication();
7016  m_ui.tab->setCurrentIndex
7017  (m_settings.value("gui/currentTabIndex", m_ui.tab->count() - 1).
7018  toInt());
7019 
7020  QString name("");
7021  QString nameEmail("");
7022 
7023  if(m_crypts.value("chat", 0))
7024  {
7025  QByteArray bytes;
7026  QSettings settings;
7027  bool ok = true;
7028 
7029  bytes = m_crypts.value("chat")->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
7030  (QByteArray::fromBase64(settings.
7031  value("gui/poptasticName").
7032  toByteArray()), &ok).trimmed();
7033 
7034  if(ok)
7035  name = bytes.constData();
7036 
7037  bytes = m_crypts.value("chat")->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
7038  (QByteArray::fromBase64(settings.
7039  value("gui/poptasticNameEmail").
7040  toByteArray()), &ok).trimmed();
7041 
7042  if(ok)
7043  nameEmail = bytes.constData();
7044  }
7045 
7046  if(name.isEmpty())
7047  name = "unknown@unknown.org";
7048 
7049  if(nameEmail.isEmpty())
7050  {
7051  /*
7052  ** Leave gui/poptasticNameEmail empty.
7053  ** If Poptastic e-mail is written, the user will be required
7054  ** to provide Poptastic information.
7055  */
7056  }
7057 
7058  m_settings["gui/poptasticName"] = name.toLatin1();
7059  m_settings["gui/poptasticNameEmail"] = nameEmail.toLatin1();
7060 
7061  if(!m_settings.value("gui/initial_url_distillers_defined",
7062  false).toBool())
7063  {
7064  initializeUrlDistillers();
7065 
7066  QSettings settings;
7067 
7068  settings.setValue("gui/initial_url_distillers_defined",
7069  true);
7070  m_settings["gui/initial_url_distillers_defined"] = true;
7071  }
7072 
7073  if(!m_settings.value("gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed",
7074  false).toBool())
7075  {
7076  importNeighbors("spot-on-neighbors.txt");
7077 
7078  QSettings settings;
7079 
7080  settings.setValue("gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed",
7081  true);
7082  m_settings["gui/spot_on_neighbors_txt_processed"] = true;
7083  }
7084 
7085  if(m_optionsUi.refreshEmail->isChecked())
7086  {
7087  populateMail();
7088  refreshInstitutions();
7089  }
7090 
7091  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
7092  m_echoKeyShare->createDefaultUrlCommunity();
7093  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
7094  }
7095  }
7096 
7097  m_ui.answer->clear();
7098  m_ui.passphrase->clear();
7099  m_ui.question->clear();
7100 
7101  if(!authenticated)
7102  m_ui.passphrase->selectAll();
7103  else
7104  {
7105 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
7106  slotConnectAllNeighbors();
7107 #endif
7108  playSound("login.wav");
7109  m_ui.passphrase->setFocus();
7110  updatePublicKeysLabel();
7111  }
7112 }
7113 
7114 void spoton::slotTabChanged(int index)
7115 {
7116  Q_UNUSED(index);
7117 
7118  if(currentTabName() == "listeners")
7119  m_listenersLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
7120  else if(currentTabName() == "neighbors")
7121  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
7122  else if(currentTabName() == "starbeam")
7123  {
7124  m_magnetsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
7125  m_starsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
7126  }
7127 
7128  if(currentTabName() == "buzz")
7129  m_sb.buzz->setVisible(false);
7130  else if(currentTabName() == "chat")
7131  m_sb.chat->setVisible(false);
7132 }
7133 
7134 void spoton::slotNeighborChanged(QTableWidgetItem *item)
7135 {
7136  if(!item)
7137  return;
7138 
7139  if(!(item->column() == 0 || // Sticky
7140  item->column() == 37)) // Passthrough
7141  return;
7142 
7143  QString connectionName("");
7144 
7145  {
7146  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
7147 
7148  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
7149  "neighbors.db");
7150 
7151  if(db.open())
7152  {
7153  QSqlQuery query(db);
7154  QString oid("");
7155 
7156  if(m_ui.neighbors->item(item->row(),
7157  m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1))
7158  oid = m_ui.neighbors->item(item->row(),
7159  m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1)->
7160  text();
7161 
7162  if(item->column() == 0)
7163  {
7164  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
7165  "sticky = ? "
7166  "WHERE OID = ?");
7167  query.bindValue(0, item->checkState() == Qt::Checked ? 1 : 0);
7168  query.bindValue(1, oid);
7169  query.exec();
7170  }
7171  else if(item->column() == 37)
7172  {
7173  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
7174  "passthrough = ? "
7175  "WHERE OID = ?");
7176  query.bindValue(0, item->checkState() == Qt::Checked ? 1 : 0);
7177  query.bindValue(1, oid);
7178  query.exec();
7179  }
7180  }
7181 
7182  db.close();
7183  }
7184 
7185  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
7186 }
7187 
7188 void spoton::slotMaximumClientsChanged(int index)
7189 {
7190  QComboBox *comboBox = qobject_cast<QComboBox *> (sender());
7191 
7192  if(comboBox)
7193  {
7194  QString connectionName("");
7195 
7196  {
7197  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
7198 
7199  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
7200  "listeners.db");
7201 
7202  if(db.open())
7203  {
7204  QSqlQuery query(db);
7205 
7206  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
7207  "maximum_clients = ? "
7208  "WHERE OID = ?");
7209 
7210  if(index != comboBox->count() - 1)
7211  query.bindValue(0, comboBox->itemText(index).toInt());
7212  else
7213  query.bindValue(0, 0);
7214 
7215  query.bindValue(1, comboBox->property("oid"));
7216  query.exec();
7217  }
7218 
7219  db.close();
7220  }
7221 
7222  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
7223  }
7224 }
7225 
7226 void spoton::slotShowContextMenu(const QPoint &point)
7227 {
7228  if(m_ui.emailParticipants == sender())
7229  {
7230  QAction *action = 0;
7231  QMenu menu(this);
7232 
7233  menu.addAction
7234  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/add.png").
7235  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").toString().
7236  toLower())),
7237  tr("&Add participant as friend."),
7238  this, SLOT(slotShareEmailPublicKeyWithParticipant(void)));
7239  menu.addSeparator();
7240  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/generic/repleo-email.png"),
7241  tr("&Copy Repleo to the clipboard buffer."),
7242  this, SLOT(slotCopyEmailFriendshipBundle(void)));
7243  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/copy.png").
7244  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7245  toString().toLower())),
7246  tr("&Copy keys to the clipboard buffer."),
7247  this, SLOT(slotCopyEmailKeys(void)));
7248  menu.addSeparator();
7249  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/clear.png").
7250  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7251  toString().toLower())),
7252  tr("&Remove participant(s)."),
7253  this, SLOT(slotRemoveEmailParticipants(void)));
7254  menu.addSeparator();
7255  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Rename Participant..."),
7256  this, SLOT(slotRenameParticipant(void)));
7257  action->setProperty("type", "email");
7258  menu.addSeparator();
7259  action = menu.addAction
7260  (tr("Initiate Forward &Secrecy Exchange(s)..."),
7261  this, SLOT(slotEstablishForwardSecrecy(void)));
7262  action->setProperty("type", "email");
7263  action = menu.addAction
7264  (tr("Purge Forward &Secrecy key pair."),
7265  this, SLOT(slotPurgeEphemeralKeyPair(void)));
7266  action->setProperty("type", "email");
7267  action = menu.addAction
7268  (tr("Reset Forward &Secrecy information."),
7269  this, SLOT(slotResetForwardSecrecyInformation(void)));
7270  action->setProperty("type", "email");
7271  menu.exec(m_ui.emailParticipants->mapToGlobal(point));
7272  }
7273  else if(m_ui.listeners == sender())
7274  {
7275  QAction *action = 0;
7276  QMenu menu(this);
7277

7279  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7280  toString().toLower())),
7281  tr("&Delete"),
7282  this, SLOT(slotDeleteListener(void)));
7283  menu.addAction(tr("Delete &All"),
7284  this, SLOT(slotDeleteAllListeners(void)));

7287  this, SLOT(slotDetachListenerNeighbors(void)));

7289  this, SLOT(slotDisconnectListenerNeighbors(void)));

7292  this, SLOT(slotPublicizeListenerPlaintext(void)));

7294  this, SLOT(slotPublicizeAllListenersPlaintext(void)));
7295  menu.addSeparator();

7297  this, SLOT(slotListenerFullEcho(void)));
7298  menu.addAction(tr("&Half Echo"),
7299  this, SLOT(slotListenerHalfEcho(void)));
7300  menu.addSeparator();
7301  action = menu.addAction
7302  (tr("&Copy Private Application Magnet"),
7303  this, SLOT(slotCopyPrivateApplicationMagnet(void)));
7304  action->setProperty("type", "listeners");
7305  action = menu.addAction
7306  (tr("&Set Private Application Information..."),
7307  this, SLOT(slotSetPrivateApplicationInformation(void)));
7308  action->setProperty("type", "listeners");
7309  action = menu.addAction
7310  (tr("&Reset Private Application Information"),
7311  this, SLOT(slotResetPrivateApplicationInformation(void)));
7312  action->setProperty("type", "listeners");
7313  menu.addSeparator();

7315  this, SLOT(slotSetListenerSSLControlString(void)));
7316  menu.exec(m_ui.listeners->mapToGlobal(point));
7317  }

7319  {

7330  toString().toLower())),

7332  this, SLOT(slotShareEmailPublicKey(void)));

7335  toString().toLower())),
7336  tr("Share &Open Library Public Key Pair"),
7337  this, SLOT(slotShareOpenLibraryPublicKey(void)));

7339  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7340  toString().toLower())),
7341  tr("Share &Poptastic Public Key Pair"),
7342  this, SLOT(slotSharePoptasticPublicKey(void)));

7345  toString().toLower())),

7347  this, SLOT(slotShareURLPublicKey(void)));

7350  this, SLOT(slotAssignNewIPToNeighbor(void)));

7357  this, SLOT(slotConnectAllNeighbors(void)));

7374  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7375  toString().toLower())),
7376  tr("&Delete"),
7377  this, SLOT(slotDeleteNeighbor(void)));
7378  menu.addAction(tr("Delete &All"),
7379  this, SLOT(slotDeleteAllNeighbors(void)));
7380  menu.addAction(tr("Delete All Non-Unique &Blocked"),
7381  this, SLOT(slotDeleteAllBlockedNeighbors(void)));
7382  menu.addAction(tr("Delete All Non-Unique &UUIDs"),
7383  this, SLOT(slotDeleteAllUuids(void)));
7384  menu.addSeparator();
7385  menu.addAction(tr("B&lock"),
7386  this, SLOT(slotBlockNeighbor(void)));
7387  menu.addAction(tr("U&nblock"),
7388  this, SLOT(slotUnblockNeighbor(void)));
7389  menu.addSeparator();
7390  menu.addAction(tr("&Full Echo"),
7391  this, SLOT(slotNeighborFullEcho(void)));
7392  menu.addAction(tr("&Half Echo"),
7393  this, SLOT(slotNeighborHalfEcho(void)));
7394  menu.addSeparator();
7395  action = menu.addAction
7396  (tr("&Copy Private Application Magnet"),
7397  this, SLOT(slotCopyPrivateApplicationMagnet(void)));
7398  action->setProperty("type", "neighbors");
7399  action = menu.addAction
7400  (tr("&Set Private Application Information..."),
7401  this, SLOT(slotSetPrivateApplicationInformation(void)));
7402  action->setProperty("type", "neighbors");
7403  action = menu.addAction
7404  (tr("&Reset Private Application Information"),
7405  this, SLOT(slotResetPrivateApplicationInformation(void)));
7406  action->setProperty("type", "neighbors");
7407  menu.addSeparator();
7408  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Copy Adaptive Echo Magnet"),
7409  this, SLOT(slotCopyAEMagnet(void)));
7410  action->setProperty("from", "neighbors");
7411  menu.addAction(tr("&Set Adaptive Echo Token Information..."),
7412  this, SLOT(slotSetAETokenInformation(void)));
7413  menu.addAction(tr("&Reset Adaptive Echo Token Information"),
7414  this, SLOT(slotResetAETokenInformation(void)));
7415  menu.addSeparator();
7416  menu.addAction(tr("Set &SSL Control String..."),
7417  this, SLOT(slotSetNeighborSSLControlString(void)));
7418  menu.addSeparator();
7419 
7420  QList<QPair<QString, QThread::Priority> > list;
7421  QMenu *subMenu = menu.addMenu(tr("Priority"));
7422  QPair<QString, QThread::Priority> pair;
7423 
7424  pair.first = tr("High Priority");
7425  pair.second = QThread::HighPriority;
7426  list << pair;
7427  pair.first = tr("Highest Priority");
7428  pair.second = QThread::HighestPriority;
7429  list << pair;
7430  pair.first = tr("Idle Priority");
7431  pair.second = QThread::IdlePriority;
7432  list << pair;
7433  pair.first = tr("Inherit Priority");
7434  pair.second = QThread::InheritPriority;
7435  list << pair;
7436  pair.first = tr("Low Priority");
7437  pair.second = QThread::LowPriority;
7438  list << pair;
7439  pair.first = tr("Lowest Priority");
7440  pair.second = QThread::LowestPriority;
7441  list << pair;
7442  pair.first = tr("Normal Priority");
7443  pair.second = QThread::NormalPriority;
7444  list << pair;
7445  pair.first = tr("Time-Critical Priority");
7446  pair.second = QThread::TimeCriticalPriority;
7447  list << pair;
7448 
7449  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
7450  {
7451  action = subMenu->addAction
7452  (list.at(i).first,
7453  this,
7454  SLOT(slotSetNeighborPriority(void)));
7455  action->setProperty("priority", list.at(i).second);
7456  }
7457 
7458 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
7459  menu.addSeparator();
7460  menu.addAction("&Statistics",
7461  this,
7462  SLOT(slotShowNeighborStatistics(void)));
7463 #endif
7464  menu.exec(m_ui.neighbors->mapToGlobal(point));
7465  }
7466  else if(m_ui.participants == sender())
7467  {
7468  QAction *action = 0;
7469  QMenu menu(this);
7470 
7471  menu.addAction
7472  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/add.png").
7473  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").toString().
7474  toLower())),
7475  tr("&Add participant as friend."),
7476  this, SLOT(slotShareChatPublicKeyWithParticipant(void)));
7477  menu.addSeparator();
7478  menu.addAction(tr("Chat &Popup..."), this,
7479  SLOT(slotChatPopup(void)));
7480  menu.addSeparator();
7481  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/generic/repleo-chat.png"),
7482  tr("&Copy Repleo to the clipboard buffer."),
7483  this, SLOT(slotCopyFriendshipBundle(void)));
7484  menu.addSeparator();
7485 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
7486  action = menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/melodica.png").
7487  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
7488  "nouve").
7489  toString().toLower())),
7490  tr("MELODICA: &Call friend with new "
7491  "Gemini pair."),
7492  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7493  action->setProperty("type", "calling");
7494  action = menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/melodica.png").
7495  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
7496  "nouve").
7497  toString().toLower())),
7498  tr("MELODICA: &Call friend with new "
7499  "Gemini pair using the "
7500  "existing Gemini pair."),
7501  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7502  action->setProperty("type", "calling_using_gemini");
7503  action = menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/melodica.png").
7504  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
7505  "nouve").
7506  toString().toLower())),
7507  tr("MELODICA Two-Way: &Call friend with new "
7508  "Gemini pair."),
7509  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7510  action->setProperty("type", "calling_two_way");
7511 #else
7512  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Call participant."),
7513  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7514  action->setProperty("type", "calling");
7515  action = menu.addAction
7516  (tr("&Call participant using the existing Gemini pair."),
7517  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7518  action->setProperty("type", "calling_using_gemini");
7519  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Two-way calling."),
7520  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7521  action->setProperty("type", "calling_two_way");
7522 #endif
7523  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Terminate call."),
7524  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipant(void)));
7525  action->setProperty("type", "terminating");
7526  menu.addSeparator();
7527 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
7528  menu.addAction
7529  (tr("&Generate random Gemini pair "
7530  "(AES-256 Key, SHA-512 Key) (without a call)."),
7531  this, SLOT(slotGenerateGeminiInChat(void)));
7532 #else
7533  menu.addAction(tr("&Generate random Gemini pair "
7534  "(AES-256 Key, SHA-512 Key)."),
7535  this, SLOT(slotGenerateGeminiInChat(void)));
7536 #endif
7537  menu.addSeparator();
7538  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/clear.png").
7539  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7540  toString().toLower())),
7541  tr("&Remove participant(s)."),
7542  this, SLOT(slotRemoveParticipants(void)));
7543  menu.addSeparator();
7544  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Rename Participant..."),
7545  this, SLOT(slotRenameParticipant(void)));
7546  action->setProperty("type", "chat");
7547  menu.addSeparator();
7548  menu.addAction(tr("&Derive Gemini pair from SMP secret."),
7549  this,
7550  SLOT(slotDeriveGeminiPairViaSMP(void)));
7551  menu.addAction(tr("&Reset the SMP machine's internal state to s0."),
7552  this,
7553  SLOT(slotInitializeSMP(void)));
7554  menu.addAction(tr("&Set an SMP Secret..."),
7555  this,
7556  SLOT(slotPrepareSMP(void)));
7557  menu.addAction(tr("&Verify the SMP secret."),
7558  this,
7559  SLOT(slotVerifySMPSecret(void)));
7560  menu.addSeparator();
7561  menu.addAction(tr("Replay &last %1 messages.").
7562  arg(spoton_common::CHAT_MAXIMUM_REPLAY_QUEUE_SIZE),
7563  this,
7564  SLOT(slotReplayMessages(void)));
7565  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/starbeam.png").
7566  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
7567  "nouve").
7568  toString().toLower())),
7569  tr("Share a &StarBeam..."),
7570  this,
7571  SLOT(slotShareStarBeam(void)));
7572  menu.addSeparator();
7573  menu.addAction
7574  (tr("Call via Forward &Secrecy credentials."),
7575  this, SLOT(slotCallParticipantViaForwardSecrecy(void)));
7576  action = menu.addAction
7577  (tr("Initiate Forward &Secrecy Exchange(s)..."),
7578  this, SLOT(slotEstablishForwardSecrecy(void)));
7579  action->setProperty("type", "chat");
7580  action = menu.addAction
7581  (tr("Purge Forward &Secrecy key pair."),
7582  this, SLOT(slotPurgeEphemeralKeyPair(void)));
7583  action->setProperty("type", "chat");
7584  action = menu.addAction
7585  (tr("Reset Forward &Secrecy information."),
7586  this, SLOT(slotResetForwardSecrecyInformation(void)));
7587  action->setProperty("type", "chat");
7588  menu.addSeparator();
7589  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/buzz.png").
7590  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
7591  "nouve").
7592  toString().toLower())),
7593  tr("Invite to an anonymous Buzz channel..."),
7594  this,
7595  SLOT(slotBuzzInvite(void)));
7596  menu.exec(m_ui.participants->mapToGlobal(point));
7597  }
7598  else if(m_ui.received == sender())
7599  {
7600  QAction *action = 0;
7601  QMenu menu(this);
7602 
7603  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/clear.png").
7604  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7605  toString().toLower())),
7606  tr("&Delete"), this,
7607  SLOT(slotDeleteReceived(void)));
7608  menu.addAction(tr("Delete &All"), this,
7609  SLOT(slotDeleteAllReceived(void)));
7610  menu.addSeparator();
7611  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Compute SHA-1 Hash"), this,
7612  SLOT(slotComputeFileHash(void)));
7613  action->setProperty("widget_of", "received");
7614  menu.addSeparator();
7615  action = menu.addAction(tr("&Copy File Hash"), this,
7616  SLOT(slotCopyFileHash(void)));
7617  action->setProperty("widget_of", "received");
7618  menu.addSeparator();
7619  menu.addAction(tr("Discover &Missing Links..."), this,
7620  SLOT(slotDiscoverMissingLinks(void)));
7621  menu.exec(m_ui.received->mapToGlobal(point));
7622  }
7623  else if(m_ui.transmitted == sender())
7624  {
7625  QAction *action = 0;
7626  QMenu menu(this);
7627 
7628  menu.addAction(QIcon(QString(":/%1/clear.png").
7629  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").
7630  toString().toLower())),
7631  tr("&Delete"), this,
7632  SLOT(slotDeleteTransmitted(void)));
7633  menu.addAction(tr("Delete &All"), this,
7634  SLOT(slotDeleteAllTransmitted(void)));
7635  menu.addSeparator();

7637  SLOT(slotComputeFileHash(void)));
7638  action->setProperty("widget_of", "transmitted");
7639  menu.addSeparator();

7641  SLOT(slotCopyFileHash(void)));
7642  action->setProperty("widget_of", "transmitted");
7643  menu.addSeparator();

7645  SLOT(slotSetSBPulseSize(void)));
7646  menu.addAction(tr("Set &Read Interval..."), this,
7647  SLOT(slotSetSBReadInterval(void)));
7648  menu.exec(m_ui.transmitted->mapToGlobal(point));
7649  }

7651  {

7653

7655  this, SLOT(slotCopyTransmittedMagnet(void)));
7656  menu.addAction(tr("&Duplicate Magnet"),
7657  this, SLOT(slotDuplicateTransmittedMagnet(void)));
7658  menu.exec(m_ui.transmittedMagnets->mapToGlobal(point));
7659  }

7673  tr("&Copy Repleo to the clipboard buffer."),
7674  this, SLOT(slotCopyUrlFriendshipBundle(void)));

7688  this, SLOT(slotRenameParticipant(void)));
