7690  menu.exec(m_ui.urlParticipants->mapToGlobal(point));
7691  }
7692 }
7693 
7694 void spoton::slotKernelSocketState(void)
7695 {
7696  QAbstractSocket::SocketState state = m_kernelSocket.state();
7697 
7698  if(state == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)
7699  {
7700  m_kernelSocket.setSocketOption
7701  (QAbstractSocket::LowDelayOption,
7702  m_settings.value("gui/tcp_nodelay", 1).toInt()); /*
7703  ** Disable Nagle?
7704  */
7705  if(m_kernelSocket.isEncrypted())
7706  {
7707  askKernelToReadStarBeamKeys();
7708  sendBuzzKeysToKernel();
7709  sendKeysToKernel();
7710 
7711  QSslCipher cipher(m_kernelSocket.sessionCipher());
7712  QString str(QString("%1-%2-%3-%4-%5-%6-%7").
7713  arg(cipher.name()).
7714  arg(cipher.authenticationMethod()).
7715  arg(cipher.encryptionMethod()).
7716  arg(cipher.keyExchangeMethod()).
7717  arg(cipher.protocolString()).
7718  arg(cipher.supportedBits()).
7719  arg(cipher.usedBits()));
7720 
7721  m_sb.kernelstatus->setToolTip
7722  (tr("Connected to the kernel on port %1 "
7723  "from local port %2 via cipher %3.").
7724  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()).
7725  arg(m_kernelSocket.localPort()).
7726  arg(str));
7727  }
7728  else
7729  m_sb.kernelstatus->setToolTip
7730  (tr("Connected to the kernel on port %1 "
7731  "from local port %2. Communications between the interface and "
7732  "the kernel have been disabled.").
7733  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()).
7734  arg(m_kernelSocket.localPort()));
7735 
7736 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 1
7737  m_sb.kernelstatus->setIcon
7738  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/status-online.png").
7739  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").toString().
7740  toLower())));
7741 #else
7742  m_sb.kernelstatus->setIcon
7743  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/activate.png").
7744  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").toString().
7745  toLower())));
7746 #endif
7747  }
7748  else if(state == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
7749  {
7750  m_keysShared["buzz_channels_sent_to_kernel"] = "false";
7751  m_keysShared["keys_sent_to_kernel"] = "false";
7752  m_sb.kernelstatus->setIcon
7753  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/deactivate.png").
7754  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet", "nouve").toString().
7755  toLower())));
7756  m_sb.kernelstatus->setToolTip
7757  (tr("Not connected to the kernel. Is the kernel "
7758  "active?"));
7759  }
7760 }
7761 
7762 void spoton::sendBuzzKeysToKernel(void)
7763 {
7764  QString str(m_keysShared.value("buzz_channels_sent_to_kernel", "false"));
7765 
7766  if(str == "true")
7767  return;
7768 
7769  bool sent = true;
7770 
7771  if((sent = (m_kernelSocket.state() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)))
7772  foreach(spoton_buzzpage *page, m_buzzPages.values())
7773  if(page && (sent &= m_kernelSocket.isEncrypted()))
7774  {
7775  QByteArray message;
7776 
7777  message.append("addbuzz_");
7778  message.append(page->key().toBase64());
7779  message.append("_");
7780  message.append(page->channelType().toBase64());
7781  message.append("_");
7782  message.append(page->hashKey().toBase64());
7783  message.append("_");
7784  message.append(page->hashType().toBase64());
7785  message.append("\n");
7786 
7787  if(m_kernelSocket.write(message.constData(), message.length()) !=
7788  message.length())
7789  {
7790  sent = false;
7791  spoton_misc::logError
7792  (QString("spoton::sendBuzzKeysToKernel(): write() failure "
7793  "for %1:%2.").
7794  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
7795  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
7796  }
7797  }
7798 
7799  m_keysShared["buzz_channels_sent_to_kernel"] = sent ? "true" : "false";
7800 }
7801 
7802 void spoton::sendKeysToKernel(void)
7803 {
7804  QString str(m_keysShared.value("keys_sent_to_kernel", "false"));
7805 
7806  if(str == "ignore" || str == "true")
7807  {
7808  if(isKernelActive())
7809  if(str == "ignore")
7810  m_sb.status->setText
7811  (tr("<html><a href=\"authenticate\">"
7812  "The kernel requires your authentication "
7813  "and encryption keys.</a></html>"));
7814 
7815  return;
7816  }
7817 
7818  if(m_crypts.value("chat", 0))
7819  if(m_kernelSocket.state() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)
7820  if(m_kernelSocket.isEncrypted())
7821  {
7822  if(!m_optionsUi.sharePrivateKeys->isChecked())
7823  {
7824  QMessageBox mb(this);
7825 
7826 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
7827 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
7828  mb.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, true);
7829 #endif
7830 #endif
7831  mb.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
7832  mb.setWindowTitle(tr("%1: Question").
7833  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
7834  mb.setWindowModality(Qt::WindowModal);
7835  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::No | QMessageBox::Yes);
7836  mb.setText
7837  (tr("The kernel process %1 requires your private "
7838  "authentication "
7839  "and encryption keys. Would you like to share the keys?").
7840  arg(m_ui.pid->text()));
7841 
7842  if(mb.exec() != QMessageBox::Yes)
7843  {
7844  m_keysShared["keys_sent_to_kernel"] = "ignore";
7845  return;
7846  }
7847  }
7848 
7849  QByteArray hashKey(m_crypts.value("chat")->hashKey());
7850  QByteArray keys("keys_");
7851  QByteArray symmetricKey(m_crypts.value("chat")->symmetricKey());
7852 
7853  hashKey = hashKey.toBase64();
7854  symmetricKey = symmetricKey.toBase64();
7855  keys.append(symmetricKey);
7856  keys.append("_");
7857  keys.append(hashKey);
7858  keys.append("\n");
7859 
7860  if(m_kernelSocket.write(keys.constData(), keys.length()) !=
7861  keys.length())
7862  spoton_misc::logError
7863  (QString("spoton::sendKeysToKernel(): write() failure "
7864  "for %1:%2.").
7865  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
7866  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
7867  else
7868  {
7869  m_keysShared["keys_sent_to_kernel"] = "true";
7870  m_sb.status->clear();
7871  }
7872  }
7873 }
7874 
7875 void spoton::slotConnectNeighbor(void)
7876 {
7877  QString oid("");
7878  int row = -1;
7879 
7880  if((row = m_ui.neighbors->currentRow()) >= 0)
7881  {
7882  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.neighbors->item
7883  (row, m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1); // OID
7884 
7885  if(item)
7886  oid = item->text();
7887  }
7888 
7889  if(oid.isEmpty())
7890  return;
7891 
7892  QString connectionName("");
7893 
7894  {
7895  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
7896 
7897  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
7898  "neighbors.db");
7899 
7900  if(db.open())
7901  {
7902  QSqlQuery query(db);
7903 
7904  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
7905  "status_control = 'connected' "
7906  "WHERE OID = ? AND status_control <> 'deleted'");
7907  query.bindValue(0, oid);
7908  query.exec();
7909  }
7910 
7911  db.close();
7912  }
7913 
7914  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
7915 }
7916 
7917 void spoton::slotDisconnectNeighbor(void)
7918 {
7919  QString oid("");
7920  int row = -1;
7921 
7922  if((row = m_ui.neighbors->currentRow()) >= 0)
7923  {
7924  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.neighbors->item
7925  (row, m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1); // OID
7926 
7927  if(item)
7928  oid = item->text();
7929  }
7930 
7931  if(oid.isEmpty())
7932  return;
7933 
7934  QString connectionName("");
7935 
7936  {
7937  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
7938 
7939  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
7940  "neighbors.db");
7941 
7942  if(db.open())
7943  {
7944  QSqlQuery query(db);
7945 
7946  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
7947  "status_control = 'disconnected' "
7948  "WHERE OID = ? AND status_control <> 'deleted'");
7949  query.bindValue(0, oid);
7950  query.exec();
7951  }
7952 
7953  db.close();
7954  }
7955 
7956  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
7957 }
7958 
7959 void spoton::slotBlockNeighbor(void)
7960 {
7961  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
7962 
7963  if(!crypt)
7964  return;
7965 
7966  QString remoteIp("");
7967  int row = -1;
7968 
7969  if((row = m_ui.neighbors->currentRow()) >= 0)
7970  {
7971  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.neighbors->item
7972  (row, 10); // Remote IP Address
7973 
7974  if(item)
7975  remoteIp = item->text();
7976  }
7977 
7978  if(remoteIp.isEmpty())
7979  return;
7980 
7981  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
7982 
7983  QString connectionName("");
7984 
7985  {
7986  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
7987 
7988  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
7989  "neighbors.db");
7990 
7991  if(db.open())
7992  {
7993  /*
7994  ** We must block all neighbors having the given remote IP
7995  ** address. The neighbors must be in unblocked control states.
7996  ** Neighbors that are marked as deleted must be left as is since
7997  ** they will be purged by either the interface or the kernel.
7998  */
7999 
8000  QSqlQuery query(db);
8001 
8002  query.setForwardOnly(true);
8003 
8004  if(query.exec("SELECT remote_ip_address, OID "
8005  "FROM neighbors WHERE status_control NOT IN "
8006  "('blocked', 'deleted')"))
8007  while(query.next())
8008  {
8009  QString ip("");
8010  bool ok = true;
8011 
8012  ip = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
8013  (QByteArray::
8014  fromBase64(query.
8015  value(0).
8016  toByteArray()),
8017  &ok).constData();
8018 
8019  if(ok)
8020  if(ip == remoteIp)
8021  {
8022  QSqlQuery updateQuery(db);
8023 
8024  updateQuery.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
8025  "status_control = 'blocked' WHERE "
8026  "OID = ? AND "
8027  "status_control <> 'deleted'");
8028  updateQuery.bindValue(0, query.value(1));
8029  updateQuery.exec();
8030  }
8031  }
8032  }
8033 
8034  db.close();
8035  }
8036 
8037  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
8038  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
8039 }
8040 
8041 void spoton::slotUnblockNeighbor(void)
8042 {
8043  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
8044 
8045  if(!crypt)
8046  return;
8047 
8048  QString remoteIp("");
8049  int row = -1;
8050 
8051  if((row = m_ui.neighbors->currentRow()) >= 0)
8052  {
8053  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.neighbors->item
8054  (row, 10); // Remote IP Address
8055 
8056  if(item)
8057  remoteIp = item->text();
8058  }
8059 
8060  if(remoteIp.isEmpty())
8061  return;
8062 
8063  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
8064 
8065  QString connectionName("");
8066 
8067  {
8068  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
8069 
8070  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
8071  "neighbors.db");
8072 
8073  if(db.open())
8074  {
8075  /*
8076  ** We must unblock all neighbors having the given remote IP
8077  ** address. The neighbors must be in blocked control states. We shall
8078  ** place the unblocked neighbors in disconnected control states.
8079  */
8080 
8081  QSqlQuery query(db);
8082 
8083  query.setForwardOnly(true);
8084 
8085  if(query.exec("SELECT remote_ip_address, OID "
8086  "FROM neighbors WHERE status_control = 'blocked'"))
8087  while(query.next())
8088  {
8089  bool ok = true;
8090 
8091  QString ip
8092  (crypt->
8093  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
8094  fromBase64(query.
8095  value(0).
8096  toByteArray()),
8097  &ok).
8098  constData());
8099 
8100  if(ok)
8101  if(ip == remoteIp)
8102  {
8103  QSqlQuery updateQuery(db);
8104 
8105  updateQuery.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
8106  "status_control = 'disconnected' "
8107  "WHERE OID = ? AND "
8108  "status_control <> 'deleted'");
8109  updateQuery.bindValue(0, query.value(1));
8110  updateQuery.exec();
8111  }
8112  }
8113  }
8114 
8115  db.close();
8116  }
8117 
8118  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
8119  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
8120 }
8121 
8122 void spoton::slotDeleteAllListeners(void)
8123 {
8124  QString connectionName("");
8125 
8126  {
8127  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
8128 
8129  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
8130  "listeners.db");
8131 
8132  if(db.open())
8133  {
8134  QSqlQuery query(db);
8135 
8136  if(!isKernelActive())
8137  {
8138  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
8139  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners");
8140  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners_accounts");
8141  query.exec
8142  ("DELETE FROM listeners_accounts_consumed_authentications");
8143  query.exec("DELETE FROM listeners_allowed_ips");
8144  }
8145  else
8146  query.exec("UPDATE listeners SET "
8147  "status_control = 'deleted' WHERE "
8148  "status_control <> 'deleted'");
8149  }
8150 
8151  db.close();
8152  }
8153 
8154  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
8155  m_ui.accounts->clear();
8156  m_ui.ae_tokens->clearContents();
8157 }
8158 
8159 void spoton::slotDeleteAllNeighbors(void)
8160 {
8161  QString connectionName("");
8162 
8163  {
8164  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
8165 
8166  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
8167  "neighbors.db");
8168 
8169  if(db.open())
8170  {
8171  QSqlQuery query(db);
8172 
8173  if(!isKernelActive())
8174  {
8175  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
8176  query.exec("DELETE FROM neighbors");
8177  }
8178  else
8179  query.exec("UPDATE neighbors SET "
8180  "status_control = 'deleted' WHERE "
8181  "status_control <> 'deleted'");
8182  }
8183 
8184  db.close();
8185  }
8186 
8187  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
8188  m_ui.neighborSummary->clear();
8189 }
8190 
8191 void spoton::slotPopulateParticipants(void)
8192 {
8193  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
8194 
8195  if(!crypt)
8196  return;
8197 
8198  QFileInfo fileInfo(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
8199  "friends_public_keys.db");
8200 
8201  if(fileInfo.exists())
8202  {
8203  if(fileInfo.lastModified() >= m_participantsLastModificationTime)
8204  {
8205  if(fileInfo.lastModified() == m_participantsLastModificationTime)
8206  m_participantsLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified().
8207  addMSecs(1);
8208  else
8209  m_participantsLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified();
8210  }
8211  else
8212  return;
8213  }
8214  else
8215  m_participantsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
8216 
8217  QString connectionName("");
8218 
8219  {
8220  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
8221 
8222  db.setDatabaseName(fileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
8223 
8224  if(db.open())
8225  {
8226  updateParticipantsTable(db);
8227 
8228  QList<int> rows; // Chat
8229  QList<int> rowsE; // E-Mail
8230  QList<int> rowsU; // URLs
8231  QModelIndexList list
8232  (m_ui.participants->selectionModel()->
8233  selectedRows(3)); // public_key_hash
8234  QModelIndexList listE
8235  (m_ui.emailParticipants->selectionModel()->
8236  selectedRows(3)); // public_key_hash
8237  QModelIndexList listU
8238  (m_ui.urlParticipants->selectionModel()->
8239  selectedRows(3)); // public_key_hash
8240  QStringList hashes;
8241  QStringList hashesE;
8242  QStringList hashesU;
8243  int hval = m_ui.participants->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
8244  int hvalE = m_ui.emailParticipants->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
8245  int hvalU = m_ui.urlParticipants->horizontalScrollBar()->value();
8246  int row = 0;
8247  int rowE = 0;
8248  int rowU = 0;
8249  int vval = m_ui.participants->verticalScrollBar()->value();
8250  int vvalE = m_ui.emailParticipants->verticalScrollBar()->value();
8251  int vvalU = m_ui.urlParticipants->verticalScrollBar()->value();
8252 
8253  while(!list.isEmpty())
8254  {
8255  QVariant data(list.takeFirst().data());
8256 
8257  if(!data.isNull() && data.isValid())
8258  hashes.append(data.toString());
8259  }
8260 
8261  while(!listE.isEmpty())
8262  {
8263  QVariant data(listE.takeFirst().data());
8264 
8265  if(!data.isNull() && data.isValid())
8266  hashesE.append(data.toString());
8267  }
8268 
8269  while(!listU.isEmpty())
8270  {
8271  QVariant data(listU.takeFirst().data());
8272 
8273  if(!data.isNull() && data.isValid())
8274  hashesU.append(data.toString());
8275  }
8276 
8277  m_ui.emailParticipants->setSortingEnabled(false);
8278  m_ui.emailParticipants->clearContents();
8279  m_ui.emailParticipants->setRowCount(0);
8280  m_ui.participants->setSortingEnabled(false);
8281  m_ui.participants->clearContents();
8282  m_ui.participants->setRowCount(0);
8283  m_ui.urlParticipants->setSortingEnabled(false);
8284  m_ui.urlParticipants->clearContents();
8285  m_ui.urlParticipants->setRowCount(0);
8286  disconnect(m_ui.participants,
8287  SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)),
8288  this,
8289  SLOT(slotGeminiChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)));
8290 
8291  QSqlQuery query(db);
8292  QWidget *focusWidget = QApplication::focusWidget();
8293  bool ok = true;
8294 
8295  query.setForwardOnly(true);
8296  query.exec("PRAGMA read_uncommitted = True");
8297  query.prepare("SELECT "
8298  "name, " // 0
8299  "OID, " // 1
8300  "neighbor_oid, " // 2
8301  "public_key_hash, " // 3
8302  "status, " // 4
8303  "last_status_update, " // 5
8304  "gemini, " // 6
8305  "gemini_hash_key, " // 7
8306  "key_type, " // 8
8307  "public_key " // 9
8308  "FROM friends_public_keys "
8309  "WHERE key_type_hash IN (?, ?, ?, ?)");
8310  query.bindValue
8311  (0, crypt->keyedHash(QByteArray("chat"), &ok).toBase64());
8312 
8313  if(ok)
8314  query.bindValue
8315  (1, crypt->keyedHash(QByteArray("email"), &ok).toBase64());
8316 
8317  if(ok)
8318  query.bindValue
8319  (2, crypt->keyedHash(QByteArray("poptastic"), &ok).toBase64());
8320 
8321  if(ok)
8322  query.bindValue
8323  (3, crypt->keyedHash(QByteArray("url"), &ok).toBase64());
8324 
8325  if(ok && query.exec())
8326  while(query.next())
8327  {
8328  QByteArray publicKey;
8329  QIcon icon;
8330  QString keyType("");
8331  QString name("");
8332  QString oid(query.value(1).toString());
8333  QString status(query.value(4).toString().toLower());
8334  QString statusText("");
8335  bool ok = true;
8336  bool temporary =
8337  query.value(2).toLongLong() == -1 ? false : true;
8338 
8339  keyType = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
8340  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(8).toByteArray()),
8341  &ok).constData();
8342 
8343  if(ok)
8344  {
8345  QByteArray bytes
8346  (crypt->
8347  decryptedAfterAuthenticated(QByteArray::
8348  fromBase64(query.
8349  value(0).
8350  toByteArray()),
8351  &ok));
8352 
8353  if(ok)
8354  name = QString::fromUtf8
8355  (bytes.constData(), bytes.length());
8356  }
8357 
8358  if(!ok)
8359  name = "";
8360 
8361  publicKey = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
8362  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(9).toByteArray()), &ok);
8363 
8364  if(!isKernelActive())
8365  status = "offline";
8366 
8367  for(int i = 0; i < query.record().count(); i++)
8368  {
8369  if(i == query.record().count() - 1)
8370  /*
8371  ** Ignore public_key.
8372  */
8373 
8374  continue;
8375 
8376  QTableWidgetItem *item = 0;
8377 
8378  if(keyType == "chat" || keyType == "poptastic")
8379  {
8380  if(i == 0)
8381  {
8382  /*
8383  ** Do not increase the table's row count
8384  ** if the participant is offline and the
8385  ** user wishes to hide offline participants or
8386  ** if this is a Poptastic key-less participant.
8387  */
8388 
8389  if(!((m_ui.hideOfflineParticipants->isChecked() &&
8390  status == "offline") ||
8391  publicKey.contains("-poptastic")))
8392  {
8393  row += 1;
8394  m_ui.participants->setRowCount(row);
8395  }
8396  }
8397 
8398  if(i == 0) // Name
8399  {
8400  if(name.isEmpty())
8401  {
8402  if(keyType == "chat")
8403  name = "unknown";
8404  else
8405  name = "unknown@unknown.org";
8406  }
8407 
8408  item = new QTableWidgetItem(name);
8409 
8410  if(keyType == "poptastic")
8411  item->setBackground
8412  (QBrush(QColor(137, 207, 240)));
8413  }
8414  else if(i == 4) // Status
8415  {
8416  QString status(query.value(i).toString().
8417  trimmed());
8418 
8419  if(status.isEmpty())
8420  status = "offline";
8421 
8422  if(status.toLower() == "away")
8423  item = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Away"));
8424  else if(status.toLower() == "busy")
8425  item = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Busy"));
8426  else if(status.toLower() == "offline")
8427  item = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Offline"));
8428  else if(status.toLower() == "online")
8429  item = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("Online"));
8430  else
8431  item = new QTableWidgetItem(status);
8432 
8433  item->setToolTip(item->text());
8434  statusText = item->text();
8435  }
8436  else if(i == 6 ||
8437  i == 7) /*
8438  ** Gemini Encryption Key
8439  ** Gemini Hash Key
8440  */
8441  {
8442  if(query.isNull(i))
8443  item = new QTableWidgetItem();
8444  else
8445  {
8446  item = new QTableWidgetItem
8447  (crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
8448  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.
8449  value(i).
8450  toByteArray()),
8451  &ok).toBase64().constData());
8452 
8453  if(!ok)
8454  item->setText(tr("error"));
8455  }
8456  }
8457  else
8458  item = new QTableWidgetItem
8459  (query.value(i).toString());
8460 
8461  item->setFlags
8462  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
8463 
8464  if(i == 0) // Name
8465  {
8466  if(!temporary)
8467  {
8468  if(status == "away")
8469  item->setIcon
8470  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/away.png").
8471  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8472  "nouve").
8473  toString().toLower())));
8474  else if(status == "busy")
8475  item->setIcon
8476  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/busy.png").
8477  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8478  "nouve").
8479  toString().toLower())));
8480  else if(status == "offline")
8481  item->setIcon
8482  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/offline.png").
8483  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8484  "nouve").
8485  toString().toLower())));
8486  else if(status == "online")
8487  item->setIcon
8488  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/online.png").
8489  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8490  "nouve").
8491  toString().toLower())));
8492  else
8493  item->setIcon
8494  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/chat.png").
8495  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8496  "nouve").
8497  toString().toLower())));
8498 
8499  item->setToolTip
8500  (query.value(3).toString().mid(0, 16) +
8501  "..." +
8502  query.value(3).toString().right(16));
8503  }
8504  else
8505  {
8506  item->setIcon
8507  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/add.png").
8508  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8509  "nouve").
8510  toString())));
8511  item->setToolTip
8512  (tr("User %1 requests your friendship.").
8513  arg(item->text()));
8514  }
8515 
8516  icon = item->icon();
8517  }
8518  else if(i == 6 ||
8519  i == 7) /*
8520  ** Gemini Encryption Key
8521  ** Gemini Hash Key
8522  */
8523  {
8524  if(!temporary)
8525  item->setFlags
8526  (item->flags() | Qt::ItemIsEditable);
8527  }
8528  else if(i == 8)
8529  {
8530  /*
8531  ** Forward Secrecy Information
8532  */
8533 
8534  QList<QByteArray> list;
8535  bool ok = true;
8536 
8537  list = retrieveForwardSecrecyInformation
8538  (db, oid, &ok);
8539 
8540  if(ok)
8541  item->setText
8542  (spoton_misc::
8543  forwardSecrecyMagnetFromList(list).
8544  constData());
8545  else
8546  item->setText(tr("error"));
8547  }
8548 
8549  item->setData(Qt::UserRole, temporary);
8550  item->setData
8551  (Qt::ItemDataRole(Qt::UserRole + 1), keyType);
8552 
8553  /*
8554  ** Delete the item if the participant is offline
8555  ** and the user wishes to hide offline participants.
8556  ** Please note that the e-mail participants are cloned
8557  ** and are not subjected to this restriction.
8558  */
8559 
8560  if((m_ui.hideOfflineParticipants->isChecked() &&
8561  status == "offline") ||
8562  publicKey.contains("-poptastic"))
8563  {
8564  /*
8565  ** This may be a plain Poptastic participant.
8566  ** It will only be displayed in the E-Mail tab.
8567  */
8568 
8569  delete item;
8570  item = 0;
8571  }
8572  else
8573  m_ui.participants->setItem(row - 1, i, item);
8574  }
8575 
8576  if(keyType == "email" || keyType == "poptastic")
8577  {
8578  if(i == 0)
8579  {
8580  rowE += 1;
8581  m_ui.emailParticipants->setRowCount(rowE);
8582  }
8583 
8584  if(i == 0)
8585  {
8586  if(name.isEmpty())
8587  {
8588  if(keyType == "email" ||
8589  keyType == "email-signature")
8590  name = "unknown";
8591  else
8592  name = "unknown@unknown.org";
8593  }
8594 
8595  item = new QTableWidgetItem(name);
8596 
8597  if(keyType == "email")
8598  item->setIcon
8599  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/key.png").
8600  arg(m_settings.
8601  value("gui/iconSet",
8602  "nouve").toString())));
8603  else if(keyType == "poptastic")
8604  {
8605  if(publicKey.contains("-poptastic"))
8606  {
8607  item->setBackground
8608  (QBrush(QColor(255, 255, 224)));
8609  item->setData
8610  (Qt::ItemDataRole(Qt::UserRole + 2),
8611  "traditional e-mail");
8612  }
8613  else
8614  {
8615  item->setBackground
8616  (QBrush(QColor(137, 207, 240)));
8617  item->setIcon
8618  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/key.png").
8619  arg(m_settings.
8620  value("gui/iconSet",
8621  "nouve").toString())));
8622  }
8623  }
8624  }
8625  else if(i == 1 || i == 2 || i == 3)
8626  item = new QTableWidgetItem
8627  (query.value(i).toString());
8628  else if(i == 4)
8629  {
8630  if(keyType == "poptastic" &&
8631  publicKey.contains("-poptastic"))
8632  item = new QTableWidgetItem("");
8633  else
8634  {
8635  QList<QByteArray> list;
8636  bool ok = true;
8637 
8638  list = retrieveForwardSecrecyInformation
8639  (db, oid, &ok);
8640 
8641  if(ok)
8642  item = new QTableWidgetItem
8643  (spoton_misc::
8644  forwardSecrecyMagnetFromList(list).
8645  constData());
8646  else
8647  item = new QTableWidgetItem(tr("error"));
8648  }
8649  }
8650 
8651  if(i >= 0 && i <= 4)
8652  {
8653  if(i == 0)
8654  {
8655  if(temporary)
8656  {
8657  item->setIcon
8658  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/add.png").
8659  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8660  "nouve").
8661  toString().toLower())));
8662  item->setToolTip
8663  (tr("User %1 requests your friendship.").
8664  arg(item->text()));
8665  }
8666  else
8667  item->setToolTip
8668  (query.value(3).toString().mid(0, 16) +
8669  "..." +
8670  query.value(3).toString().right(16));
8671  }
8672 
8673  item->setData(Qt::UserRole, temporary);
8674  item->setData
8675  (Qt::ItemDataRole(Qt::UserRole + 1), keyType);
8676  item->setFlags
8677  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
8678  m_ui.emailParticipants->setItem
8679  (rowE - 1, i, item);
8680  }
8681  }
8682  else if(keyType == "url")
8683  {
8684  if(i == 0)
8685  {
8686  rowU += 1;
8687  m_ui.urlParticipants->setRowCount(rowU);
8688  }
8689 
8690  if(i == 0)
8691  {
8692  if(name.isEmpty())
8693  name = "unknown";
8694 
8695  item = new QTableWidgetItem(name);
8696  }
8697  else if(i == 1 || i == 2 || i == 3)
8698  item = new QTableWidgetItem
8699  (query.value(i).toString());
8700 
8701  if(item)
8702  {
8703  if(i == 0)
8704  {
8705  if(temporary)
8706  {
8707  item->setIcon
8708  (QIcon(QString(":/%1/add.png").
8709  arg(m_settings.value("gui/iconSet",
8710  "nouve").
8711  toString().toLower())));
8712  item->setToolTip
8713  (tr("User %1 requests your friendship.").
8714  arg(item->text()));
8715  }
8716  else
8717  item->setToolTip
8718  (query.value(3).toString().mid(0, 16) +
8719  "..." +
8720  query.value(3).toString().right(16));
8721  }
8722 
8723  item->setData(Qt::UserRole, temporary);
8724  item->setFlags
8725  (Qt::ItemIsEnabled | Qt::ItemIsSelectable);
8726  m_ui.urlParticipants->setItem
8727  (rowU - 1, i, item);
8728  }
8729  }
8730 
8731  if(item)
8732  if(!item->tableWidget())
8733  {
8734  spoton_misc::logError
8735  ("spoton::slotPopulateParticipants(): "
8736  "QTableWidgetItem does not have a parent "
8737  "table. Deleting.");
8738  delete item;
8739  item = 0;
8740  }
8741  }
8742 
8743  if(keyType == "chat" || keyType == "poptastic")
8744  emit statusChanged(icon, name, oid, statusText);
8745 
8746  if(hashes.contains(query.value(3).toString()))
8747  rows.append(row - 1);
8748 
8749  if(hashesE.contains(query.value(3).toString()))
8750  rowsE.append(rowE - 1);
8751 
8752  if(hashesU.contains(query.value(3).toString()))
8753  rowsU.append(rowU - 1);
8754  }
8755 
8756  connect(m_ui.participants,
8757  SIGNAL(itemChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)),
8758  this,
8759  SLOT(slotGeminiChanged(QTableWidgetItem *)));
8760  m_ui.emailParticipants->setSelectionMode
8761  (QAbstractItemView::MultiSelection);
8762  m_ui.participants->setSelectionMode
8763  (QAbstractItemView::MultiSelection);
8764  m_ui.urlParticipants->setSelectionMode
8765  (QAbstractItemView::MultiSelection);
8766 
8767  while(!rows.isEmpty())
8768  m_ui.participants->selectRow(rows.takeFirst());
8769 
8770  while(!rowsE.isEmpty())
8771  m_ui.emailParticipants->selectRow(rowsE.takeFirst());
8772 
8773  while(!rowsU.isEmpty())
8774  m_ui.urlParticipants->selectRow(rowsU.takeFirst());
8775 
8776  m_ui.emailParticipants->setSelectionMode
8777  (QAbstractItemView::ExtendedSelection);
8778  m_ui.emailParticipants->setSortingEnabled(true);
8779  m_ui.emailParticipants->resizeColumnToContents(0);
8780  m_ui.emailParticipants->horizontalHeader()->
8781  setStretchLastSection(true);
8782  m_ui.emailParticipants->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hvalE);
8783  m_ui.emailParticipants->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vvalE);
8784  m_ui.participants->resizeColumnToContents
8785  (m_ui.participants->columnCount() - 3); // Gemini Encryption Key.
8786  m_ui.participants->resizeColumnToContents
8787  (m_ui.participants->columnCount() - 2); // Gemini Hash Key.
8788  m_ui.participants->setSelectionMode
8789  (QAbstractItemView::ExtendedSelection);
8790  m_ui.participants->setSortingEnabled(true);
8791  m_ui.participants->horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
8792  m_ui.participants->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hval);
8793  m_ui.participants->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vval);
8794  m_ui.urlParticipants->setSelectionMode
8795  (QAbstractItemView::ExtendedSelection);
8796  m_ui.urlParticipants->setSortingEnabled(true);
8797  m_ui.urlParticipants->resizeColumnToContents(0);
8798  m_ui.urlParticipants->horizontalHeader()->
8799  setStretchLastSection(true);
8800  m_ui.urlParticipants->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(hvalU);
8801  m_ui.urlParticipants->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(vvalU);
8802 
8803  if(focusWidget)
8804  focusWidget->setFocus();
8805  }
8806 
8807  db.close();
8808  }
8809 
8810  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
8811 }
8812 
8813 void spoton::slotProxyTypeChanged(int index)
8814 {
8815  m_ui.proxyHostname->clear();
8816  m_ui.proxyHostname->setEnabled(index != 2);
8817  m_ui.proxyPassword->clear();
8818  m_ui.proxyPort->setEnabled(index != 2);
8819  m_ui.proxyPort->setValue(m_ui.proxyPort->minimum());
8820  m_ui.proxyUsername->clear();
8821 }
8822 
8823 void spoton::slotProxyChecked(bool state)
8824 {
8825  m_ui.proxyHostname->clear();
8826  m_ui.proxyHostname->setEnabled(state);
8827  m_ui.proxyPassword->clear();
8828  m_ui.proxyPort->setEnabled(state);
8829  m_ui.proxyPort->setValue(m_ui.proxyPort->minimum());
8830  disconnect(m_ui.proxyType,
8831  SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
8832  this,
8833  SLOT(slotProxyTypeChanged(int)));
8834  m_ui.proxyType->setCurrentIndex(0);
8835  connect(m_ui.proxyType,
8836  SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
8837  this,
8838  SLOT(slotProxyTypeChanged(int)));
8839  m_ui.proxyUsername->clear();
8840 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
8841  m_ui.proxy_frame->setVisible(state);
8842 #endif
8843 }
8844 
8845 void spoton::slotKernelSocketError(QAbstractSocket::SocketError error)
8846 {
8847  Q_UNUSED(error);
8848  spoton_misc::logError
8849  (QString("spoton::slotKernelSocketError(): socket error (%1).").
8850  arg(m_kernelSocket.errorString()));
8851 }
8852 
8853 void spoton::slotKernelSocketSslErrors(const QList<QSslError> &errors)
8854 {
8855  m_kernelSocket.ignoreSslErrors();
8856 
8857  for(int i = 0; i < errors.size(); i++)
8858  spoton_misc::logError
8859  (QString("spoton::slotKernelSocketSslErrors(): "
8860  "error (%1) occurred for %2:%3.").
8861  arg(errors.at(i).errorString()).
8862  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().isNull() ? m_kernelSocket.peerName() :
8863  m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
8864  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
8865 }
8866 
8867 void spoton::changeEchoMode(const QString &mode, QTableWidget *tableWidget)
8868 {
8869  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
8870 
8871  if(!crypt)
8872  return;
8873  else if(!tableWidget)
8874  return;
8875 
8876  QString table("");
8877 
8878  if(m_ui.listeners == tableWidget)
8879  table = "listeners";
8880  else
8881  table = "neighbors";
8882 
8883  QString oid("");
8884  int row = -1;
8885 
8886  if((row = tableWidget->currentRow()) >= 0)
8887  {
8888  QTableWidgetItem *item = tableWidget->item
8889  (row, tableWidget->columnCount() - 1); // OID
8890 
8891  if(item)
8892  oid = item->text();
8893  }
8894 
8895  if(oid.isEmpty())
8896  return;
8897 
8898  QString connectionName("");
8899 
8900  {
8901  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
8902 
8903  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
8904  QString("%1.db").arg(table));
8905 
8906  if(db.open())
8907  {
8908  QSqlQuery query(db);
8909  bool ok = true;
8910 
8911  if(table == "listeners")
8912  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
8913  "echo_mode = ? "
8914  "WHERE OID = ?");
8915  else
8916  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
8917  "echo_mode = ? "
8918  "WHERE OID = ?");
8919 
8920  query.bindValue
8921  (0, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(mode.toLatin1(), &ok).
8922  toBase64());
8923  query.bindValue(1, oid);
8924 
8925  if(ok)
8926  query.exec();
8927  }
8928 
8929  db.close();
8930  }
8931 
8932  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
8933 
8934  if(m_ui.listeners == tableWidget)
8935  m_listenersLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
8936  else
8937  m_neighborsLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
8938 }
8939 
8940 void spoton::slotListenerFullEcho(void)
8941 {
8942  changeEchoMode("full", m_ui.listeners);
8943 }
8944 
8945 void spoton::slotListenerHalfEcho(void)
8946 {
8947  changeEchoMode("half", m_ui.listeners);
8948 }
8949 
8950 void spoton::slotNeighborFullEcho(void)
8951 {
8952  changeEchoMode("full", m_ui.neighbors);
8953 }
8954 
8955 void spoton::slotNeighborHalfEcho(void)
8956 {
8957  changeEchoMode("half", m_ui.neighbors);
8958 }
8959 
8960 void spoton::slotKernelLogEvents(bool state)
8961 {
8962  m_settings["gui/kernelLogEvents"] = state;
8963 
8964  QSettings settings;
8965 
8966  settings.setValue("gui/kernelLogEvents", state);
8967 }
8968 
8969 void spoton::slotModeChanged(QSslSocket::SslMode mode)
8970 {
8971  spoton_misc::logError(QString("spoton::slotModeChanged(): "
8972  "the connection mode has changed to %1 "
8973  "for %2:%3.").
8974  arg(mode).
8975  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
8976  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
8977 
8978  if(mode == QSslSocket::UnencryptedMode)
8979  {
8980  spoton_misc::logError
8981  (QString("spoton::slotModeChanged(): "
8982  "plaintext mode. Disconnecting kernel socket for "
8983  "%1:%2.").
8984  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
8985  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
8986  m_kernelSocket.close();
8987  }
8988 }
8989 
8990 void spoton::slotListenerMaximumChanged(int value)
8991 {
8992  QSpinBox *spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox *> (sender());
8993 
8994  if(!spinBox)
8995  return;
8996 
8997  QString connectionName("");
8998 
8999  {
9000  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
9001 
9002  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
9003  "listeners.db");
9004 
9005  if(db.open())
9006  {
9007  QSqlQuery query(db);
9008  QString name(spinBox->property("field_name").toString().toLower());
9009 
9010  if(name == "maximum_buffer_size")
9011  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
9012  "maximum_buffer_size = ? "
9013  "WHERE OID = ?");
9014  else
9015  query.prepare("UPDATE listeners SET "
9016  "maximum_content_length = ? "
9017  "WHERE OID = ?");
9018 
9019  query.bindValue(0, value);
9020  query.bindValue(1, spinBox->property("oid"));
9021  query.exec();
9022  }
9023 
9024  db.close();
9025  }
9026 
9027  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
9028 }
9029 
9030 void spoton::slotNeighborMaximumChanged(int value)
9031 {
9032  QSpinBox *spinBox = qobject_cast<QSpinBox *> (sender());
9033 
9034  if(!spinBox)
9035  return;
9036 
9037  QString connectionName("");
9038 
9039  {
9040  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
9041 
9042  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
9043  "neighbors.db");
9044 
9045  if(db.open())
9046  {
9047  QSqlQuery query(db);
9048  QString name(spinBox->property("field_name").toString().toLower());
9049 
9050  if(name == "maximum_buffer_size")
9051  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
9052  "maximum_buffer_size = ? "
9053  "WHERE OID = ?");
9054  else
9055  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
9056  "maximum_content_length = ? "
9057  "WHERE OID = ?");
9058 
9059  query.bindValue(0, value);
9060  query.bindValue(1, spinBox->property("oid"));
9061  query.exec();
9062  }
9063 
9064  db.close();
9065  }
9066 
9067  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
9068 }
9069 
9070 void spoton::slotDetachListenerNeighbors(void)
9071 {
9072  QString oid("");
9073  int row = -1;
9074 
9075  if((row = m_ui.listeners->currentRow()) >= 0)
9076  {
9077  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.listeners->item
9078  (row, m_ui.listeners->columnCount() - 1); // OID
9079 
9080  if(item)
9081  oid = item->text();
9082  }
9083 
9084  if(oid.isEmpty())
9085  return;
9086 
9087  if(m_kernelSocket.state() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)
9088  if(m_kernelSocket.isEncrypted())
9089  {
9090  QByteArray message;
9091 
9092  message.append("detach_listener_neighbors_");
9093  message.append(oid);
9094  message.append("\n");
9095 
9096  if(m_kernelSocket.write(message.constData(), message.length()) !=
9097  message.length())
9098  spoton_misc::logError
9099  (QString("spoton::slotDetachListenerNeighbors(): write() "
9100  "failure for %1:%2.").
9101  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
9102  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
9103  }
9104 }
9105 
9106 void spoton::slotDisconnectListenerNeighbors(void)
9107 {
9108  QString oid("");
9109  int row = -1;
9110 
9111  if((row = m_ui.listeners->currentRow()) >= 0)
9112  {
9113  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.listeners->item
9114  (row, m_ui.listeners->columnCount() - 1); // OID
9115 
9116  if(item)
9117  oid = item->text();
9118  }
9119 
9120  if(oid.isEmpty())
9121  return;
9122 
9123  if(m_kernelSocket.state() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)
9124  if(m_kernelSocket.isEncrypted())
9125  {
9126  QByteArray message;
9127 
9128  message.append("disconnect_listener_neighbors_");
9129  message.append(oid);
9130  message.append("\n");
9131 
9132  if(m_kernelSocket.write(message.constData(), message.length()) !=
9133  message.length())
9134  spoton_misc::logError
9135  (QString("spoton::slotDisconnectListenerNeighbors(): "
9136  "write() failure for %1:%2.").
9137  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
9138  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
9139  }
9140 }
9141 
9142 void spoton::slotCallParticipant(void)
9143 {
9144  if(m_kernelSocket.state() != QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState)
9145  return;
9146  else if(!m_kernelSocket.isEncrypted())
9147  return;
9148 
9149  QAction *action = qobject_cast<QAction *> (sender());
9150 
9151  if(!action)
9152  return;
9153 
9154  QString keyType("");
9155  QString oid("");
9156  QString type(action->property("type").toString().toLower());
9157  bool temporary = true;
9158  int row = -1;
9159 
9160  if((row = m_ui.participants->currentRow()) >= 0)
9161  {
9162  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.participants->item(row, 1); // OID
9163 
9164  if(item)
9165  {
9166  keyType = item->data
9167  (Qt::ItemDataRole(Qt::UserRole + 1)).toString().toLower();
9168  oid = item->text();
9169  temporary = item->data(Qt::UserRole).toBool();
9170  }
9171  }
9172 
9173  if(oid.isEmpty())
9174  return;
9175  else if(keyType == "poptastic" && type == "calling_two_way")
9176  return; // Not allowed!
9177  else if(temporary) // Temporary friend?
9178  return; // Not allowed!
9179 
9180  if(type == "calling")
9181  slotGenerateGeminiInChat();
9182  else if(type == "calling_two_way")
9183  generateHalfGeminis();
9184  else if(type == "calling_using_gemini")
9185  {
9186  }
9187  else
9188  saveGemini(QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> (), oid);
9189 
9190  QByteArray message;
9191 
9192  if(type == "calling_using_gemini")
9193  message.append("call_participant_using_gemini_");
9194  else
9195  message.append("call_participant_using_public_key_");
9196 
9197  message.append(keyType);
9198  message.append("_");
9199  message.append(oid);
9200  message.append("\n");
9201 
9202  if(m_kernelSocket.write(message.constData(), message.length()) !=
9203  message.length())
9204  spoton_misc::logError
9205  (QString("spoton::slotCallParticipant(): write() failure for %1:%2.").
9206  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerAddress().toString()).
9207  arg(m_kernelSocket.peerPort()));
9208 }
9209 
9210 void spoton::slotSignatureCheckBoxToggled(bool state)
9211 {
9212  QCheckBox *checkBox = qobject_cast<QCheckBox *> (sender());
9213  QString str("");
9214 
9215  if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.chatAcceptSigned)
9216  str = "chatAcceptSignedMessagesOnly";
9217  else if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.chatSignMessages)
9218  str = "chatSignMessages";
9219  else if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.coAcceptSigned)
9220  str = "coAcceptSignedMessagesOnly";
9221  else if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.emailAcceptSigned)
9222  str = "emailAcceptSignedMessagesOnly";
9223  else if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.emailSignMessages)
9224  str = "emailSignMessages";
9225  else if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.urlAcceptSigned)
9226  str = "urlAcceptSignedMessagesOnly";
9227  else if(checkBox == m_optionsUi.urlSignMessages)
9228  str = "urlSignMessages";
9229 
9230  if(!str.isEmpty())
9231  {
9232  m_settings[QString("gui/%1").arg(str)] = state;
9233 
9234  QSettings settings;
9235 
9236  settings.setValue(QString("gui/%1").arg(str), state);
9237  }
9238 }
9239 
9240 void spoton::slotCopyEmailFriendshipBundle(void)
9241 {
9242  QClipboard *clipboard = QApplication::clipboard();
9243 
9244  if(!clipboard)
9245  return;
9246 
9247  QString keyType("");
9248  QString oid("");
9249  int row = -1;
9250 
9251  if((row = m_ui.emailParticipants->currentRow()) >= 0)
9252  {
9253  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.emailParticipants->item
9254  (row, 1); // OID
9255 
9256  if(item)
9257  {
9258  keyType = item->data(Qt::ItemDataRole(Qt::UserRole + 1)).
9259  toString();
9260  oid = item->text();
9261  }
9262  }
9263 
9264  if(oid.isEmpty())
9265  {
9266  clipboard->clear();
9267  return;
9268  }
9269 
9270  if(!m_crypts.value(keyType, 0) ||
9271  !m_crypts.value(QString("%1-signature").arg(keyType), 0))
9272  {
9273  clipboard->clear();
9274  return;
9275  }
9276 
9277  /*
9278  ** 1. Generate some symmetric information, S.
9279  ** 2. Encrypt S with the participant's public key.
9280  ** 3. Encrypt our information (name, public keys, signatures) with the
9281  ** symmetric key. Call our information T.
9282  ** 4. Compute a keyed hash of T.
9283  */
9284 
9285  QString neighborOid("");
9286  QByteArray cipherType(m_settings.value("gui/kernelCipherType",
9287  "aes256").
9288  toString().toLatin1());
9289  QByteArray hashKey;
9290  QByteArray keyInformation;
9291  QByteArray publicKey;
9292  QByteArray symmetricKey;
9293  QPair<QByteArray, QByteArray> gemini;
9294  QString receiverName("");
9295  bool ok = true;
9296 
9297  if(cipherType.isEmpty())
9298  {
9299  clipboard->clear();
9300  return;
9301  }
9302 
9303  spoton_misc::retrieveSymmetricData(gemini,
9304  publicKey,
9305  symmetricKey,
9306  hashKey,
9307  neighborOid,
9308  receiverName,
9309  cipherType,
9310  oid,
9311  m_crypts.value(keyType, 0),
9312  &ok);
9313 
9314  if(!ok || publicKey.isEmpty() || symmetricKey.isEmpty())
9315  {
9316  clipboard->clear();
9317  return;
9318  }
9319 
9320  keyInformation = spoton_crypt::publicKeyEncrypt
9321  (symmetricKey.toBase64() + "@" +
9322  cipherType.toBase64() + "@" +
9323  hashKey.toBase64(),
9324  publicKey, &ok);
9325 
9326  if(!ok)
9327  {
9328  clipboard->clear();
9329  return;
9330  }
9331 
9332  QByteArray mySPublicKey
9333  (m_crypts.value(QString("%1-signature").arg(keyType))->publicKey(&ok));
9334 
9335  if(!ok)
9336  {
9337  clipboard->clear();
9338  return;
9339  }
9340 
9341  QByteArray mySSignature
9342  (m_crypts.value(QString("%1-signature").arg(keyType))->
9343  digitalSignature(mySPublicKey, &ok));
9344 
9345  if(!ok)
9346  {
9347  clipboard->clear();
9348  return;
9349  }
9350 
9351  QByteArray myPublicKey(m_crypts.value(keyType)->publicKey(&ok));
9352 
9353  if(!ok)
9354  {
9355  clipboard->clear();
9356  return;
9357  }
9358 
9359  QByteArray mySignature(m_crypts.value(keyType)->
9360  digitalSignature(myPublicKey, &ok));
9361 
9362  if(!ok)
9363  {
9364  clipboard->clear();
9365  return;
9366  }
9367 
9368  QByteArray myName;
9369 
9370  if(keyType == "email")
9371  myName = m_settings.value("gui/emailName", "unknown").toByteArray();
9372  else
9373  myName = poptasticNameEmail();
9374 
9375  if(myName.isEmpty())
9376  {
9377  if(keyType == "email")
9378  myName = "unknown";
9379  else
9380  myName = "unknown@unknown.org";
9381  }
9382 
9383  QByteArray data;
9384  spoton_crypt crypt(cipherType,
9385  "sha512",
9386  QByteArray(),
9387  symmetricKey,
9388  hashKey,
9389  0,
9390  0,
9391  "");
9392 
9393  data = crypt.encrypted(keyType.toLatin1().toBase64() + "@" +
9394  myName.toBase64() + "@" +
9395  myPublicKey.toBase64() + "@" +
9396  mySignature.toBase64() + "@" +
9397  mySPublicKey.toBase64() + "@" +
9398  mySSignature.toBase64(), &ok);
9399 
9400  if(!ok)
9401  {
9402  clipboard->clear();
9403  return;
9404  }
9405 
9406  QByteArray hash(crypt.keyedHash(data, &ok));
9407 
9408  if(!ok)
9409  {
9410  clipboard->clear();
9411  return;
9412  }
9413 
9414  clipboard->setText("R" +
9415  keyInformation.toBase64() + "@" +
9416  data.toBase64() + "@" +
9417  hash.toBase64());
9418 }
9419 
9420 void spoton::slotCopyAllMyPublicKeys(void)
9421 {
9422  QClipboard *clipboard = QApplication::clipboard();
9423 
9424  if(clipboard)
9425  {
9426  QApplication::setOverrideCursor(QCursor(Qt::WaitCursor));
9427  clipboard->setText(copyMyChatPublicKey() + "\n" +
9428  copyMyEmailPublicKey() + "\n" +
9429  copyMyOpenLibraryPublicKey() + "\n" +
9430  copyMyPoptasticPublicKey() + "\n" +
9431  copyMyRosettaPublicKey() + "\n" +
9432  copyMyUrlPublicKey());
9433  QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
9434  }
9435 }
9436 
9437 void spoton::slotSaveSslControlString(void)
9438 {
9439  QString str(m_optionsUi.sslControlString->text());
9440 
9441  if(str.trimmed().isEmpty())
9442  str = spoton_common::SSL_CONTROL_STRING;
9443 
9444  m_ui.listenersSslControlString->setText(str.trimmed());
9445  m_ui.neighborsSslControlString->setText(str.trimmed());
9446  m_optionsUi.sslControlString->setText(str.trimmed());
9447  m_optionsUi.sslControlString->selectAll();
9448  m_settings["gui/sslControlString"] = str;
9449 
9450  QSettings settings;
9451 
9452  settings.setValue("gui/sslControlString", str);
9453 }

9455 void spoton::slotDiscoverExternalAddress(void)
9456 {
9457  m_externalAddress.discover();
9458 }
9459 
9460 void spoton::slotNeighborSelected(void)
9461 {
9462  if(!m_ui.action_Neighbor_Summary_Panel->isChecked())
9463  return;
9464 
9465  QTableWidgetItem *item = m_ui.neighbors->selectedItems().value(0);
9466 
9467  if(item)
9468  {
9469  int h = 0;
9470  int v = 0;
9471 
9472  m_ui.neighborSummary->setText(neighborSummary(item, h, v));
9473  m_ui.neighborSummary->horizontalScrollBar()->setValue(h);
9474  m_ui.neighborSummary->verticalScrollBar()->setValue(v);
9475  }
9476 }
9477 
9478 void spoton::slotChangeTabPosition(int index)
9479 {
9480  if(index == 0)
9481  {
9482  m_settings["gui/tabPosition"] = "east";
9483  m_ui.tab->setTabPosition(QTabWidget::East);
9484  }
9485  else if(index == 1)
9486  {
9487  m_settings["gui/tabPosition"] = "north";
9488  m_ui.tab->setTabPosition(QTabWidget::North);
9489  }
9490  else if(index == 2)
9491  {
9492  m_settings["gui/tabPosition"] = "south";
9493  m_ui.tab->setTabPosition(QTabWidget::South);
9494  }
9495  else if(index == 3)
9496  {
9497  m_settings["gui/tabPosition"] = "west";
9498  m_ui.tab->setTabPosition(QTabWidget::West);
9499  }
9500  else
9501  {
9502 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
9503  m_settings["gui/tabPosition"] = "north";
9504  m_ui.tab->setTabPosition(QTabWidget::North);
9505 #else
9506  m_settings["gui/tabPosition"] = "east";
9507  m_ui.tab->setTabPosition(QTabWidget::East);
9508 #endif
9509  }
9510 
9511  prepareTabIcons();
9512 
9513  QSettings settings;
9514 
9515  settings.setValue("gui/tabPosition", m_settings.value("gui/tabPosition"));
9516 }
9517 
9518 void spoton::slotResetAccountInformation(void)
9519 {
9520  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
9521 
9522  if(!crypt)
9523  return;
9524 
9525  QModelIndexList list;
9526 
9527  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
9528  (m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1); // OID
9529 
9530  if(list.isEmpty())
9531  return;
9532 
9533  QString connectionName("");
9534 
9535  {
9536  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
9537 
9538  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
9539  "neighbors.db");
9540 
9541  if(db.open())
9542  {
9543  QSqlQuery query(db);
9544  bool ok = true;
9545 
9546  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
9547  "account_authenticated = NULL, "
9548  "account_name = ?, "
9549  "account_password = ? "
9550  "WHERE OID = ? AND user_defined = 1");
9551  query.bindValue
9552  (0, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(), &ok).toBase64());
9553 
9554  if(ok)
9555  query.bindValue
9556  (1, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(QByteArray(), &ok).toBase64());
9557 
9558  query.bindValue(2, list.at(0).data());
9559 
9560  if(ok)
9561  query.exec();
9562  }
9563 
9564  db.close();
9565  }
9566 
9567  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
9568 }
9569 
9570 void spoton::slotAuthenticate(void)
9571 {
9572  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
9573 
9574  if(!crypt)
9575  {
9576  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
9577  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
9578  tr("Invalid spoton_crypt object. "
9579  "This is a fatal flaw."));
9580  return;
9581  }
9582 
9583  QModelIndexList list;
9584 
9585  list = m_ui.neighbors->selectionModel()->selectedRows
9586  (m_ui.neighbors->columnCount() - 1); // OID
9587 
9588  if(list.isEmpty())
9589  {
9590  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
9591  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
9592  tr("Invalid neighbor OID. "
9593  "Please select a neighbor."));
9594  return;
9595  }
9596 
9597  authenticate(crypt, list.at(0).data().toString());
9598 }
9599 
9600 void spoton::authenticate(spoton_crypt *crypt, const QString &oid,
9601  const QString &message)
9602 {
9603  if(!crypt)
9604  return;
9605  else if(oid.isEmpty())
9606  return;
9607 
9608  QDialog dialog(this);
9609  Ui_passwordprompt ui;
9610 
9611  ui.setupUi(&dialog);
9612  dialog.setWindowTitle
9613  (tr("%1: Please Authenticate Account").
9614  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME));
9615 #ifdef Q_OS_MAC
9616  dialog.setAttribute(Qt::WA_MacMetalStyle, false);
9617 #endif
9618 
9619  if(!message.isEmpty())
9620  ui.message->setText(message);
9621 
9622  if(dialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted)
9623  {
9624  QString name(ui.name->text().trimmed());
9625  QString password(ui.password->text());
9626 
9627  if(name.length() >= 32 && password.length() >= 32)
9628  {
9629  QString connectionName("");
9630  bool ok = true;
9631 
9632  {
9633  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
9634 
9635  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
9636  "neighbors.db");
9637 
9638  if(db.open())
9639  {
9640  QSqlQuery query(db);
9641 
9642  query.prepare("UPDATE neighbors SET "
9643  "account_authenticated = NULL, "
9644  "account_name = ?, "
9645  "account_password = ? "
9646  "WHERE OID = ? AND user_defined = 1");
9647  query.bindValue
9648  (0, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(name.toLatin1(),
9649  &ok).toBase64());
9650 
9651  if(ok)
9652  query.bindValue
9653  (1, crypt->encryptedThenHashed(password.toLatin1(),
9654  &ok).toBase64());
9655 
9656  query.bindValue(2, oid);
9657 
9658  if(ok)
9659  ok = query.exec();
9660  }
9661  else
9662  ok = false;
9663 
9664  db.close();
9665  }
9666 
9667  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
9668 
9669  if(!ok)
9670  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
9671  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
9672  tr("An error occurred while attempting "
9673  "to record authentication "
9674  "information."));
9675  }
9676  else
9677  QMessageBox::critical
9678  (this, tr("%1: Error").
9679  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME),
9680  tr("The account name and the account password "
9681  "must contain at least thirty-two characters "
9682  "each."));
9683  }
9684 }
9685 
9686 void spoton::slotPopulateBuzzFavorites(void)
9687 {
9688  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
9689 
9690  if(!crypt)
9691  return;
9692 
9693  QFileInfo fileInfo(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
9694  "buzz_channels.db");
9695 
9696  if(fileInfo.exists())
9697  {
9698  if(fileInfo.lastModified() >= m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime)
9699  {
9700  if(fileInfo.lastModified() == m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime)
9701  m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified().
9702  addMSecs(1);
9703  else
9704  m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime = fileInfo.lastModified();
9705  }
9706  else
9707  return;
9708  }
9709  else
9710  m_buzzFavoritesLastModificationTime = QDateTime();
9711 
9712  QMap<QByteArray, QByteArray> map;
9713  QString connectionName("");
9714 
9715  {
9716  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
9717 
9718  db.setDatabaseName(fileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
9719 
9720  if(db.open())
9721  {
9722  QSqlQuery query(db);
9723  QWidget *focusWidget = QApplication::focusWidget();
9724 
9725  query.setForwardOnly(true);
9726 
9727  if(query.exec("SELECT data FROM buzz_channels"))
9728  while(query.next())
9729  {
9730  QByteArray data;
9731  bool ok = true;
9732 
9733  data = crypt->decryptedAfterAuthenticated
9734  (QByteArray::fromBase64(query.value(0).toByteArray()), &ok);
9735 
9736  if(ok)
9737  {
9738  QByteArray channelName;
9739  QByteArray channelSalt;
9740  QByteArray channelType;
9741  QByteArray hashKey;
9742  QByteArray hashType;
9743  QList<QByteArray> list(data.split('\n'));
9744 
9745  channelName = QByteArray::fromBase64(list.value(0));
9746  channelType = QByteArray::fromBase64(list.value(3));
9747  hashKey = QByteArray::fromBase64(list.value(4));
9748  hashType = QByteArray::fromBase64(list.value(5));
9749 
9750  if(!channelName.isEmpty() && !channelType.isEmpty() &&
9751  !hashKey.isEmpty() && !hashType.isEmpty())
9752  {
9753  QByteArray label;
9754  unsigned long int iterationCount = 0;
9755 
9756  channelSalt = QByteArray::fromBase64
9757  (list.value(2));
9758  iterationCount = qMax
9759  (QByteArray::fromBase64(list.value(1)).
9760  toULong(), static_cast<unsigned long int> (10000));
9761 
9762  if(channelName.length() > 16)
9763  {
9764  label.append(channelName.mid(0, 8));
9765  label.append("...");
9766  label.append
9767  (channelName.mid(channelName.length() - 8));
9768  }
9769  else
9770  label.append(channelName);
9771 
9772  label.append(":");
9773  label.append(QString::number(iterationCount));
9774  label.append(":");
9775 
9776  if(channelSalt.length() > 16)
9777  {
9778  label.append(channelSalt.mid(0, 8));
9779  label.append("...");
9780  label.append
9781  (channelSalt.mid(channelSalt.length() - 8));
9782  }
9783  else
9784  label.append(channelSalt);
9785 
9786  label.append(":");
9787  label.append(channelType);
9788  label.append(":");
9789 
9790  if(hashKey.length() > 16)
9791  {
9792  label.append(hashKey.mid(0, 8));
9793  label.append("...");
9794  label.append
9795  (hashKey.mid(hashKey.length() - 8));
9796  }
9797  else
9798  label.append(hashKey);
9799 
9800  label.append(":");
9801  label.append(hashType);
9802  map.insert(label, data);
9803  }
9804  }
9805  }
9806 
9807  if(focusWidget)
9808  focusWidget->setFocus();
9809  }
9810 
9811  db.close();
9812  }
9813 
9814  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
9815 
9816  if(!map.isEmpty())
9817  {
9818  m_ui.favorites->clear();
9819 
9820  while(!m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->actions().isEmpty())
9821  {
9822  QAction *action = m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->actions().first();
9823 
9824  m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->removeAction(action);
9825  action->deleteLater();
9826  }
9827 
9828  for(int i = 0; i < map.keys().size(); i++)
9829  {
9830  m_ui.favorites->addItem(map.keys().at(i));
9831  m_ui.favorites->setItemData(i, map.value(map.keys().at(i)));
9832 
9833  QAction *action = new QAction
9834  (map.keys().at(i), this);
9835 
9836  action->setData(map.value(map.keys().at(i)));
9837  connect(action,
9838  SIGNAL(triggered(void)),
9839  this,
9840  SLOT(slotShareBuzzMagnet(void)));
9841  m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->addAction(action);
9842  }
9843  }
9844  else
9845  {
9846  m_ui.favorites->clear();
9847  m_ui.favorites->addItem("Empty");
9848 
9849  while(!m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->actions().isEmpty())
9850  {
9851  QAction *action = m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->actions().first();
9852 
9853  m_ui.shareBuzzMagnet->menu()->removeAction(action);
9854  action->deleteLater();
9855  }
9856  }
9857 
9858  m_ui.favorites->setMinimumContentsLength
9859  (m_ui.favorites->itemText(0).length());
9860 }
9861 
9862 void spoton::slotFavoritesActivated(int index)
9863 {
9864  QByteArray data(m_ui.favorites->itemData(index).toByteArray());
9865  QList<QByteArray> list(data.split('\n'));
9866 
9867  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
9868  list.replace(i, QByteArray::fromBase64(list.at(i)));
9869 
9870  m_ui.channel->setText(list.value(0));
9871  m_ui.buzzIterationCount->setValue
9872  (static_cast<int> (list.value(1).toULong()));
9873  m_ui.channelSalt->setText(list.value(2));
9874 
9875  if(m_ui.channelType->findText(list.value(3)) > -1)
9876  m_ui.channelType->setCurrentIndex
9877  (m_ui.channelType->findText(list.value(3)));
9878  else
9879  m_ui.channelType->setCurrentIndex(0);
9880 
9881  m_ui.buzzHashKey->setText(list.value(4));
9882 
9883  if(m_ui.buzzHashType->findText(list.value(5)) > -1)
9884  m_ui.buzzHashType->setCurrentIndex
9885  (m_ui.buzzHashType->findText(list.value(5)));
9886  else
9887  m_ui.buzzHashType->setCurrentIndex(0);
9888 }
9889 
9890 void spoton::removeFavorite(const bool removeAll)
9891 {
9892  QString connectionName("");
9893  QString error("");
9894  bool ok = true;
9895  spoton_crypt *crypt = m_crypts.value("chat", 0);
9896 
9897  if(!crypt)
9898  {
9899  error = tr("Invalid spoton_crypt object. This is a fatal flaw.");
9900  goto done_label;
9901  }
9902 
9903  {
9904  QSqlDatabase db = spoton_misc::database(connectionName);
9905 
9906  db.setDatabaseName(spoton_misc::homePath() + QDir::separator() +
9907  "buzz_channels.db");
9908 
9909  if(db.open())
9910  {
9911  QByteArray data;
9912  QSqlQuery query(db);
9913 
9914  query.exec("PRAGMA secure_delete = ON");
9915 
9916  if(removeAll)
9917  query.prepare("DELETE FROM buzz_channels");
9918  else
9919  {
9920  query.prepare("DELETE FROM buzz_channels WHERE "
9921  "data_hash = ?");
9922  query.bindValue
9923  (0, crypt->keyedHash(m_ui.favorites->
9924  itemData(m_ui.favorites->currentIndex()).
9925  toByteArray(), &ok).toBase64());
9926  }
9927 
9928  if(ok)
9929  ok = query.exec();
9930  }
9931  else
9932  ok = false;
9933 
9934  db.close();
9935  }
9936 
9937  QSqlDatabase::removeDatabase(connectionName);
9938 
9939  if(!ok)
9940  error = tr("A database error occurred.");
9941 
9942  done_label:
9943 
9944  if(!error.isEmpty())
9945  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
9946  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME), error);
9947  else
9948  {
9949  slotPopulateBuzzFavorites();
9950  m_ui.buzzHashKey->clear();
9951  m_ui.buzzHashType->setCurrentIndex(0);
9952  m_ui.buzzIterationCount->setValue(m_ui.buzzIterationCount->minimum());
9953  m_ui.channel->clear();
9954  m_ui.channelSalt->clear();
9955  m_ui.channelType->setCurrentIndex(0);
9956  }
9957 }
9958 
9959 void spoton::magnetize(void)
9960 {
9961  if(m_ui.favorites->currentText() == "Empty")
9962  return;
9963 
9964  QByteArray data;
9965  QList<QByteArray> list;
9966  QClipboard *clipboard = QApplication::clipboard();
9967  QString error("");
9968 
9969  if(!clipboard)
9970  {
9971  error = tr("Invalid clipboard object. This is a fatal flaw.");
9972  goto done_label;
9973  }
9974 
9975  list = m_ui.favorites->itemData
9976  (m_ui.favorites->currentIndex()).toByteArray().split('\n');
9977 
9978  for(int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++)
9979  list.replace(i, QByteArray::fromBase64(list.at(i)));
9980 
9981  data.append("magnet:?");
9982  data.append(QString("rn=%1&").arg(list.value(0).constData()));
9983  data.append(QString("xf=%1&").arg(list.value(1).constData()));
9984  data.append(QString("xs=%1&").arg(list.value(2).constData()));
9985  data.append(QString("ct=%1&").arg(list.value(3).constData()));
9986  data.append(QString("hk=%1&").arg(list.value(4).constData()));
9987  data.append(QString("ht=%1&").arg(list.value(5).constData()));
9988  data.append("xt=urn:buzz");
9989  clipboard->setText(data);
9990 
9991  done_label:
9992 
9993  if(!error.isEmpty())
9994  QMessageBox::critical(this, tr("%1: Error").
9995  arg(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME), error);
9996 }
9997 
9998 void spoton::demagnetize(void)
9999 {
10000  QStringList list
10001  (m_ui.demagnetize->text().remove("magnet:?").split("&"));
10002 
10003  while(!list.isEmpty())
10004  {
10005  QString str(list.takeFirst());
10006 
10007  if(str.startsWith("rn="))
10008  {
10009  str.remove(0, 3);
10010  m_ui.channel->setText(str);
10011  }
10012  else if(str.startsWith("xf="))
10013  {
10014  str.remove(0, 3);
10015  m_ui.buzzIterationCount->setValue(qAbs(str.toInt()));
10016  }
10017  else if(str.startsWith("xs="))
10018  {
10019  str.remove(0, 3);
10020  m_ui.channelSalt->setText(str);
10021  }
10022  else if(str.startsWith("ct="))
10023  {
10024  str.remove(0, 3);
10025 
10026  if(m_ui.channelType->findText(str) > -1)
10027  m_ui.channelType->setCurrentIndex
10028  (m_ui.channelType->findText(str));
10029  }
10030  else if(str.startsWith("hk="))
10031  {
10032  str.remove(0, 3);
10033  m_ui.buzzHashKey->setText(str);
10034  }
10035  else if(str.startsWith("ht="))
10036  {
10037  str.remove(0, 3);
10038 
10039  if(m_ui.buzzHashType->findText(str) > -1)
10040  m_ui.buzzHashType->setCurrentIndex
10041  (m_ui.buzzHashType->findText(str));
10042  }
10043  else if(str.startsWith("xt="))
10044  {
10045  }
10046  }
10047 
10048  slotJoinBuzzChannel();
10049 }
10050 
10051 void spoton::slotBuzzTools(int index)
10052 {
10053  if(index == 0)
10054  m_ui.demagnetize->clear();
10055  else if(index == 1)
10056  demagnetize();
10057  else if(index == 2)
10058  magnetize();
10059  else if(index == 3)
10060  removeFavorite(false);
10061  else if(index == 4)
10062  removeFavorite(true);
10063 
10064  disconnect(m_ui.buzzTools,
10065  SIGNAL(activated(int)),
10066  this,
10067  SLOT(slotFavoritesActivated(int)));
10068  m_ui.buzzTools->setCurrentIndex(0);
10069  connect(m_ui.buzzTools,
10070  SIGNAL(activated(int)),
10071  this,
10072  SLOT(slotFavoritesActivated(int)));
10073 }
10074 
10075 void spoton::slotAbout(void)
10076 {
10077  QMessageBox mb(this);
10078  QString str("");
10079 
10080 #if SPOTON_GOLDBUG == 0
10081  QPixmap pixmap(":/Logo/spot-on-logo.png");
10082 
10083  pixmap = pixmap.scaled
10084  (QSize(256, 256), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
10085  str = "<html>Please visit <a href=\"http://spot-on.sourceforge.net\">"
10086  "spot-on.sourceforge.net</a> for more information.";
10087  mb.setIconPixmap(pixmap);
10088 #else
10089  str = "<html>GoldBug is an open source application published under "
10090  "the Revised BSD License.<br>"
10091  "Please visit <a href=\"http://goldbug.sourceforge.net\">"
10092  "goldbug.sourceforge.net</a> for more information.";
10093  mb.setIconPixmap(*m_ui.logo->pixmap());
10094 #endif
10095  str.append("<br><br>");
10096  str.append(m_ui.buildInformation->text());
10097  str.append("</html>");
10098  mb.setStandardButtons(QMessageBox::Ok);
10099  mb.setText(str);
10100  mb.setTextFormat(Qt::RichText);
10101  mb.setWindowTitle(SPOTON_APPLICATION_NAME);
10102  mb.exec();
10103 }
